original: nye bar len pa la ltos nas shes pa skyed par rung ba'i skad cig gzhan skyes pa kho na ni /
analyzed: nye bar len pa la ltos nas shes pa skyed par rung ba'i skad cig gzhan skyes pa kho na ni /
translated: It is only the other moment that is suitable to generate consciousness in dependence on the appropriated aggregates that is produced.🔽

original: bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyi bsal ba ste /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyi bsal ba ste /
translated: The other moment that is suitable to generate consciousness in dependence on the appropriated aggregates is the very thing that is the manifestation of the pot, etc.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na des byas pa'i phan 'dogs pa la ltos pa med par shes pa skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na des byas pa'i phan 'dogs pa la ltos pa med par shes pa skye bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would follow that consciousness would arise without depending on the benefit that it produces.

original: pha rol po ni rmongs pa las skyed pa dang bral ba kho na'i ngo bo ma dor ba'i bum pa la sogs pa'i mngon par gsal bar sems so //
analyzed: pha rol po ni rmongs pa las skyed pa dang bral ba kho na'i ngo bo ma dor ba'i bum pa la sogs pa'i mngon par gsal bar sems so //
translated: The opponent thinks that the manifestation of the pot, etc., is the very thing that is not divorced from the generation of confusion, and that it does not lose its nature.

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo nges par rtogs pa yang ma yin no //🔽shes pa skyed byed @111a * //
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo nges par rtogs pa yang ma yin no // shes pa skyed byed @111a * //
translated: But he does not ascertain its nature.

original: kyi nus pa mngon par gsal ba'o zhe na /
analyzed: kyi nus pa mngon par gsal ba'o zhe na /
translated: The manifestation of the capacity to generate consciousness🔽is the manifestation of the pot, etc.

original: de lta na 'o ma bum pa la sogs pa kho na mngon par gsal bar byed pas bya'o zhes 'thob ste /
analyzed: de lta na 'o ma bum pa la sogs pa kho na mngon par gsal bar byed pas bya'o zhes 'thob ste /
translated: If that were so, it would follow that the pot, etc., are the very things that are manifested,

original: nus pa ni de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa ni de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the capacity is just the nature of that.

original: don gzhan nyid na bum pa la sogs pa la phan mi 'dogs par thal ba'i phyir ro//
analyzed: don gzhan nyid na bum pa la sogs pa la phan mi 'dogs par thal ba'i phyir ro//
translated: If it is a different object, then it follows that it does not benefit the pot, etc.

original: nus pa las shes pa skye ba'i phyir bum pa la sogs pa rnams rtag tu 'dzin pa ma yin par yang thal par 'gyur te /
analyzed: nus pa las shes pa skye ba'i phyir bum pa la sogs pa rnams rtag tu 'dzin pa ma yin par yang thal par 'gyur te /
translated: And it follows that the pot, etc. are not always apprehended, because consciousness arises from potentiality.

original: rgyu ma yin pa ni yul du 'thad pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: rgyu ma yin pa ni yul du 'thad pa ma yin pas so //
translated: And because it is not tenable that a noncause is an object.

original: de'i yang de la nus pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: de'i yang de la nus pa'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that the potentiality is in that,

original: 'ba' zhig pas kyang skyed par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig pas kyang skyed par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would generate by itself.

original: lhan cig byed pa la ltos nas skyed par byed kyi 'ba' zhig pas ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa la ltos nas skyed par byed kyi 'ba' zhig pas ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it generates in dependence on the assemblage of causes, not by itself,🔽then what is this dependence on what is not to be benefited?

original: phan gdags bya ma yin pa'i ltos pa 'di ci zhig / shes pa mngon par gsal ba'o zhe na /
analyzed: phan gdags bya ma yin pa'i ltos pa 'di ci zhig / shes pa mngon par gsal ba'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is the manifestation of consciousness,

original: rtag tu bum pa la sogs pa mi 'dzin par thal lo zhes pa la sogs pa thams cad slar yang 'jug go //
analyzed: rtag tu bum pa la sogs pa mi 'dzin par thal lo zhes pa la sogs pa thams cad slar yang 'jug go //
translated: then it follows that the pot, etc. are not always apprehended, and so on.

original: des na pha rol pos yongs su brtags pa'i mngon par gsal ba ni 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na pha rol pos yongs su brtags pa'i mngon par gsal ba ni 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore the manifestation imagined by the opponent is not tenable.

original: de'i phyir de ni rtags dang rtags can gyi dngos po ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni rtags dang rtags can gyi dngos po ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not a case of the evidence and the evidence-bearer.

original: snal ma la sogs pa yan lag rnams las gzhan pa'i yan lag can gyi rdzas bum pa la sogs par rtogs par bya ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: snal ma la sogs pa yan lag rnams las gzhan pa'i yan lag can gyi rdzas bum pa la sogs par rtogs par bya ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it the case that the substance of the pot, etc., which is different from the parts such as the clay, etc., is to be understood.

original: de'i phyir rang bzhin mi dmigs pas yod pa nyid gsal bar byas pa can de ni med pa kho na'o //🔽des na de rnams kyis de'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang bzhin mi dmigs pas yod pa nyid gsal bar byas pa can de ni med pa kho na'o // des na de rnams kyis de'am /
translated: Therefore, since the intrinsic nature is not perceived, that which is supposed to be existent is clearly non-existent.🔽Thus, it is not the case that they infer that from it,

original: des de rnams rjes su dpog pa gal yin /
analyzed: des de rnams rjes su dpog pa gal yin /
translated: nor that it infers that from them.

original: de yod pa nyid na yang rgyu las rjes su dpog pa rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yod pa nyid na yang rgyu las rjes su dpog pa rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Even if it did exist, it is not reasonable to infer it from the cause,

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod zin to //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod zin to //
translated: because of error.

original: de ltar 'gyur mong rgyu tshogs pas 'bras bu srid pa rjes su dpag par bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mong rgyu tshogs pas 'bras bu srid pa rjes su dpag par bya'o zhe na /
translated: Thus, it is to be inferred that the effect is possible from the assemblage of causes.

original: 'di mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'di mi rigs te /
translated: This is unreasonable,

original: mngon sum nges pa'i bdag nyid can du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum nges pa'i bdag nyid can du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is accepted that the nature of perception is certain.

original: rgyu ni skyed par byed pa kho nar 'gyur ba gegs byed pa mi 'byung ba can nam /
analyzed: rgyu ni skyed par byed pa kho nar 'gyur ba gegs byed pa mi 'byung ba can nam /
translated: The cause is only that which produces, that which does not arise as an obstruction.

original: skyed par byed pa ma yin pa kho na'ang gegs nges par 'byung ba can yin /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa ma yin pa kho na'ang gegs nges par 'byung ba can yin /
translated: But it is not a producer, and it is not a definite obstruction.

original: brtag pa snga ma la ni /
analyzed: brtag pa snga ma la ni /
translated: In the first case,

original: de de'i ngo bor mngon sum gyis nges so zhes pas /
analyzed: de de'i ngo bor mngon sum gyis nges so zhes pas /
translated: it is ascertained by direct perception that it is the nature of that.

original: de las khyad par can gyi 'bras bu skyed pa rjes su dpag pa kho nar 'gyur na 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de las khyad par can gyi 'bras bu skyed pa rjes su dpag pa kho nar 'gyur na 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the production of a special effect from that would be only inference, but it is not.

original: ji ltar rgyu las 'bras bu yongs su bcad nas de'i don la rab tu 'jug bzhin pa slu ba med pa mthong pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar rgyu las 'bras bu yongs su bcad nas de'i don la rab tu 'jug bzhin pa slu ba med pa mthong pa bzhin no //
translated: Just as when seeing the result ascertained from the cause, one engages in its purpose without deception.

original: phyogs gnyis pa la ni rgyu kho nar de me @111b 'gyur ro zhes pa'i nges pa yod pa na /
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa la ni rgyu kho nar de me @111b 'gyur ro zhes pa'i nges pa yod pa na /
translated: In the second case, if there is certainty that it is only the cause,

original: de las 'bras bu 'byung ba rjes su dpag pa gal yin /
analyzed: de las 'bras bu 'byung ba rjes su dpag pa gal yin /
translated: the arising of the effect from that would be inference.

original: me grang ba'i rgyur gyur pa ma yin na zhes nges pa yod pa la 'ga' zhig mes grang ba yang dag par 'byung ba rjes su dpog pa ni ma yin pas so //
analyzed: me grang ba'i rgyur gyur pa ma yin na zhes nges pa yod pa la 'ga' zhig mes grang ba yang dag par 'byung ba rjes su dpog pa ni ma yin pas so //
translated: If there is certainty that fire does not become the cause of cold, one does not infer the correct arising of cold from fire.

original: de ltar pa rol po'i 'dod pas rgyus 'bras bu dag rjes su dpog pa'i gtan tshigs dag ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar pa rol po'i 'dod pas rgyus 'bras bu dag rjes su dpog pa'i gtan tshigs dag ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the reason that the effect is inferred from the cause is not tenable according to the opinion of the opponent.

original: ldan min rtogs med la 'grub phyir //
analyzed: ldan min rtogs med la 'grub phyir //
translated: Because it is established without the cognition of the non-associated.

original: zhes pa gang ma bzung ba na yang gang la rjes su dpog pa de ni rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: zhes pa gang ma bzung ba na yang gang la rjes su dpog pa de ni rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: If it is not apprehended, that which is inferred is not the cause of inference.

original: dper na chu'i me bzhin /
analyzed: dper na chu'i me bzhin /
translated: For example, like the fire of water.

original: me dang du ba'i ldan pa ma bzung ba na yang me rjes su dpog par 'gyur ro//
analyzed: me dang du ba'i ldan pa ma bzung ba na yang me rjes su dpog par 'gyur ro//
translated: Even if the association of fire and smoke is not apprehended, fire is inferred.

original: khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: The contradiction with the pervader.

original: yang ci ltar de ma rtogs pa na yang 'grub pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci ltar de ma rtogs pa na yang 'grub pa yin zhe na /
translated: Moreover, how is it established even if it is not cognized?

original: smras pa / mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: smras pa / mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said: Because it is seen, etc.

original: ldan pa ni gnyis la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir gnyis nyid bzhin du rten thams cad mthong ba sngon ma can kho nas 'dzin par 'gyur la /
analyzed: ldan pa ni gnyis la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir gnyis nyid bzhin du rten thams cad mthong ba sngon ma can kho nas 'dzin par 'gyur la /
translated: Since association is based on two, like duality, it is apprehended only by one who has previously seen all the bases.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i dus na yang rten thams cad ma mthong ba'i phyir ldan pa 'dzin pa mi srid pa kho na'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i dus na yang rten thams cad ma mthong ba'i phyir ldan pa 'dzin pa mi srid pa kho na'o //
translated: Even at the time of inference, since all the bases are not seen, it is absolutely impossible to apprehend the connection.

original: de ste yang med na mi 'byung ba nyid dran pa las du bas me rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de ste yang med na mi 'byung ba nyid dran pa las du bas me rjes su dpag par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: If it is not so, then because of the non-existence of the connection, fire is not to be inferred from smoke.

original: 'dir 'gyur mod 'di ni ma shes pa kho nar rjes su dpog pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir 'gyur mod 'di ni ma shes pa kho nar rjes su dpog pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: This is so, but it is only because of the non-understanding of this that the reason for inference is stated.🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / shes pa'i rgyu nyid kho nas kyang //
analyzed: gsungs pa / shes pa'i rgyu nyid kho nas kyang //
translated: By the cause of cognition alone,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: etc.

original: rang gi yul can gyi shes pa'i rgyus zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi yul can gyi shes pa'i rgyus zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: by the cause of the cognition which has its object.

original: gang phyir shes par byed pa thams cad ni rang gi yul can gyi shes pa nye bar skyed par byed cing shes par bya ba'i don shes par byed de sgron ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gang phyir shes par byed pa thams cad ni rang gi yul can gyi shes pa nye bar skyed par byed cing shes par bya ba'i don shes par byed de sgron ma bzhin no //
translated: Because all that causes cognition produces the cognition which has its object and causes the understanding of the object to be cognized, like a lamp.

original: rnam pa gzhan du nam bzung ba'i du ba las kyang me la rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du nam bzung ba'i du ba las kyang me la rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, one would understand fire from smoke even when it is not apprehended.

original: ldan pa yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ldan pa yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The connection, etc.

original: gang ldan pa'i rten yin pa de so sor sbyor ba gnyis pa la rtogs par byed pa'i gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: gang ldan pa'i rten yin pa de so sor sbyor ba gnyis pa la rtogs par byed pa'i gtan tshigs te /
translated: The second application is the reason that proves that.

original: dper na du ba bzhin /
analyzed: dper na du ba bzhin /
translated: For example, smoke,🔽fire is like that.

original: me yang de lta bu'o zhes rang bzhin gyi thal 'gyur gsungs so //
analyzed: me yang de lta bu'o zhes rang bzhin gyi thal 'gyur gsungs so //
translated: This is a natural consequence.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: This is so,🔽but this is just what is accepted.

original: 'di ni 'dod pa kho na'o zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di ni 'dod pa kho na'o zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: He says:

original: mthong zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mthong zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “seen” and so on.

original: 'o na du ba yang gnas kyi khang pa la sogs rnams su me med pa las 'byung ba mthong ba kho na'o //🔽des na gang gis gcig la mngon par gsal bar byed pa nyid du thal bar @112a * //
analyzed: 'o na du ba yang gnas kyi khang pa la sogs rnams su me med pa las 'byung ba mthong ba kho na'o // des na gang gis gcig la mngon par gsal bar byed pa nyid du thal bar @112a * //
translated: Well, smoke is seen to arise from the absence of fire in places such as a house.

original: 'gyur bar rtsod cing cig shos lam yin pa 'di dag gi khyad par ci yin /
analyzed: 'gyur bar rtsod cing cig shos lam yin pa 'di dag gi khyad par ci yin /
translated: Therefore, by what is it that the consequence that it is the manifestor of the one is maintained, and by what is the other not the path? What is the difference between these?

original: 'di ltar sems te gal te yang du ba'i ldan pa can nyid da ltar byung ba med mod /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems te gal te yang du ba'i ldan pa can nyid da ltar byung ba med mod /
translated: In this way, it is thought: Although the presence of smoke does not exist in the present,

original: byung ba sngon ma ni yod pa kho na ste /
analyzed: byung ba sngon ma ni yod pa kho na ste /
translated: the previous occurrence definitely exists,

original: rgyu mtshan can ni rgyu mtshan la mi 'khrul ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan can ni rgyu mtshan la mi 'khrul ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because that which has a reason is not mistaken with respect to the reason.

original: skye bzhin pa kho na'i du ba ni me dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: skye bzhin pa kho na'i du ba ni me dang ldan zhing /
translated: Only the smoke that is in the process of arising possesses fire.

original: me ni de'i rgyu mtshan yin la /
analyzed: me ni de'i rgyu mtshan yin la /
translated: Fire is the reason for it.

original: gdon mi za bar rgyu mtshan rnams ni rgyu mtshan can la 'jug par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar rgyu mtshan rnams ni rgyu mtshan can la 'jug par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that reasons necessarily apply to those who possess reasons.

original: de'i phyir de gnas skabs gang du yang byung ba sngon ma can gyis yang ldan pa can nyid srid pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de gnas skabs gang du yang byung ba sngon ma can gyis yang ldan pa can nyid srid pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not possible that it possesses fire at any time, since it has not arisen previously.

original: de ltar gang gi phyir me ni res 'ga' du ba'i rgyu mtshan yin la res 'ga' rgyu mtshan ma yin pa de'i phyir 'khrul pa nyid las de du ba'i ngor mngon par gsal bar byed pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar gang gi phyir me ni res 'ga' du ba'i rgyu mtshan yin la res 'ga' rgyu mtshan ma yin pa de'i phyir 'khrul pa nyid las de du ba'i ngor mngon par gsal bar byed pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Thus, since fire is sometimes the reason for smoke and sometimes not the reason, therefore, it is not the case that it is the manifestor of smoke, because of error.

original: ldan pa rjes su dpog pa'i rgyur 'dod pa la ni de 'thob bo zhes brtsad par bya'o //
analyzed: ldan pa rjes su dpog pa'i rgyur 'dod pa la ni de 'thob bo zhes brtsad par bya'o //
translated: If it is asserted that possession is the reason for inference, then that is obtained.

original: dmigs kyis bsal ba'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs kyis bsal ba'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The response to that is “Because of the exception,” and so on.

original: the tshom za ba'i mnyan pas ma nges pa nyid smras te /
analyzed: the tshom za ba'i mnyan pas ma nges pa nyid smras te /
translated: The listener who is doubtful speaks of the uncertainty.

original: the tshom gyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: the tshom gyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the cause of doubt.

original: yang ci ltar ldan pa can nyid mtshungs pa nyid la me'i ma nges pa nyid dang du ba'i ma yin pa ci ltar zhe na smras pa /🔽de gdon mi za bar ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang ci ltar ldan pa can nyid mtshungs pa nyid la me'i ma nges pa nyid dang du ba'i ma yin pa ci ltar zhe na smras pa / de gdon mi za bar ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Moreover, how is it that fire is uncertain with respect to the possession of smoke, but smoke is not uncertain with respect to fire?🔽It is said:🔽Because it is not necessarily concomitant with it, etc.

original: tha dad min phyir zhes pas ldan pa ni thob pa yin la /
analyzed: tha dad min phyir zhes pas ldan pa ni thob pa yin la /
translated: Possession is obtainment.

original: de tha dad pa yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de tha dad pa yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And that is not different.

original: de las kyang ji ltar gcig gi thob pa de ltar gnyis pa'i yang ngo zhes pa me gcig pu la rgyu ma yin par rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de las kyang ji ltar gcig gi thob pa de ltar gnyis pa'i yang ngo zhes pa me gcig pu la rgyu ma yin par rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: And just as there is obtainment of one, so too there is of two. It is not reasonable that fire alone is not the cause.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod ldan ba'i rten 'ga' zhig ni 'khrul pa ste gang de la 'khrul pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod ldan ba'i rten 'ga' zhig ni 'khrul pa ste gang de la 'khrul pa'o //
translated: That being so, some bases of possession are mistaken, that is, those that are mistaken.

original: 'ga' zhig ni mi 'khrul ba ste gang 'khrul pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ni mi 'khrul ba ste gang 'khrul pa med pa'o //
translated: Some are non-mistaken, that is, those that are non-mistaken.

original: de la gang zhig 'di'i rten mi 'khrul ba de kho na rtags nyid du 'dod kyi cig shos ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de la gang zhig 'di'i rten mi 'khrul ba de kho na rtags nyid du 'dod kyi cig shos ni ma yin no //
translated: Among them, only that which is the non-mistaken basis of this is asserted to be the reason, not the other.

original: de'i phyir ldan pa gzung ba zhes pa kho na rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir ldan pa gzung ba zhes pa kho na rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, possession is not the only reason for postulation.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: gang gi tshe 'di ni 'di'i rten 'khrul pa can no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di ni 'di'i rten 'khrul pa can no //
translated: When it is said, “This is the basis of error,”

original: 'di ni 'khrul pa med pa'o zhes pa 'di ltar yang 'khrul pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i rten nyid kyis rnam par dpyod pa sngon ma can gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ni 'khrul pa med pa'o zhes pa 'di ltar yang 'khrul pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i rten nyid kyis rnam par dpyod pa sngon ma can gzung bar bya ste /
translated: and “This is without error,” in this way, the basis of error and the basis of non-error are to be ascertained by analysis.

original: de kho na 'khrul pa med pa'i rten la rtogs par byed pa nyid 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na 'khrul pa med pa'i rten la rtogs par byed pa nyid 'dzin pa'o //
translated: That which is the basis of non-error is the apprehender, because it is the cause of the realization of reality.

original: des na 'khrul pa med pa de kho nas rjes su dpag par bya'o zhes pas ji skad brjod pa'i skyon gyi gnas @112b med do zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: des na 'khrul pa med pa de kho nas rjes su dpag par bya'o zhes pas ji skad brjod pa'i skyon gyi gnas @112b med do zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is to be inferred by that non-error alone. Thus, there is no basis for the fault stated above.

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: To explain this, he says, “No,” and so on.

original: ldan pa ni lhan cig gam gcig ma yin par gzung bar bya ba yin /
analyzed: ldan pa ni lhan cig gam gcig ma yin par gzung bar bya ba yin /
translated: Possession is to be ascertained as either simultaneous or not simultaneous.

original: bdag nyid phul du byung ba ci yang sgrub par mi byed de /
analyzed: bdag nyid phul du byung ba ci yang sgrub par mi byed de /
translated: It does not at all establish its own superiority.

original: gang gis lan cig ma yin par ldan pa gzung bar bya ba de rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu nyid du 'gyur ba'o /
analyzed: gang gis lan cig ma yin par ldan pa gzung bar bya ba de rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu nyid du 'gyur ba'o /
translated: That which is apprehended as being related to it more than once is the cause of inferring it.

original: gal te yang de bzung zin par gyur yang slar yang 'khrul pa dang ma 'khrul ba'i rten nyid du 'dzin pa ltos pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te yang de bzung zin par gyur yang slar yang 'khrul pa dang ma 'khrul ba'i rten nyid du 'dzin pa ltos pa yin na /
translated: Even if it is apprehended, if it is still taken to be the basis of error and non-error, then

original: de ltar gyur na gzhan kho na med na mi 'byung pa'i 'brel pa nyid du khas blangs par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na gzhan kho na med na mi 'byung pa'i 'brel pa nyid du khas blangs par 'gyur gyi /
translated: it would be the case that it is accepted as being the relation of the mere non-existence of something else.

original: ldan pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ldan pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not related.

original: de'i phyir de khas len par byed pa na /
analyzed: de'i phyir de khas len par byed pa na /
translated: Therefore, when it is accepted,

original: 'di'i cig car kho na 'dzin pa tshad mar bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di'i cig car kho na 'dzin pa tshad mar bya ba'o //
translated: it is the simultaneous apprehension of that which is taken to be valid cognition.

original: de las kyang 'di'i 'khrul pa dang ma 'khrul pa nyid du rnam par dpyad pa ga las yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de las kyang 'di'i 'khrul pa dang ma 'khrul pa nyid du rnam par dpyad pa ga las yin zhes pa'o //
translated: And from that, how could there be an analysis of its error and non-error?

original: gang gi yang med na mi 'byung ba nyid 'brel pa yin pa de'i yang skyon 'di ci ltar mi 'byung zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gi yang med na mi 'byung ba nyid 'brel pa yin pa de'i yang skyon 'di ci ltar mi 'byung zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If the relation is the mere non-existence of something else, then how could this fault not arise for that?

original: gang gi ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said:🔽If it is the mere non-existence of something else, then how could this fault not arise for that?

original: gdon mi za bar smos pa ni /
analyzed: gdon mi za bar smos pa ni /
translated: The expression “undoubtedly” is used because

original: byas pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa la med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyang gnyis ka la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byas pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa la med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyang gnyis ka la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The second reductio argument

original: cha 'ga' yis min zhes pa la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: cha 'ga' yis min zhes pa la sogs pas ni /
translated: The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument

original: me'i ngo bo gang zhig du ba la ldan pa can yin pa de ni du ba'i go bar bya ba ste /🔽me la sogs pa'i ngo bo bzhin /
analyzed: me'i ngo bo gang zhig du ba la ldan pa can yin pa de ni du ba'i go bar bya ba ste / me la sogs pa'i ngo bo bzhin /
translated: The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument

original: 'bar ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo yang de lta bu'o //🔽de bzhin du du ba'i ngo bo gang zhig me dang ldan pa can yin pa de ni mi'i go bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'bar ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo yang de lta bu'o // de bzhin du du ba'i ngo bo gang zhig me dang ldan pa can yin pa de ni mi'i go bar byed pa yin te /
translated: The second reductio argument

original: du ba nyid la sogs pa'i ngo bo bzhin /
analyzed: du ba nyid la sogs pa'i ngo bo bzhin /
translated: The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument

original: rdzas la sogs pa'i ngo bo yang de lta bu'o zhes rang bzhin gyi thal 'gyur gnyis gsungs so //
analyzed: rdzas la sogs pa'i ngo bo yang de lta bu'o zhes rang bzhin gyi thal 'gyur gnyis gsungs so //
translated: The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument🔽The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument

original: 'bar ba la sogs pa'i mnyan bas kyang 'dir de dang ldan pa'i me'i ngo bo kho na gsungs kyi yon tan dang spyi dag ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bar ba la sogs pa'i mnyan bas kyang 'dir de dang ldan pa'i me'i ngo bo kho na gsungs kyi yon tan dang spyi dag ni ma yin te /
translated: The first reductio argument🔽The second reductio argument

original: de dag gi ldan pa can nyid mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi ldan pa can nyid mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible for them to be endowed with those.

original: ji ltar yang zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: ji ltar yang zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: As for “how could it be possible,” etc.,

original: ji skad bshad pa'i skyon ni 'brel pa gzhan la yang bsgres nas ston to //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i skyon ni 'brel pa gzhan la yang bsgres nas ston to //
translated: The previously explained faults are extended to other relations.

original: 'gal ba rnams la srid pa'i phyir //🔽zhes pa srid pa smos pas ni byung zin pa kho na'i 'gal ba la thal bar 'gyur ba 'di ste /
analyzed: 'gal ba rnams la srid pa'i phyir // zhes pa srid pa smos pas ni byung zin pa kho na'i 'gal ba la thal bar 'gyur ba 'di ste /
translated: Because of the possibility of contradiction,

original: ma byung ba la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ma byung ba la ni ma yin te /
translated: The word “possibility” indicates that this consequence applies only to that which is already arisen, not to that which is not arisen.

original: de la spyi dang khyad par mi 'thad pa'i phyir zhes ston to //
analyzed: de la spyi dang khyad par mi 'thad pa'i phyir zhes ston to //
translated: Because a universal and a particular are untenable with respect to that.

original: rtags kyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /🔽rtags kyi steng du ba la sogs @113a * //
analyzed: rtags kyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste / rtags kyi steng du ba la sogs @113a * //
translated: As for “the sign,” etc.,🔽The universal and particular of the sign, such as smoke,

original: pa'i gzhan dang spyi gang yin pa rdzas nyid la sogs pa'i ngo bo dang / gang yang 'bar ba la sogs pa khyad par rnams te /
analyzed: pa'i gzhan dang spyi gang yin pa rdzas nyid la sogs pa'i ngo bo dang / gang yang 'bar ba la sogs pa khyad par rnams te /
translated: are the nature of substance, etc., and the particulars, such as burning, etc.

original: de gnyis ka la yang gsal bar byed pa dang gsal bar bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gnyis ka la yang gsal bar byed pa dang gsal bar bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Neither of those two is manifested.

original: 'dir yang bar chod pa sprel bar blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang bar chod pa sprel bar blta bar bya ste /
translated: Here, too, the intervening words should be supplied.

original: rtags ni gzhan dang thun mong dang // rtags can gyi ni khyad par rnams //
analyzed: rtags ni gzhan dang thun mong dang // rtags can gyi ni khyad par rnams //
translated: The mark is common to others, and the distinction of the marked.

original: gsal byed gsal bya min zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gsal byed gsal bya min zhes pa'o //
translated: The manifestor is not the manifested.

original: sdeb sbyor gyi ngor de ltar klags pa'o //
analyzed: sdeb sbyor gyi ngor de ltar klags pa'o //
translated: This is read in the light of prosody.

original: gzhan la ste bye brag pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ltar na'o //
analyzed: gzhan la ste bye brag pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ltar na'o //
translated: According to others, i.e., the Vaiśeṣikas, etc.

original: rnam pa kun du thal bar 'gyur te gsal byed dang gsal bya'i ldan pa la sogs pa'i 'brel pa khyad par med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa kun du thal bar 'gyur te gsal byed dang gsal bya'i ldan pa la sogs pa'i 'brel pa khyad par med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: It follows in every way, because the relation of the manifestor and the manifested, etc., is not distinguished.

original: ldan pa can tsam rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ldan pa can gyi rnam pa tsam gyis rjes su dpag par bya ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: ldan pa can tsam rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ldan pa can gyi rnam pa tsam gyis rjes su dpag par bya ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It follows that mere possession is understood, i.e., the inferential mark would apprehend the object of inference by the mere form of possession.

original: 'di ga las she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di ga las she na gsungs pa /
translated: From where is this? It is said:

original: gzhan du na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Otherwise, etc.

original: 'brel pa'i rjes su mthun par rtags kyis rtags can go bar byed do //
analyzed: 'brel pa'i rjes su mthun par rtags kyis rtags can go bar byed do //
translated: The mark makes the marked understood in accordance with the relation.

original: de'i phyir ldan pa'i dbang gis rtags kyis rtogs par byed par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de'i phyir ldan pa'i dbang gis rtags kyis rtogs par byed par 'gyur zhing /
translated: Therefore, the mark would make understood by the power of possession.

original: ldan pa can gyi ngo bor bzung ba de'i ngo bo kho nas rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ldan pa can gyi ngo bor bzung ba de'i ngo bo kho nas rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: It is understood by the nature of that which is the possessor,

original: ldan pa can nyid ni ldan pa can gzhan la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ldan pa can nyid ni ldan pa can gzhan la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the possessor itself depends on another possessor.

original: de skad du yang bshad pa /
analyzed: de skad du yang bshad pa /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: gang 'di 'di'i ldan pa can du rab tu grub cing the tshom med par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gang 'di 'di'i ldan pa can du rab tu grub cing the tshom med par 'gyur na /
translated: If this is well established as the possessor of that, and is without doubt,

original: de nas 'di'i 'brel pa can 'dzin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nas 'di'i 'brel pa can 'dzin pa'i phyir /
translated: then, because of the apprehension of its relation,

original: 'brel pa can gzung ba ma yin pa la yang rjes su nges par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa can gzung ba ma yin pa la yang rjes su nges par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: it is ascertained as the apprehended of the relation, even though it is not apprehended.

original: 'dir 'gyur mod me'i ngo bo kho nas ldan pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir 'gyur mod me'i ngo bo kho nas ldan pa ste /
translated: This is true, but the possessor is only the nature of fire.

original: de'i phyir de'i ngo bos kyang rtogs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i ngo bos kyang rtogs so //
translated: Therefore, it is understood by its nature.

original: gang yang de nas 'di'i zhes pa la sogs pa bshad pa de la /
analyzed: gang yang de nas 'di'i zhes pa la sogs pa bshad pa de la /
translated: Also, what was said, “then, its relation,” and so on,

original: 'brel pa can la zhes pa 'dis khyad par kho na la mchog tu snyegs pa ste /
analyzed: 'brel pa can la zhes pa 'dis khyad par kho na la mchog tu snyegs pa ste /
translated: by this “its relation” he is only seeking a distinction.

original: ldan pa can yan lag can gyi ngo bo tsam ni ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ldan pa can yan lag can gyi ngo bo tsam ni ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is not the mere nature of the possessor, the whole.

original: 'dir yang ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: He says, “It is not so here,” and so on.

original: yang na dogs par ma byas nas /
analyzed: yang na dogs par ma byas nas /
translated: Or, without being suspected,

original: phyogs snga ma la skyon gzhan kho na 'dis gsungs so //
analyzed: phyogs snga ma la skyon gzhan kho na 'dis gsungs so //
translated: the opponent is shown to have another fault.

original: gal te du bas ldan pa can gyis me yod pa nyid sgrub par byed na /
analyzed: gal te du bas ldan pa can gyis me yod pa nyid sgrub par byed na /
translated: If the existence of fire is established by the possession of smoke,

original: me dang du ba ldan pa ni rjes su dpog pa la yan lag tu 'gyur na /
analyzed: me dang du ba ldan pa ni rjes su dpog pa la yan lag tu 'gyur na /
translated: then the possession of fire and smoke would be a part of the inference.

original: 'dir ni bsgrub par bya ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni bsgrub par bya ba yang ma yin te /
translated: But here it is not the probandum.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: @113b gsungs pa /
analyzed: @113b gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: de rtogs zin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de rtogs zin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'o //
translated: because it is already understood.

original: 'o na ci bsgrub par bya ba yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na ci bsgrub par bya ba yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: But if it is not the probandum, what is the probandum? It is said:

original: gang du ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang du ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Where? and so on.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'dir 'di zhes pa'i tshig las 'dir gyi sgras 'dir yul gyi rten nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'di zhes pa'i tshig las 'dir gyi sgras 'dir yul gyi rten nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Here, the word here should be understood as the basis of the object.

original: 'o na rten ni spyi yin zhing /
analyzed: 'o na rten ni spyi yin zhing /
translated: But if the basis is the universal,

original: 'dir zhes pa'i tshig gis bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: 'dir zhes pa'i tshig gis bsgrub par bya ba yin na /
translated: and the word here is the probandum,

original: de la de las khyad par rtogs pa ga las yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la de las khyad par rtogs pa ga las yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: how is the particular understood from that? It is said:

original: rnam pa gzhan du na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Otherwise, etc.

original: 'dis ni khyad par don gzhan nyid mi srid par gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dis ni khyad par don gzhan nyid mi srid par gsal bar byed do //
translated: This makes it clear that a difference in meaning is not possible.

original: gang du 'dir zhes pa'i tshig 'di don gzhan mi srid pa yin pa der /
analyzed: gang du 'dir zhes pa'i tshig 'di don gzhan mi srid pa yin pa der /
translated: Where the word “here” is used, it is not possible for there to be a different meaning.

original: rab tu 'jug pa'i rten brjod par 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: rab tu 'jug pa'i rten brjod par 'dod pa yin te /
translated: The basis of the application is what is intended to be expressed.

original: dper na 'di khron pa zhes pa'i ngag la bzhin /
analyzed: dper na 'di khron pa zhes pa'i ngag la bzhin /
translated: For example, it is like the statement, “This is a well.”

original: 'dir me zhes pa 'di la yang 'dir zhes pa'i tshig ni don gzhan mi srid pa can yin no //
analyzed: 'dir me zhes pa 'di la yang 'dir zhes pa'i tshig ni don gzhan mi srid pa can yin no //
translated: Here, in the statement, “This is fire,” the word “here” has no different meaning.🔽The result.

original: 'bras bu'o // 'o na khyad par ma grub pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'bras bu'o // 'o na khyad par ma grub pa ma yin nam /
translated: “But isn’t the difference not established?🔽Because it is just smoke that is intended to be expressed by this ‘here.’”

original: du ba kho na 'dir zhes pa 'dis brjod par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: du ba kho na 'dir zhes pa 'dis brjod par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: He says:

original: du ba la me zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: du ba la me zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “The fire is in the smoke,” etc.

original: dam bca'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can kho na gtan tshigs nyid du mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam bca'i don gyi phyogs gcig nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can kho na gtan tshigs nyid du mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Only one part of the thesis is the subject of the probandum itself, because it is explicitly stated as the reason.

original: 'o na khyad par dam bca'i phyogs gcig yin la /
analyzed: 'o na khyad par dam bca'i phyogs gcig yin la /
translated: Well, then, the particular is one part of the thesis,

original: spyi gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: spyi gtan tshigs te /
translated: and the universal is the reason.

original: des na skyon 'di ga las yin zhe na /
analyzed: des na skyon 'di ga las yin zhe na /
translated: So, where does this fault come from?

original: 'di ltar sems te /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems te /
translated: It is thought in this way:

original: me dang du ba dag gi ldan pa 'brel par 'dod pas gtan tshigs kyang khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid kho nar khas blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: me dang du ba dag gi ldan pa 'brel par 'dod pas gtan tshigs kyang khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid kho nar khas blang bar bya ste /
translated: Since the possession, the connection, of fire and smoke is accepted, the reason must be accepted as having the nature of the particular alone,

original: spyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi ni ma yin no //
translated: not as the universal.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na rdzas dag kho na phan tshun ldan pa mi srid par 'gyur na /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na rdzas dag kho na phan tshun ldan pa mi srid par 'gyur na /
translated: Otherwise, it would be impossible for substances to possess each other.

original: gang gi phyir 'di ni bstan bcos su 'dod pas yang ngo //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di ni bstan bcos su 'dod pas yang ngo //
translated: Since this is accepted in the treatise, it is also so.

original: de las kyang dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang dam bca' ba'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: And from that, one part of the meaning of the thesis becomes the reason.

original: 'dir yang 'di brjod par bya ba kho na ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang 'di brjod par bya ba kho na ste /
translated: Here, this is just to be stated:

original: 'dir me yod pa bsgrub par bya ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir me yod pa bsgrub par bya ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Here, the existence of fire is not the probandum,

original: de ni rtogs zin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rtogs zin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: because that is already understood.

original: lan de brjod par bya ba yin du zad mod /
analyzed: lan de brjod par bya ba yin du zad mod /
translated: That answer is just to be stated.

original: gang la ji skad bshad pa'i skyon las grol pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang la ji skad bshad pa'i skyon las grol pa ma yin no //
translated: But it is not free from the fault explained above.

original: 'dir ni du ba'i khyad par la yang me bsgrub par bya ba la /
analyzed: 'dir ni du ba'i khyad par la yang me bsgrub par bya ba la /
translated: Here, in the proof of fire from the particular smoke,

original: skyon dang bcas pa de'i gnas skabs kho na'o //
analyzed: skyon dang bcas pa de'i gnas skabs kho na'o //
translated: it is only the case that it has a fault.

original: de'i phyir 'di'i lan ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di'i lan ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this is not an answer.

original: gal te @114a * //
analyzed: gal te @114a * //
translated: If that is so,

original: de ltan rdzas dag kho na'i phan tshun ni ldan pa'o zhes pa gzhung lugs te /
analyzed: de ltan rdzas dag kho na'i phan tshun ni ldan pa'o zhes pa gzhung lugs te /
translated: the doctrine is that only substances are mutually concomitant.

original: 'o na de lta na me yang khyad par kho na rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rnam grangs pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khas blang bar bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na de lta na me yang khyad par kho na rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rnam grangs pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khas blang bar bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: Well then, in that case, is it not the case that fire is also only a particular that is a synonym of its own characteristic that is to be proven?

original: de las kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed ba dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs thams cad thun mong ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed ba dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid yin pa nyid kyi phyir gtan tshigs thams cad thun mong ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: And also in that case, because the thesis and the reason are of the nature of their own characteristics, all reasons would be unshared.

original: dpe yang bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dang bral ba'o zhe na /
analyzed: dpe yang bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dang bral ba'o zhe na /
translated: And the example would be free from the probandum and the proof.

original: 'di ni bden te /
analyzed: 'di ni bden te /
translated: This is true.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: de'i phyir rtags dang rtags can dag gdon mi za bar ldan ba ma yin gyi zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir rtags dang rtags can dag gdon mi za bar ldan ba ma yin gyi zhes pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the reason and the property to be proven are not necessarily related.

original: 'dir khas blang bar bya'o zhes brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir khas blang bar bya'o zhes brtag par bya ste /
translated: Here, one should accept that

original: gang gi phyir ldan pa'i 'brel pa la de lta bu'i skyon yin pa de'i phyir rtags dang rtags can dag ldan pa'i 'brel pa can du khas blang bar bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ldan pa'i 'brel pa la de lta bu'i skyon yin pa de'i phyir rtags dang rtags can dag ldan pa'i 'brel pa can du khas blang bar bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: because there is such a fault in the relation of inherence, therefore the reason and the property to be proven are not to be accepted as having the relation of inherence.

original: gdon mi za ba smos pas ni nges par gzung ba bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gdon mi za ba smos pas ni nges par gzung ba bstan pa'o //
translated: The expression “necessarily” indicates that it is definite.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid kho na zhes pa /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid kho na zhes pa /
translated: It is just the relation of invariable concomitance.

original: de la skyon med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de la skyon med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no fault in that.

original: 'o na yang de yang skyon dang bcas pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na yang de yang skyon dang bcas pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: But isn’t that also faulty?

original: ma khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: ma khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not universal.

original: gang phyir de thams cad kyi tshe rtags la 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin pas te /
analyzed: gang phyir de thams cad kyi tshe rtags la 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin pas te /
translated: Because it is not the case that it occurs in the reason at all times.

original: de ltar ni mes stong pa'i yul dang dus dag na yang 'ga' zhig gi tshe du ba nye bar dmigs pas so zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar ni mes stong pa'i yul dang dus dag na yang 'ga' zhig gi tshe du ba nye bar dmigs pas so zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: The response is:

original: yul dang las la ltos pa ni //
analyzed: yul dang las la ltos pa ni //
translated: “In dependence on a place and time,

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /🔽ji tsam gyi yul du du ba me med par mthong ba ma yin pa de la ltos pas med na mi 'byung ba nyid du 'gyur la /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste / ji tsam gyi yul du du ba me med par mthong ba ma yin pa de la ltos pas med na mi 'byung ba nyid du 'gyur la /
translated: and in dependence on a cause,🔽smoke is observed as not arising without fire.”🔽To the extent that a place is seen as not having fire, to that extent smoke is observed as not arising without fire.

original: dus ji tsam gyis te /
analyzed: dus ji tsam gyis te /
translated: To the extent that a time is seen as not having fire, to that extent smoke is observed as not arising without fire.

original: gtsub ba shing gtsubs pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs na'o //
analyzed: gtsub ba shing gtsubs pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs na'o //
translated: For example, in the state of rubbing sticks together, and so on.

original: sogs pa'i sgras de las gzhan pa'i gnas skabs me nye bar gyur pa na yang /
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras de las gzhan pa'i gnas skabs me nye bar gyur pa na yang /
translated: The word “and so on” indicates other states in which fire is present.

original: du ba me dang med na mi 'byung bar nye bar dmigs pa ni de la ltos pas med na mi 'byung ba nyid do //
analyzed: du ba me dang med na mi 'byung bar nye bar dmigs pa ni de la ltos pas med na mi 'byung ba nyid do //
translated: Smoke is observed as not arising without fire.

original: 'du ba yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'du ba yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The response to “But when they are assembled…” is:

original: gang 'brel pa nye bar ma dmigs pa 'di ni rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: gang 'brel pa nye bar ma dmigs pa 'di ni rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu ma yin te /
translated: “That which is not observed to be related is not a cause of inference.

original: dper na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po rab tu ma grub pa 'ga' zhig dag gi bzhin /
analyzed: dper na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po rab tu ma grub pa 'ga' zhig dag gi bzhin /
translated: For example, like some things whose causal and resultant entities are not established at all.🔽And the collection is not established at all.

original: 'du ba yang rab tu ma grub pa'o zhes pa khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'du ba yang rab tu ma grub pa'o zhes pa khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa gsungs pa'o //
translated: This is the statement of the non-observation of the pervader.

original: 'brel pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa dpe gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa dpe gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: “The connection” and so on clarify the example.

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa @114b 'di nyid kyi rnam par 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa @114b 'di nyid kyi rnam par 'brel pa'o //
translated: “It is not” and so on is the connection with this very [verse].

original: rtogs pa med pa'i yang zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rtogs pa med pa'i yang zhes pa ste /
translated: “Even without” is the understanding.

original: gang zhig gi yang 'du ba can gyi yul can rtogs pa yod pa ma yin pa de'i yang rva la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gang zhig gi yang 'du ba can gyi yul can rtogs pa yod pa ma yin pa de'i yang rva la sogs pa la /
translated: Even for one who does not have the object of the collection, the understanding, horns and so on,

original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid dran pa las ba lang la sogs pa yang dag par rtogs par mthong ngo //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid dran pa las ba lang la sogs pa yang dag par rtogs par mthong ngo //
translated: when the invariable concomitance is remembered, one sees the correct understanding of cows and so on.

original: de'i phyir med na mi 'byung ba nyid kho na rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir med na mi 'byung ba nyid kho na rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu yin te /
translated: Therefore, only the invariable concomitance is the cause of inference,

original: de yod pa'i dngos po dag de dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de yod pa'i dngos po dag de dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because those things that exist have that [invariable concomitance] alone.

original: myu gu'i sa bon bzhin no //
analyzed: myu gu'i sa bon bzhin no //
translated: Like a sprout and a seed.

original: 'di la yang de kho na zhes pa la sogs pas don gcig la 'du ba la 'du ba'i skyon dang ldan pa nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di la yang de kho na zhes pa la sogs pas don gcig la 'du ba la 'du ba'i skyon dang ldan pa nyid du gsungs so //
translated: Here, “in that case” and so on state the error of aggregation with respect to a single object.

original: 'dir yang zhes pa la sogs pas kyang ldan pa'i skyon dang ldan pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes pa la sogs pas kyang ldan pa'i skyon dang ldan pa nyid du'o //
translated: Here, “in that case” and so on also state the error of aggregation.

original: der 'gyur mod /
analyzed: der 'gyur mod /
translated: That is so.

original: yod pa ma yin pa dang the tshom za ba ni bstan pa ma yin no zhes dmigs bsal yod do //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa dang the tshom za ba ni bstan pa ma yin no zhes dmigs bsal yod do //
translated: But it is not taught that what is nonexistent or doubtful is to be observed.

original: de'i phyir gzugs ni reg bya la rlung las rjes su dpag pa ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs ni reg bya la rlung las rjes su dpag pa ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, form is not inferred from the tactile.

original: 'khrul pa nyid na yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid na yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: To respond, Nāgārjuna explains, “Even if there were error,” and so on.

original: rgyu'i rgyu las zhes pa /
analyzed: rgyu'i rgyu las zhes pa /
translated: “From the cause of the cause” means

original: lus kyi rgyu ni mgo bo yin la /
analyzed: lus kyi rgyu ni mgo bo yin la /
translated: the cause of the body is the head.

original: de'i yang rgyu ni rang gi cha shas dpral ba'o //
analyzed: de'i yang rgyu ni rang gi cha shas dpral ba'o //
translated: The cause of that is its part, the forehead.

original: de las kyang rgyu'i rgyu las 'bras bu'i 'bras bu lus la yang dag par rtogs pa mthong ste /
analyzed: de las kyang rgyu'i rgyu las 'bras bu'i 'bras bu lus la yang dag par rtogs pa mthong ste /
translated: From the cause of the cause, the effect of the effect, the body, is seen to be fully understood.

original: yang lus dang mgo bo'i cha shas ni don gcig la 'du ba ci ltar yin /
analyzed: yang lus dang mgo bo'i cha shas ni don gcig la 'du ba ci ltar yin /
translated: But how could the body and the head be the same thing?

original: ji tsam gyis tshig rnam par sbyar ba tha dad pa las don gcig la 'du ba can rnam pa gnyis su bstan to //
analyzed: ji tsam gyis tshig rnam par sbyar ba tha dad pa las don gcig la 'du ba can rnam pa gnyis su bstan to //
translated: By how much is it shown that there are two kinds of unities, that of the word and that of the object?

original: don gcig gis 'du ba zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ba gzhan la brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gcig gis 'du ba zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ba gzhan la brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The unity of the object is the basis of the other unities of words.

original: de ltar ni mgo bo don gcig yin zhing des kyang de gnyis ka dag gi yang 'du ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar ni mgo bo don gcig yin zhing des kyang de gnyis ka dag gi yang 'du ba'o //
translated: The head is one object, and it is the unity of both of them.

original: ji skad du smras pa zhes pa /
analyzed: ji skad du smras pa zhes pa /
translated: As it is said:

original: de'i tshig kho na shes par byed par gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i tshig kho na shes par byed par gsungs so //
translated: The word itself is the means of knowing that.

original: gang zhig la 'di rab tu grub pa dang the tshom med par gyur te /
analyzed: gang zhig la 'di rab tu grub pa dang the tshom med par gyur te /
translated: When one has no doubt about the establishment of that,

original: mgo bo la sogs pa 'di rnams lus ma brtsams pa rnams su 'gyur ba ma yin la /
analyzed: mgo bo la sogs pa 'di rnams lus ma brtsams pa rnams su 'gyur ba ma yin la /
translated: then the head and so on will not be uncombined in the body.

original: 'di rnams zhig na lus mi 'jig pa srid pa yang ma yin zhing /
analyzed: 'di rnams zhig na lus mi 'jig pa srid pa yang ma yin zhing /
translated: And when they are destroyed, it is not possible that the body will not be destroyed.

original: mgo po la sogs pa ma zhig pa na /
analyzed: mgo po la sogs pa ma zhig pa na /
translated: And when the head and so on are not destroyed,🔽it is not the case that the body will be dismembered.

original: de'i yan lag rnams rnam par 'gyes par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no zhes pa de la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i yan lag rnams rnam par 'gyes par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no zhes pa de la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: In this way, one will understand that.

original: lus su 'gyur te /
analyzed: lus su 'gyur te /
translated: It becomes the body.

original: gang zhig gi 'di ni yan lag dang yan lag yin pa'o zhes par ro //
analyzed: gang zhig gi 'di ni yan lag dang yan lag yin pa'o zhes par ro //
translated: It is said that this is the member and the members.

original: 'di'i phyir rnam pa gnyis kho na'o zhes nges par gzung bar bya ba ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i phyir rnam pa gnyis kho na'o zhes nges par gzung bar bya ba ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not to be ascertained that there are only two kinds.
Well then,

original: mthong ba zhig pa'i mgo bo de kho na las yang dag par rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: mthong ba zhig pa'i mgo bo de kho na las yang dag par rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: the head of one who has seen a ghost is understood to be just that,

original: de'i cha shas las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i cha shas las ni ma yin no //
translated: but not from a part of it.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: ma gyur pa las zhes pa ste /
analyzed: ma gyur pa las zhes pa ste /
translated: “not from what is not.”

original: ma yin te med pa rgyu nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir na shin tu med pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ma yin te med pa rgyu nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir na shin tu med pa bzhin no //
translated: It is not so, because it is not logical that what does not exist is a cause, like what is utterly nonexistent.

original: 'gal ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa nges par bsal ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'gal ba ni rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa nges par bsal ba'i ched du gsungs pa /
translated: The contradiction is the cause of inference. In order to definitely eliminate that, it is said:

original: gang zhig 'gal ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig 'gal ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “That which is contradictory…” and so on.

original: rlung dang sprin yang dag par sbyor ba ni char pa'i las dang 'gal ba zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rlung dang sprin yang dag par sbyor ba ni char pa'i las dang 'gal ba zhes pa ni /
translated: The conjunction of wind and clouds is contradictory to the action of rain,

original: de dag lhan cig mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag lhan cig mi gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they do not coexist.

original: 'dir char pa'i las rtags kyang ma yin gyi zhes pa de dang 'gal ba'i chos sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir char pa'i las rtags kyang ma yin gyi zhes pa de dang 'gal ba'i chos sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, it is not the case that the sign is the absence of the effect of rain, because it proves a property that is contrary to that.

original: 'o na ci zhen de med pa yin no zhes pa /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhen de med pa yin no zhes pa /
translated: What, then, is it? It is the absence of that.

original: rlung dang sprin yang dag par sbyor ba yod na /
analyzed: rlung dang sprin yang dag par sbyor ba yod na /
translated: When there is a conjunction of wind and clouds,

original: char pa'i las med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: char pa'i las med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: there is no effect of rain.

original: char pa'i las med pa dang rlung sprin sbyor ba dag 'gal ba yang ma yin no zhes pa lhan cig gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: char pa'i las med pa dang rlung sprin sbyor ba dag 'gal ba yang ma yin no zhes pa lhan cig gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The absence of the effect of rain and the conjunction of wind and clouds are not contradictory, because they coexist.

original: 'dir 'gyur mod /
analyzed: 'dir 'gyur mod /
translated: This is possible,

original: char pa'i las kyi med pa gang yin pa de ni de kho na'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par te /
analyzed: char pa'i las kyi med pa gang yin pa de ni de kho na'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par te /
translated: but the absence of the effect of rain is a particular state of that very [conjunction of wind and clouds].

original: de las char pa'i las kho na'i gnas skabs thob pa ni rtags so zhe na /
analyzed: de las char pa'i las kho na'i gnas skabs thob pa ni rtags so zhe na /
translated: The state that is obtained from that alone, the effect of rain, is the sign.

original: yang ci ltar med pa ni yod pa'i khyad par yin zhing /
analyzed: yang ci ltar med pa ni yod pa'i khyad par yin zhing /
translated: But how can absence be a particular of existence?

original: de'i khyad par nyid yin na yang med pa kho nar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i khyad par nyid yin na yang med pa kho nar mi 'gyur te /
translated: And if it is a particular of that, it cannot be just absence,

original: khyad par ni dngos po'i bdag nyid du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par ni dngos po'i bdag nyid du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because a particular is just the nature of an entity.

original: don gzhan pa nyid na yang skyon de kho na ste /
analyzed: don gzhan pa nyid na yang skyon de kho na ste /
translated: If they are different objects, then that fault is just the same.

original: gang zhig 'gal ba de rtags min zhes pa 'di lan med pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig 'gal ba de rtags min zhes pa 'di lan med pa'o //
translated: The response to the statement “Whatever is contradictory is not a reason” is that this is not a response.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang brjod pa bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang brjod pa bya'o zhe na /
translated: The same should be said of the other.

original: gang du ma gyur brtags yin pa der yang rlung dan sprin yang dag par ldan pa med pa ni char ba'i las med pa dang 'gal pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang du ma gyur brtags yin pa der yang rlung dan sprin yang dag par ldan pa med pa ni char ba'i las med pa dang 'gal pa'i phyir /
translated: In the case of a place where there is no rain, the absence of a combination of wind and clouds is not contradictory with the absence of the activity of rain.

original: 'dir char pa'i las med pa ni rtags kyang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dir char pa'i las med pa ni rtags kyang ma yin gyi /
translated: Here, the absence of the activity of rain is not a reason,

original: 'o na ci zhe na char pa'i las so //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na char pa'i las so //
translated: but rather what? The absence of the activity of rain.

original: char pa'i las dang rlung dang sprin yang dag par ldan pa med pa dag 'gal ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: char pa'i las dang rlung dang sprin yang dag par ldan pa med pa dag 'gal ba yang ma yin no //
translated: The absence of a combination of wind and clouds and the absence of the activity of rain are not contradictory.

original: de bzhin du byung ba byung ba'i zhes pa 'dir yang gsher ba nyid kyi las rlan pa ni chu lon 'ching ba dang 'gal ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du byung ba byung ba'i zhes pa 'dir yang gsher ba nyid kyi las rlan pa ni chu lon 'ching ba dang 'gal ba ste /
translated: In the same way, here in the case of the arising of what has arisen, the activity of wetness, which is moisture, is contradictory with the binding of a dyke.

original: rlan pa yang rtags ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rlan pa yang rtags ma yin gyi /
translated: Moisture is not a reason,

original: 'o na ci zhes na de med pa'o //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhes na de med pa'o //
translated: but rather what? Its absence.

original: de bzhin du ma byung ba ma byung ba'i zhes pa 'dir yang ljang gu nyid dang me dang yang dag par ldan pa dag 'gal ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du ma byung ba ma byung ba'i zhes pa 'dir yang ljang gu nyid dang me dang yang dag par ldan pa dag 'gal ba ste /
translated: So too, here, the non-arisen and the non-arisen are contradictory, as is the green and the fire.

original: 'dir de dag rtags dang rtags can gyi dngos po yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir de dag rtags dang rtags can gyi dngos po yang ma yin te /
translated: Here, they are not the entity of the reason and the property to be established.

original: @115b 'o na ci zhe na de ldog pa dag go //
analyzed: @115b 'o na ci zhe na de ldog pa dag go //
translated: What are they? They are the negations of those.

original: gang bshad pa yang zhes pa /
analyzed: gang bshad pa yang zhes pa /
translated: What was explained as “and so on” is:

original: yod pa ni mi rtag pa ste rdzas bzhin /
analyzed: yod pa ni mi rtag pa ste rdzas bzhin /
translated: The existent is impermanent, like the four substances.

original: 'bras bu ni rgyu ste spyi dang khyad par bzhin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni rgyu ste spyi dang khyad par bzhin zhes pa'o //
translated: The effect is the cause, like the universal and the particular.

original: rdzas dang yon tan dang las rnams khyad par med pa'o zhes pa'i tshig las /
analyzed: rdzas dang yon tan dang las rnams khyad par med pa'o zhes pa'i tshig las /
translated: The words “there is no difference between substances, qualities, and actions”

original: bstan bcos su rdzas dang yon tan dang las rnams kho na rgyu'i dngos por bshad do //
analyzed: bstan bcos su rdzas dang yon tan dang las rnams kho na rgyu'i dngos por bshad do //
translated: explain in the treatise that only substances, qualities, and actions are the nature of causes.

original: 'dir yang ma byung ba ni byung ba'i zhes pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: 'dir yang ma byung ba ni byung ba'i zhes pa la sogs pas /
translated: Here, the non-arisen and the arisen, and so on,

original: dngos po med pa rgyur brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po med pa rgyur brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: explain non-entity as the cause.

original: ci ltar dngos po med pa dngos po'i rtags yin zhes dris pa'o //
analyzed: ci ltar dngos po med pa dngos po'i rtags yin zhes dris pa'o //
translated: How can a non-entity be the reason for an entity?

original: dngos po med pa dngos po'i rtags su kho bo cag smra ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dngos po med pa dngos po'i rtags su kho bo cag smra ba ma yin gyi /
translated: We do not say that a non-entity is the evidence of an entity.

original: 'o na ci zhe nam byung ba la sogs pa rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe nam byung ba la sogs pa rtogs pa'o //
translated: What, then, is it? It is the realization of what has occurred, etc.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dmigs kyis bstan pa ni rab tu grags pa sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs kyis bstan pa ni rab tu grags pa sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: The specification is because of the prior possession of what is well known.

original: gang zhig gi du ba me'i yang dag par ldan pa can no zhes sngar 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i dus na rab tu grub par 'gyur ba de kho na'i du ba mthong ba las me la rjes su dpag pa ste /
analyzed: gang zhig gi du ba me'i yang dag par ldan pa can no zhes sngar 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i dus na rab tu grub par 'gyur ba de kho na'i du ba mthong ba las me la rjes su dpag pa ste /
translated: That smoke which is the possessor of the right connection with fire is well established at the time of the prior apprehension of the connection. Only from seeing that smoke is there an inference of fire.

original: cig shos kyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: cig shos kyi ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not from any other.

original: de'i phyir du ba la sogs pa rtogs pa kho na rtags so //🔽de'i yul can la ni rtag pa nyid nye bar brtags pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir du ba la sogs pa rtogs pa kho na rtags so // de'i yul can la ni rtag pa nyid nye bar brtags pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the realization of smoke, etc. is just the evidence.

original: dper na tsandan gyi zho cha zhes pa bzhin no //🔽'brel pa med phyir rtags blo min //
analyzed: dper na tsandan gyi zho cha zhes pa bzhin no // 'brel pa med phyir rtags blo min //
translated: The imputation of permanence to its subject is like the expression “the milk of the sandalwood tree.”

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: It is not evidence because of the absence of a connection.

original: gang zhig gang dang lhan cig 'brel pa med pa de ni de'i rtags ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang dang lhan cig 'brel pa med pa de ni de'i rtags ma yin te /
translated: That which is not connected with something is not the evidence of that.

original: dper na bum pa ni snam bu'i bzhin te /
analyzed: dper na bum pa ni snam bu'i bzhin te /
translated: For example, a pot is not like a cloth.

original: rtags can yang rtags kyi blo dang 'brel ba med do zhes pa khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rtags can yang rtags kyi blo dang 'brel ba med do zhes pa khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa gsungs so //
translated: And a sign is not related to the cognition of the sign.

original: 'brel pa'i don yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'brel pa'i don yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The meaning of relation is stated in the following:

original: bdag nyid la rab tu grub pa zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: bdag nyid la rab tu grub pa zhes brjod pa na /
translated: When it is said that something is established for oneself,

original: pha rol pos brjod pa ni bdag nyid la rab tu grub pa'i rtags ma yin te /
analyzed: pha rol pos brjod pa ni bdag nyid la rab tu grub pa'i rtags ma yin te /
translated: the opponent says that a sign is not established for oneself,

original: gzhan nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is different.

original: don gzhan gyis don gzhan rtogs par byed pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: don gzhan gyis don gzhan rtogs par byed pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: This is because one thing does not cause the cognition of another thing,

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that would lead to absurd consequences.

original: de'i phyir mdo 'di nye bar bkod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir mdo 'di nye bar bkod do //
translated: Therefore, this sutra is cited.

original: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: thams cad ni don gzhan gyi rtags ma yin gyi /
analyzed: thams cad ni don gzhan gyi rtags ma yin gyi /
translated: Not all signs are different from the object.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: gang kho na rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i 'brel pa rnams las gang yang rung bas 'brel par gyur pa de kho na dmigs kyis bstan pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gang kho na rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i 'brel pa rnams las gang yang rung bas 'brel par gyur pa de kho na dmigs kyis bstan pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Whatever is related to cause and effect, etc., by any relation, that alone is indicated.

original: rtags las byung bar bstan pa'i phyir //🔽zhes pa / rtags las byung ba zhes pa'i tshig las mdo 'dir rtags kyi @116a * //
analyzed: rtags las byung bar bstan pa'i phyir // zhes pa / rtags las byung ba zhes pa'i tshig las mdo 'dir rtags kyi @116a * //
translated: In order to show that it arises from a reason,🔽he says,🔽arising from a reason.

original: shes pas ni rtags las byung ba nyid du nges par bstan la /
analyzed: shes pas ni rtags las byung ba nyid du nges par bstan la /
translated: From the words arising from a reason, it is ascertained in this sūtra that it arises from a reason.

original: de las de rtags nyid du dam bcas pa la khas blangs pas gnod pa'o //
analyzed: de las de rtags nyid du dam bcas pa la khas blangs pas gnod pa'o //
translated: From that, it is contradicted by the acceptance of the thesis that it is a reason.

original: ci ste rjes su dpag par bya ba'i shes pa 'dir rtags las byung ba nyid du nges par bstan par sems kyi /
analyzed: ci ste rjes su dpag par bya ba'i shes pa 'dir rtags las byung ba nyid du nges par bstan par sems kyi /
translated: But if you think that the cognition of the inferential object is ascertained here as arising from a reason,

original: rtags kyi shes pa ni ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: rtags kyi shes pa ni ma yin no zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: but the cognition of the reason is not, he says,

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i shes pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i shes pa ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The cognition of the inferential object... and so on.

original: gal te rtags kyi shes pa rtags las byung bar 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te rtags kyi shes pa rtags las byung bar 'dod na /
translated: If you assert that the cognition of the reason arises from a reason,🔽then

original: de lta na rjes su dpag par bya ba'i shes pa 'di la 'bras bu dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na rjes su dpag par bya ba'i shes pa 'di la 'bras bu dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, this knowledge of the object inferred would be devoid of effect.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i shes pa rtags las byung ba nyid na ni /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i shes pa rtags las byung ba nyid na ni /
translated: If the knowledge of the object inferred arises from the evidence,

original: de skyes pa ni don de rtogs zin to zhes pas 'bras bu med pa'o //
analyzed: de skyes pa ni don de rtogs zin to zhes pas 'bras bu med pa'o //
translated: then, since it is already known that the object is understood when it arises, it would be without effect.

original: de'i phyir de kho na khas blangs pas gnod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de kho na khas blangs pas gnod pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is undermined by the acceptance of reality.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: This may be so,

original: rtags kyi shes pa ni rtags yin la /
analyzed: rtags kyi shes pa ni rtags yin la /
translated: but the knowledge of the evidence is the evidence,

original: 'brel ba dran pa ni rtags las byung ba ste /
analyzed: 'brel ba dran pa ni rtags las byung ba ste /
translated: and the recollection of the relation is what arises from the evidence,

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs pa ni 'bras bu'o zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs pa ni 'bras bu'o zhe na /
translated: and the understanding of the object inferred is the effect.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /🔽dran pa tsam zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa / dran pa tsam zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: gal te 'brel pa dran pa tshad ma yin pa de ltar gyur na gang yang rtags ma mthong ba des kyang du ba'i 'brel pa dran pa las me rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'brel pa dran pa tshad ma yin pa de ltar gyur na gang yang rtags ma mthong ba des kyang du ba'i 'brel pa dran pa las me rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the mere recollection were the valid cognition, then even one who does not see the evidence would understand fire from the recollection of the relation with smoke.

original: tsam gyi sgra ni du ba mthong ba bsal ba'i ched du'o //
analyzed: tsam gyi sgra ni du ba mthong ba bsal ba'i ched du'o //
translated: The word 'mere' is for the purpose of excluding the seeing of smoke.

original: de dang bcas pa'i 'brel pas dran pa ni rjes su dpog par 'dod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de dang bcas pa'i 'brel pas dran pa ni rjes su dpog par 'dod pa kho na'o //
translated: Memory, along with that, is only desired to be an inference due to the connection.

original: gang gsungs pa de dang 'di yang dngos dang brgyud pas rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir gnyis ka yang rjes su dpag pa'o zhes pa'i byed pa bstan pa las zhes pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa de dang 'di yang dngos dang brgyud pas rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir gnyis ka yang rjes su dpag pa'o zhes pa'i byed pa bstan pa las zhes pa /
translated: That which is stated and this are both inferences because of being the cause of inference directly and indirectly.

original: 'gal ba yang zhes pa'i mdo'i mthar zhes pa'i byed pa klog pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'gal ba yang zhes pa'i mdo'i mthar zhes pa'i byed pa klog pa'i phyir /
translated: The statement “also contradictory” is read as the ending of the sūtra.

original: 'di'i 'di 'bras bu zhes pa la sogs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de'o zhes pas /
analyzed: 'di'i 'di 'bras bu zhes pa la sogs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de'o zhes pas /
translated: This is the result of this, etc., and the cognition that is that is stated.

original: byed pa gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: byed pa gsal bar byed do //
translated: This clarifies the action.

original: gal te de lta na rtags kyi shes pa rtags las byung ba yin na bye brag tu ma rtogs pas kyang rtags mthong ba tsam las lhag par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na rtags kyi shes pa rtags las byung ba yin na bye brag tu ma rtogs pas kyang rtags mthong ba tsam las lhag par rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it is like that, and the cognition of the reason arises from the reason, then even without understanding the distinction, there would be the understanding that arises from merely seeing the reason.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is stated:

original: 'brel pa dran pa la ltos pas zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'brel pa dran pa la ltos pas zhes pa ste /
translated: “Due to relying on the memory of the connection.”

original: 'brel pa dran pa la ltos pa nyid ni de'i dmigs kyis bstan pa ni rab tu grub pa sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa 'di las thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa dran pa la ltos pa nyid ni de'i dmigs kyis bstan pa ni rab tu grub pa sngon ma can nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa 'di las thob pa'o //
translated: The dependence on the memory of the relation is established by implication, because it is a property of the prior occurrence of the cognition.

original: rgyur byas nas zhes pa /
analyzed: rgyur byas nas zhes pa /
translated: Having made this,

original: rtags kyi sgra 'di ni rgyu'i rnam grangs te /
analyzed: rtags kyi sgra 'di ni rgyu'i rnam grangs te /
translated: this word “hetu” is a synonym for “kāraṇa,”

original: byings rnams ni du ma'i don can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: byings rnams ni du ma'i don can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the roots have many meanings.

original: @116b 'dis 'bras bu rtags su byed skyed par byed ces bye brag tu bshad pa las so //
analyzed: @116b 'dis 'bras bu rtags su byed skyed par byed ces bye brag tu bshad pa las so //
translated: This is the result of the hetu being made into a mark.

original: rtags rtogs pa yang rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
