analyzed: rtags rtogs pa yang rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
translated: The cognition of the mark also becomes the cause of the cognition of the object to be inferred.

original: de'i phyir gang yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang yang gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is also said:

original: 'brel pa med phyir rtags blo min //
analyzed: 'brel pa med phyir rtags blo min //
translated: Because of the lack of relation, the mark is not the cognition.

original: rtags so zhes pa 'di grub ba bsgrub bar bya ba nyid de /
analyzed: rtags so zhes pa 'di grub ba bsgrub bar bya ba nyid de /
translated: This “mark” is established as the object to be established,

original: byed rgyu'i rgyu brjod bar 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: byed rgyu'i rgyu brjod bar 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it is the cause of the cause of the effect, which is what is intended to be expressed.

original: de yang ma yin te zhes pa la sogs pas sel bar byed de /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te zhes pa la sogs pas sel bar byed de /
translated: That is also not so, he refutes with “That is also not so,” and so on.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i mtshan mar gyur pa'i zhes pa shes par byed par 'gyur ba'i zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i mtshan mar gyur pa'i zhes pa shes par byed par 'gyur ba'i zhes pa'i don te /
translated: The phrase “that which becomes the sign of what is to be inferred” means “that which becomes the cause of understanding.”

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba mtshon bar byed shes par byed ces byas nas so //🔽rnam pa gzhan du na ni zhes pa gal te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba mtshon bar byed shes par byed ces byas nas so // rnam pa gzhan du na ni zhes pa gal te /
translated: “That which is to be inferred” is indicated by “that which is to be understood.”

original: skyed par byed pa yang rtags kyi skabs su 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: skyed par byed pa yang rtags kyi skabs su 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: “Otherwise,” if the producer were the context of the reason,

original: bdag dang dbang po dang yid dang don dang phrad pa yang brjod par bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: bdag dang dbang po dang yid dang don dang phrad pa yang brjod par bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: then the contact of the self, the sense faculty, the mind, and the object would also have to be stated,

original: de rnams kyang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i shes pa'i rgyu rnams yin pas so zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i shes pa'i rgyu rnams yin pas so zhes pa ste /
translated: because those are the causes of the consciousness that is to be inferred.

original: brjod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But that is not stated.

original: de'i phyir 'dir skyed par byed pa'i skabs ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir skyed par byed pa'i skabs ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, here the producer is not the context.

original: der 'gyur mod /
analyzed: der 'gyur mod /
translated: That may be so,

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i shes pa'i ngor rtags kyi shes pa ni dngos kyi rgyu nyid de /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba'i shes pa'i ngor rtags kyi shes pa ni dngos kyi rgyu nyid de /
translated: but the cognition of the reason from the perspective of the consciousness that is to be inferred is the direct cause,

original: gzhan gyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ni ma yin no //
translated: not any other.

original: de'i phyir dngos kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir rtags kyi shes pa kho na brjod do zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir rtags kyi shes pa kho na brjod do zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: If that is said, then it is said:

original: dngos su ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos su ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Not directly.”

original: ci ltar ma yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar ma yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: How is it not? It is said:

original: 'brel pa dran pas bar du chod pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa dran pas bar du chod pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: “Because it is interrupted by the memory of the relation.”

original: 'brel pa dran pa grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'brel pa dran pa grub par 'gyur //
translated: The memory of the relation is established.

original: zhes pa tshig 'di las 'brel ba dran pa 'grub kyi /
analyzed: zhes pa tshig 'di las 'brel ba dran pa 'grub kyi /
translated: From this statement, the memory of the relation is established.

original: 'brel ba can du ba la sogs pa la ni rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel ba can du ba la sogs pa la ni rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: But there is no cognition of the related smoke, etc.

original: de ltar ni bshad 'grel las /
analyzed: de ltar ni bshad 'grel las /
translated: Thus, in the Vrtti:

original: gang gi du ba la sogs pa rnams me la sogs pa rnams dang 'brel pa grub ba zhes pa la sogs pas /
analyzed: gang gi du ba la sogs pa rnams me la sogs pa rnams dang 'brel pa grub ba zhes pa la sogs pas /
translated: “Those for whom smoke, etc. are established as related to fire, etc.” and so on.

original: 'di skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba zhes pas don 'di la shes par byed pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di skad du 'chad par 'gyur ba zhes pas don 'di la shes par byed pa gsungs so //
translated: By “it is said” here, the statement that this is to be understood is made.

original: gang gi phyir de nyid du bshad pa rab tu grub pa sngon ma can kho na'i dmigs kyis bstan pa zhes ba ci ltar rtogs par bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de nyid du bshad pa rab tu grub pa sngon ma can kho na'i dmigs kyis bstan pa zhes ba ci ltar rtogs par bya zhe na /
translated: How should one understand the statement that the example is only for the sake of making understood the fact that the reason is not established in reality?

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We reply:

original: don gzhan gyi dngos po yod na /
analyzed: don gzhan gyi dngos po yod na /
translated: If the thing is different from the reason,

original: gang gi phyir rab tu ma grub pa ni dmigs kyis bstan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rab tu ma grub pa ni dmigs kyis bstan pa ma yin no //
translated: then the unestablished reason is not the example.

original: ci ltar zhe na /🔽gang zhig gi du ba la sogs pa rnams me la sogs pa rnams dang @117a * //
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na / gang zhig gi du ba la sogs pa rnams me la sogs pa rnams dang @117a * //
translated: How is that?

original: 'brel pa rab tu grub pa ma yin pa de'i ngor du ba la sogs pa rnams dmigs kyis bstan pa ma yin pa'o zhes pa de'i phyir rtags kyi shes pa rtags las byung ba nyid la 'di shes par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa rab tu grub pa ma yin pa de'i ngor du ba la sogs pa rnams dmigs kyis bstan pa ma yin pa'o zhes pa de'i phyir rtags kyi shes pa rtags las byung ba nyid la 'di shes par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: For whom the connection of smoke, etc., with fire, etc., is not established, for him smoke, etc., are not the example. Therefore, the cognition of the reason, which arises from the reason, is not the cause of the cognition of that.

original: 'bras bu la sogs pa mdor ma brjod ces pa bstan bcos su /
analyzed: 'bras bu la sogs pa mdor ma brjod ces pa bstan bcos su /
translated: The effect, etc., are not mentioned in the treatise.

original: 'bras bu nyid kyi phyir dang / rgyu las rnam par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang yang dag par ldan pa'i phyir dang / rnam par dbye ba las dang / sgra las dang / sgra grub pa las kyang /
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid kyi phyir dang / rgyu las rnam par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang yang dag par ldan pa'i phyir dang / rnam par dbye ba las dang / sgra las dang / sgra grub pa las kyang /
translated: Because of being an effect, because of being a transformation of the cause, because of being a real inherence, because of being a division, because of being a sound, and because of being a sound-accomplishment,

original: sgra mi rtag go zhes pa'o //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag go zhes pa'o //
translated: sound is impermanent.

original: 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa sgra mi rtag pa'i gtan tshigs bshad pa rnams dang / de bzhin du yod pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa ma yin pa ni rtag pa'o zhes rtag pa nyid sgrub pa'i ched du yod pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa ma yin pa nyid bshad do //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa sgra mi rtag pa'i gtan tshigs bshad pa rnams dang / de bzhin du yod pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa ma yin pa ni rtag pa'o zhes rtag pa nyid sgrub pa'i ched du yod pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa ma yin pa nyid bshad do //
translated: The explanations of the reasons for the impermanence of sound, such as being an effect, and likewise the explanation of not having a cause for the purpose of establishing permanence, that is, “that which does not have a cause exists is permanent,”

original: 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa de rnams rtags nyid du brjod pa ma yin no zhes pas mtshan nyid ma tshang ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa de rnams rtags nyid du brjod pa ma yin no zhes pas mtshan nyid ma tshang ba nyid do //
translated: are not stated as reasons for the impermanence of sound, etc. Therefore, there is a failure to state the definition.

original: de la 'dir 'gyur gyi de rnams kyang 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa rnams kyi nang du 'du'o zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de la 'dir 'gyur gyi de rnams kyang 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa rnams kyi nang du 'du'o zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Here, one might say that those, such as being a transformation, are included among the reasons such as being an effect.

original: 'di rnams zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: To respond:

original: 'di rnams kyi ste mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa rtags rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi ste mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa rtags rnams kyi'o //
translated: These are the reasons, such as impermanence.

original: gang yang rung ba zhes pa gcig kyang ngo zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba zhes pa gcig kyang ngo zhes pa'i don to //
translated: “Any one” means “one or the other.”

original: 'o na 'bras bu nyid dang yod pa'i rgyu ma yin pa nyid kyang don gcig la 'du ba can nyid kyi nang du 'dus par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na 'bras bu nyid dang yod pa'i rgyu ma yin pa nyid kyang don gcig la 'du ba can nyid kyi nang du 'dus par 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: But aren’t being an effect and not being a cause the same, and included in the category of being a thing?

original: don gcig la ste sgra la sogs pa la 'bras bu nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid dag dang / bdag la sogs pa la rtag pa nyid dang yod pa'i rgyu ma yin pa nyid dag 'dus pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: don gcig la ste sgra la sogs pa la 'bras bu nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid dag dang / bdag la sogs pa la rtag pa nyid dang yod pa'i rgyu ma yin pa nyid dag 'dus pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because being an effect and impermanence are included in sound, etc., and being a permanent thing and not being a cause are included in self, etc.

original: 'di ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not so, because

original: don gcig la 'du ba can ni 'bras bu 'bras bu gzhan la dang rgyu rgyu gzhan la'o zhes bshad la /
analyzed: don gcig la 'du ba can ni 'bras bu 'bras bu gzhan la dang rgyu rgyu gzhan la'o zhes bshad la /
translated: being included in the same thing is explained as being an effect in relation to another effect and being a cause in relation to another cause.

original: 'dir 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po srid pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po srid pa yang ma yin no //
translated: But here, being an effect and being a cause is not possible.

original: gsal bar bya ba dang gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi zhes pa /
analyzed: gsal bar bya ba dang gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi zhes pa /
translated: “Being an object of manifestation and being a manifester” means

original: mi rtag ba nyid gsal bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir 'bras bu ste /
analyzed: mi rtag ba nyid gsal bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir 'bras bu ste /
translated: Because impermanence is made clear, it is the effect.

original: 'bras bu nyid ni gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir rgyu'o zhes pa ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid ni gsal bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir rgyu'o zhes pa ste /
translated: Because the effect is made clear, it is the cause.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang rig par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, it should be understood for the other.

original: lhag ma gsal byed min pa 'thob //
analyzed: lhag ma gsal byed min pa 'thob //
translated: The remainder is not a manifester, but is obtained.

original: ces pa rnam ba gzhan du na tha dad par nges par bstan pa kho nar mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: ces pa rnam ba gzhan du na tha dad par nges par bstan pa kho nar mi 'gyur na /
translated: If it were otherwise, it would not be taught as definitely distinct.

original: de yang yod do //
analyzed: de yang yod do //
translated: But that does exist.

original: des na gsal bya gsal byed nyid kyis 'dir 'bras bu dang rgyu nyid @117b du mngon par dgongs pa'o zhes rtogs par bya ba ma yin no //🔽don med gzhan la de rtogs phyir //
analyzed: des na gsal bya gsal byed nyid kyis 'dir 'bras bu dang rgyu nyid @117b du mngon par dgongs pa'o zhes rtogs par bya ba ma yin no // don med gzhan la de rtogs phyir //
translated: Therefore, it is not to be understood that here effect and cause are intended by the nature of the manifested and manifester.

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: Because it is understood from another, which is meaningless.

original: don med pa ni dgos pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: don med pa ni dgos pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: Meaningless is without purpose.

original: gzhan las zhes pa med na mi 'byung ba las so //
analyzed: gzhan las zhes pa med na mi 'byung ba las so //
translated: From another means from what is not absent.

original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis ni /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis ni /
translated: By the fact of not being absent,

original: du ba la sogs pa'i rtags las rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs nas /
analyzed: du ba la sogs pa'i rtags las rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs nas /
translated: having understood the object to be inferred from the evidence such as smoke,

original: 'di ni 'di'i gsal bar byed pa'o zhes yid kyis brtag par bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'di'i gsal bar byed pa'o zhes yid kyis brtag par bya ba'o //
translated: One should mentally investigate, This is the illuminator of that.

original: de'i phyir don med pa ste 'di rjes su dpog pa'i rgyur rtogs pa zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir don med pa ste 'di rjes su dpog pa'i rgyur rtogs pa zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: Therefore, it is purposeless, that is, it is understood as the cause of inference, is the remainder.

original: yang na rtog par byed do zhes pa'i dkyus ma 'dir yang sbrel bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang na rtog par byed do zhes pa'i dkyus ma 'dir yang sbrel bar bya'o //
translated: Or, this middle one should be connected with the verb conceives as well.

original: pha rol pos dgos pa med pa kho nar 'di rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu nyid du rtog bar byed do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: pha rol pos dgos pa med pa kho nar 'di rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu nyid du rtog bar byed do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The opponent conceives this as the cause of inference, only without any purpose, is the meaning.

original: gzhan rnams kyang 'di skad smra bar byed de /🔽med na mi 'byung ba kho na 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyang 'di skad smra bar byed de / med na mi 'byung ba kho na 'brel pa ste /
translated: Others also speak in this way.

original: rjes su dpog pa'i rgyur bstan bcos 'dir nges bar bstan la /
analyzed: rjes su dpog pa'i rgyur bstan bcos 'dir nges bar bstan la /
translated: The invariable relation is the cause of inference, as has been ascertained in this treatise.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i dbye ba rab tu bstan pa'i don du ni 'bras bu dang / rgyu'i dngos po la sogs pa'i 'brel pa nye bar blangs te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i dbye ba rab tu bstan pa'i don du ni 'bras bu dang / rgyu'i dngos po la sogs pa'i 'brel pa nye bar blangs te /
translated: But in order to demonstrate the classification of inference, the relation of effect and cause, etc., is taken up.

original: de las kyang skyon thams cad med do zhes so //
analyzed: de las kyang skyon thams cad med do zhes so //
translated: And from that, all faults are absent, it is said.

original: de mi rigs te rgyu dang rtags nyid du nges par bstan pa'i phyir dang / de la yang med na mi 'byung ba med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de mi rigs te rgyu dang rtags nyid du nges par bstan pa'i phyir dang / de la yang med na mi 'byung ba med pa'i phyir te /
translated: That is not correct, because the reason and the sign have been ascertained and taught, and because there is no invariable relation in that.

original: srid par rjes su dpog pa yang pha rol po'i dngos pos mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //🔽grangs can pa rnams kyi yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: srid par rjes su dpog pa yang pha rol po'i dngos pos mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o // grangs can pa rnams kyi yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: And also because it is not possible for the opponent to infer existence, since it is not possible for the opponent.🔽The Sāṃkhya’s

original: rjes su dpag pa rgya cher rig par bya'o zhes gnas pa la /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa rgya cher rig par bya'o zhes gnas pa la /
translated: The extensive inference should be understood.

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo yongs su shes par bya ba'i ched du pha rol pos rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhes brjod pa la smras pa /
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo yongs su shes par bya ba'i ched du pha rol pos rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba 'di ci zhes brjod pa la smras pa /
translated: In order to understand its nature, the opponent asks, “What is this so-called inference?”

original: 'brel pa gcig las zhes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽'brel pa rnam ba bdun no zhes pa /
analyzed: 'brel pa gcig las zhes pa la sogs pa'o // 'brel pa rnam ba bdun no zhes pa /
translated: The response is “From a single relation . . .”🔽The seven types of relations

original: don rnams kyi 'brel pa ni rnam pa bdun nyid de /
analyzed: don rnams kyi 'brel pa ni rnam pa bdun nyid de /
translated: The relations of objects are just seven types.

original: nor dang bdag po'i dngos pos dang // zhes pa la sogs pa bshad 'grel du bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nor dang bdag po'i dngos pos dang // zhes pa la sogs pa bshad 'grel du bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is explained in the commentary beginning with “The relation of wealth and owner . . .”

original: 'brel pa rnams kyi don rnams kyi zhes nges par bstan pa las mdo ru las sgrub par 'brel ba'i sgrar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa rnams kyi don rnams kyi zhes nges par bstan pa las mdo ru las sgrub par 'brel ba'i sgrar shes par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of the compound “of the related objects” is to be understood as “of the objects that are related to the performance of action,” according to the rule that the locative case is used to express location.

original: nor dang bdag po'i dngos pos dang // zhes pa /
analyzed: nor dang bdag po'i dngos pos dang // zhes pa /
translated: By the phrase “by the nature of wealth and owner,”

original: rgyal po dang bran bzhin dang / gtso bo dang skyes bu bzhin te /
analyzed: rgyal po dang bran bzhin dang / gtso bo dang skyes bu bzhin te /
translated: it is like the relation of a king and his servant, or of a master and his man.

original: dper brjod pa gnyis ni 'jig rten dang bstan bcos la rab tu grags pa'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: dper brjod pa gnyis ni 'jig rten dang bstan bcos la rab tu grags pa'i dbang gis so //
translated: The two examples are given because they are well known in the world and in the treatises.

original: de bzhin du phyi ma la yang shes par @118a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du phyi ma la yang shes par @118a * //
translated: The same should be understood in the following cases.

original: bya'o // nor dang bdag bo'i dngos po ni phan tshun ltos pa ste /
analyzed: bya'o // nor dang bdag bo'i dngos po ni phan tshun ltos pa ste /
translated: The nature of wealth and owner is mutual dependence.

original: nor bdag po'i ngor yod pa dang / der rung ba nyid de /
analyzed: nor bdag po'i ngor yod pa dang / der rung ba nyid de /
translated: Wealth exists in the form of an owner, and it is suitable for him.

original: de bzhin du nor can gyi yang nor gyi ngor yod pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du nor can gyi yang nor gyi ngor yod pa'o //
translated: In the same way, the owner exists in the form of wealth.

original: rang bzhin dang rnam 'gyur gyi dngos pos ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang rnam 'gyur gyi dngos pos ni /
translated: By the nature of substance and attribute,

original: zho dang 'o ma bzhin dang / gtso bo dang chen po la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: zho dang 'o ma bzhin dang / gtso bo dang chen po la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: it is like the relation of milk and its curdled state, or of a substance and its qualities such as largeness.

original: rang bzhin ni rnam par dbyer med par rgyu ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin ni rnam par dbyer med par rgyu ste /
translated: The substance is the cause of the attribute, and it is inseparable from it.

original: rnam 'gyur ni de'i yongs su 'gyur ba can gyi chos so //
analyzed: rnam 'gyur ni de'i yongs su 'gyur ba can gyi chos so //
translated: The manifestation is the quality of its transformation.

original: 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos pos ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos pos ni /
translated: The relation of cause and effect is

original: phan tshun phan 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis te /
analyzed: phan tshun phan 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis te /
translated: the characteristic of mutual benefit,

original: shing rta dang yan lag bzhin dang / snying stobs la sogs pa bzhin te /
analyzed: shing rta dang yan lag bzhin dang / snying stobs la sogs pa bzhin te /
translated: like a chariot and its parts, or like courage and so on.

original: sgra la sogs pa'i dngos pos yongs su 'gyur ba na'o //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa'i dngos pos yongs su 'gyur ba na'o //
translated: The relation of cause and effect is also the transformation of sound and so on.

original: rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos pos ni /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos pos ni /
translated: The relation of reason and reasoned is

original: gang yang rung bas phan 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis te /
analyzed: gang yang rung bas phan 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis te /
translated: the characteristic of benefit by one or the other,

original: rdza mkhan dang bum pa bzhin dang / skyes bu dang gtso bo'i 'jug pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rdza mkhan dang bum pa bzhin dang / skyes bu dang gtso bo'i 'jug pa bzhin no //
translated: like a potter and a pot, or like the activity of a person and the primal substance.

original: tsam po dang tsam po can gyi dngos pos yang na'o //
analyzed: tsam po dang tsam po can gyi dngos pos yang na'o //
translated: The relation of mere and possessor of mere is also like this.

original: yan lag dang yan lag can gyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid kyis ni yal ga la sogs pa dang shing bzhin dang / sgra la sogs pa dang 'byung ba chen po bzhin no //
analyzed: yan lag dang yan lag can gyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid kyis ni yal ga la sogs pa dang shing bzhin dang / sgra la sogs pa dang 'byung ba chen po bzhin no //
translated: The relation of part and whole is the characteristic of the relation of part and whole, like branches and so on and a tree, or like sound and so on and the four great elements.

original: lhan cig spyod pa'i dngos pos ni /
analyzed: lhan cig spyod pa'i dngos pos ni /
translated: The relation of accompaniment is

original: ngur pa lta bu dang / snying stobs la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ngur pa lta bu dang / snying stobs la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: like a peacock, or like sattva, etc.

original: gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos pos ni sbrul dang sbre mo bzhin dang / yan lag dang yan lag can du gyur pa'i snying stobs la sogs ba bzhin no //
analyzed: gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos pos ni sbrul dang sbre mo bzhin dang / yan lag dang yan lag can du gyur pa'i snying stobs la sogs ba bzhin no //
translated: The relation of the object to be harmed and the object that harms is like that of a snake and a mongoose, or like sattva, etc., which are the parts and the whole.

original: snying stobs la sogs pa rnams kyi ni gang gi yan lag can nyid des cig shos zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snying stobs la sogs pa rnams kyi ni gang gi yan lag can nyid des cig shos zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And the relation of sattva, etc., is that by which the whole is overwhelmed by the other.

original: 'di ni 'brel pa rnam pa bdun te /
analyzed: 'di ni 'brel pa rnam pa bdun te /
translated: This is the sevenfold relation.

original: des na ji ltar srid pa bzhin 'brel pa gcig las zhes pa /
analyzed: des na ji ltar srid pa bzhin 'brel pa gcig las zhes pa /
translated: Therefore, as is possible, there is one relation from which,

original: ji skad bshad pa don gang zhig dbang po 'ga' zhig gi mngon sum du 'gyur ba de las /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa don gang zhig dbang po 'ga' zhig gi mngon sum du 'gyur ba de las /
translated: as was explained, the object that is the sense-object of some sense-faculty becomes manifest.

original: da ltar dbang po'i mngon sum pa'i don las sngar tshogs pa la 'brel ba byas pa las blos ni khyad par du ma byas pa'i don yod pa nyid du rtogs par byed de /
analyzed: da ltar dbang po'i mngon sum pa'i don las sngar tshogs pa la 'brel ba byas pa las blos ni khyad par du ma byas pa'i don yod pa nyid du rtogs par byed de /
translated: From that, the mind, without making a distinction, causes the understanding of the existence of the object that was previously related to the assemblage of causes.

original: dper na sngar du ba dang me dag gi 'brel pa mthong nas du ba mthong ba las me yang yod pa nyid du rtogs so zhes so //
analyzed: dper na sngar du ba dang me dag gi 'brel pa mthong nas du ba mthong ba las me yang yod pa nyid du rtogs so zhes so //
translated: For example, having previously seen the connection between smoke and fire, one understands that fire exists also from seeing smoke.

original: 'grub pa'i rgyu zhes pa /
analyzed: 'grub pa'i rgyu zhes pa /
translated: The cause of establishment is

original: rtags kyi shes pa 'brel pa dran pa la ltos pa ste /
analyzed: rtags kyi shes pa 'brel pa dran pa la ltos pa ste /
translated: the inferential cognition that depends on the memory of the connection.

original: de ni khyad par mngon sum ma yin pa'i rtags can mi 'grub pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: de ni khyad par mngon sum ma yin pa'i rtags can mi 'grub pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: That is the cause of the non-establishment of the inferential mark that is not directly perceived.

original: 'grub pa ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: 'grub pa ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: Establishment is the result.

original: mdo ru @118b ni rgyu las 'bras bu nye bar btags ba'i phyir lhag ma 'grub pa ni rjes su dpag pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: mdo ru @118b ni rgyu las 'bras bu nye bar btags ba'i phyir lhag ma 'grub pa ni rjes su dpag pa zhes bshad do //
translated: In brief, because the result is figuratively designated as the cause, the remainder is explained as inference.

original: rtags kyi shes pa ni /
analyzed: rtags kyi shes pa ni /
translated: The inferential cognition

original: cung zad ma nges par yang 'gyur //
analyzed: cung zad ma nges par yang 'gyur //
translated: can also be slightly uncertain.

original: zhes pa / rlangs pa la sogs pa dang thun mong ba'i skya bo nyid la sogs pa tsam mthong ba bzhin te /🔽ci 'di du ba'am /
analyzed: zhes pa / rlangs pa la sogs pa dang thun mong ba'i skya bo nyid la sogs pa tsam mthong ba bzhin te / ci 'di du ba'am /
translated: Like seeing just the commonness of a plowman with steam, etc.,🔽wondering Is this smoke or perhaps steam, etc.?

original: 'on te rlangs pa la sogs pa zhes the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on te rlangs pa la sogs pa zhes the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because of having doubt.

original: don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa yang zhes pa rlangs pa la sogs pa la du ba'o zhes 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa yang zhes pa rlangs pa la sogs pa la du ba'o zhes 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Also not in accordance with fact is because of apprehending steam, etc. as smoke.

original: khyad par du bya ba'i don du phyis kyi rtsom pa zhes pa /
analyzed: khyad par du bya ba'i don du phyis kyi rtsom pa zhes pa /
translated: The meaning of distinguishing is the later composition.

original: gang bshad pa mngon sum gcig las zhes pa de'i 'di khyad par ro //
analyzed: gang bshad pa mngon sum gcig las zhes pa de'i 'di khyad par ro //
translated: This is its distinction from what was explained as from one perception.

original: mngon sum yang yin la nges par ma bzung ba yang ngo zhes pa /
analyzed: mngon sum yang yin la nges par ma bzung ba yang ngo zhes pa /
translated: It is perception and also not ascertained.

original: spyi las te /
analyzed: spyi las te /
translated: From the universal.

original: rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pas 'dzin pa'i phyir mngon sum mo //
analyzed: rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pas 'dzin pa'i phyir mngon sum mo //
translated: It is perception because of apprehending by the engagement of the ear, etc.

original: bye brag tu ni /
analyzed: bye brag tu ni /
translated: In particular,

original: the tshom dang phyin ci log pa dag gis nges par ma zin pa'o //
analyzed: the tshom dang phyin ci log pa dag gis nges par ma zin pa'o //
translated: it is not ascertained by doubt and error.

original: bye brag mthong ba las zhes pa la /🔽khyad par du byed bas na bye brag rnams te /
analyzed: bye brag mthong ba las zhes pa la / khyad par du byed bas na bye brag rnams te /
translated: From seeing the particular.

original: du ba kho na la 'jug pa'i khyad par gang yin pa skya bo nyid la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: du ba kho na la 'jug pa'i khyad par gang yin pa skya bo nyid la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: The particulars are distinguished by the particular that engages only smoke, such as paleness.

original: de mthong ba las khyad par du rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: de mthong ba las khyad par du rtogs pa ste /
translated: From seeing that, there is the realization of the distinction,

original: 'di ni du ba kho na'o zhes pa 'di ltar ro //
analyzed: 'di ni du ba kho na'o zhes pa 'di ltar ro //
translated: This is only smoke.

original: thams cad ces pa 'di gzhung lhag ma gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: thams cad ces pa 'di gzhung lhag ma gsal bar byed do //
translated: The word “all” clarifies the remainder of the text.

original: de yang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de yang 'di lta ste /
translated: And that is as follows:

original: snang ba zhan cing gzhan bar ba lang dang rta 'os pa'i sa phyogs su /
analyzed: snang ba zhan cing gzhan bar ba lang dang rta 'os pa'i sa phyogs su /
translated: In a place suitable for cows and horses, where the light is dim,

original: ba lang gi tshad kyi gzugs dum pa mthong nas /
analyzed: ba lang gi tshad kyi gzugs dum pa mthong nas /
translated: having seen a part of a form the size of a cow,

original: the tshom dang ldan pa'i blo ni khyad par mthong ba las bye brag tu rtogs par byed de /
analyzed: the tshom dang ldan pa'i blo ni khyad par mthong ba las bye brag tu rtogs par byed de /
translated: the mind that is doubtful, from seeing the difference, ascertains the particular,

original: ba lang ngo //
analyzed: ba lang ngo //
translated: thinking, “It is a cow.”

original: rta'o zhes par yang ngo //
analyzed: rta'o zhes par yang ngo //
translated: Or, “It is a horse.”

original: gzugs dum pa mthong nas zhes pa /
analyzed: gzugs dum pa mthong nas zhes pa /
translated: Having seen a part of the form,

original: gzugs cung zad tsam mthong nas te /
analyzed: gzugs cung zad tsam mthong nas te /
translated: having seen just a little of the form,

original: dbyibs tsam mthong nas zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dbyibs tsam mthong nas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: having seen just the shape, is what it means.🔽If one wishes it to be like this,

original: 'di ltar yang 'dod na zhes pa spyir bzung ba'i rtags kyi slar yang khyad par du 'dzin par 'dod na'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar yang 'dod na zhes pa spyir bzung ba'i rtags kyi slar yang khyad par du 'dzin par 'dod na'o //
translated: having taken the general mark, if one wishes to grasp it again as a particular.

original: rang don lta ba tsam nyid phyir //
analyzed: rang don lta ba tsam nyid phyir //
translated: Because of just seeing the mere form,

original: zhes pa sgra la sogs pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid nyams su myong ba tsam nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa sgra la sogs pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid nyams su myong ba tsam nyid kyi phyir zhes pa'i don to //
translated: because of just experiencing the intrinsic identity of sound and so on, is what it means.

original: tsam gyi sgra ni spyi dang khyad par 'dzin pa bsal ba'i don to //
analyzed: tsam gyi sgra ni spyi dang khyad par 'dzin pa bsal ba'i don to //
translated: The word “only” is for the purpose of excluding the apprehension of universals and particulars.

original: rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa'i ni ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa'i ni ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is not the engagement of the ear, etc.

original: spyi dang khyad par dag ni don gzhan la ltos pa dag ste /
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par dag ni don gzhan la ltos pa dag ste /
translated: Universals and particulars are dependent on other objects.

original: de'i phyir don gzhan la ltos pas /🔽'di 'di dang mtshungs pa'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir don gzhan la ltos pas / 'di 'di dang mtshungs pa'am /
translated: Therefore, because they are dependent on other objects,🔽one can say, “This is similar to that,”

original: 'di ni 'di las khyad par ro zhes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni 'di las khyad par ro zhes par 'gyur ro //
translated: or “This is different from that.”

original: rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug @119a * //
analyzed: rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug @119a * //
translated: The engagement of the ear, etc.

original: pa ni 'di lta bur 'dzin pa la nus pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: pa ni 'di lta bur 'dzin pa la nus pa yang ma yin te /
translated: is not capable of apprehending in this way,

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pas /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pas /
translated: because it is nonconceptual.

original: dbang po'i 'jug pa'i ni spyi 'am khyad par yul ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i 'jug pa'i ni spyi 'am khyad par yul ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the engagement of the sense faculties is neither a universal nor a particular.

original: don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: Because it is not just the object as it is,

original: spyi'i yul can gyi dbang po'i blo'i'o //
analyzed: spyi'i yul can gyi dbang po'i blo'i'o //
translated: it is the sense cognition that has a universal for its object.

original: de skad du ni bshad pa /
analyzed: de skad du ni bshad pa /
translated: This is what is being said.

original: spyi las ni nges par yang mngon sum nges par ma bzung ba yang ngo zhes so //
analyzed: spyi las ni nges par yang mngon sum nges par ma bzung ba yang ngo zhes so //
translated: Even though it is ascertained from a universal, perception does not grasp it as ascertained.

original: de kho na khyad par du len par brjod par bya ste zhes pa /
analyzed: de kho na khyad par du len par brjod par bya ste zhes pa /
translated: It should be said that this is a special case.

original: don ji lta ba bzhin pa'i rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa mngon sum mo zhes pa'o //
analyzed: don ji lta ba bzhin pa'i rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa mngon sum mo zhes pa'o //
translated: Direct perception is the engagement of the ear and so on with its object as it is.

original: ji skad du gzhan du zhes pa rigs pa phra mor ro //
analyzed: ji skad du gzhan du zhes pa rigs pa phra mor ro //
translated: As it is said elsewhere, in the Subtle Reasoning.

original: de ltar brjod par bya bzhin pa na /
analyzed: de ltar brjod par bya bzhin pa na /
translated: When this is said,

original: mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid kyang skyon med par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid kyang skyon med par 'gyur zhing /
translated: the definition of direct perception will be faultless.

original: 'dir yang khyad par bya ba ma yin par 'byung ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang khyad par bya ba ma yin par 'byung ste /
translated: And here, it is not to be qualified,

original: nges par ma bzung ba'i rtags ni mngon sum ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rtags ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges par ma bzung ba'i rtags ni mngon sum ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rtags ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because if the sign is not definitely apprehended, it would follow that it is not direct perception, and thus not a sign.

original: 'dir kha cig smra bar byed de /
analyzed: 'dir kha cig smra bar byed de /
translated: Here, someone speaks:

original: gal te yang mngon sum rang gi don la lta ba tsam yin pa de lta na yang spyi dang khyad par gyi yul can nyid du mi 'gyur ba ma yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: gal te yang mngon sum rang gi don la lta ba tsam yin pa de lta na yang spyi dang khyad par gyi yul can nyid du mi 'gyur ba ma yin pa kho na ste /
translated: Even though direct perception is merely the seeing of its own object, it is not that it does not have a universal and particular object.

original: spyi dang khyad par dag ni sgra la sogs pa las don gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par dag ni sgra la sogs pa las don gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Because the universal and the particular are not different from sound, etc.

original: rnam pa thams cad du sgra la sogs pa dbang po'i yul nyid kyi phyir ro zhe'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du sgra la sogs pa dbang po'i yul nyid kyi phyir ro zhe'o //
translated: Because sound, etc. are the objects of the sense faculties in every way.

original: de mi rigs te rang gi yul la rnam par 'jug pa la gnod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de mi rigs te rang gi yul la rnam par 'jug pa la gnod par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That is not correct, because it would follow that the object of the sense faculties would be harmed.

original: de ltar ni gang sgra la 'jug pa'i spyi de kho na ni gzugs la sogs pa la yang 'jug ste /
analyzed: de ltar ni gang sgra la 'jug pa'i spyi de kho na ni gzugs la sogs pa la yang 'jug ste /
translated: In that case, the universal that engages with sound would also engage with form, etc.

original: de ltar de sgra las gzhan ma yin pa de ltar gzugs la sogs pa las kyang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar de sgra las gzhan ma yin pa de ltar gzugs la sogs pa las kyang ngo //
translated: Because it is not different from sound in that way, it is also not different from form, etc.

original: de rna ba'i 'jug pas 'dzin pa na gzugs la sogs pa yang 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de rna ba'i 'jug pas 'dzin pa na gzugs la sogs pa yang 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: When it is apprehended by the engagement of the ear, it would follow that form, etc. would also be apprehended.

original: gzugs la sogs pa du ma las kyang gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir spyi gcig pa ma yin pa nyid dang / gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyang gcig po de las gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir gcig nyid du'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa du ma las kyang gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir spyi gcig pa ma yin pa nyid dang / gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyang gcig po de las gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir gcig nyid du'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Because it is not different from the many, such as form, etc., it is not a single universal; and because the forms, etc. are not different from that one, they are not many.

original: mngon sum gyi 'bras bu mngon sum zhes pa ste /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi 'bras bu mngon sum zhes pa ste /
translated: The result of perception is perception.

original: gang 'di ltar yang 'dod na zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa de'i lan 'di yin no //
analyzed: gang 'di ltar yang 'dod na zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa de'i lan 'di yin no //
translated: This is the reply to the question, “If you accept that . . . ”

original: yid kyi 'jug pa ni rnam par rtog pa can nyid kyi phyir te spyi dang khyad par gyi yul can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yid kyi 'jug pa ni rnam par rtog pa can nyid kyi phyir te spyi dang khyad par gyi yul can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the operation of the mind is conceptual, because it has a universal and a particular for its object.

original: de yang mi dmigs so zhes pa /
analyzed: de yang mi dmigs so zhes pa /
translated: And that is not perceived.

original: @119b gal te yid kyi 'jug pa mngon sum gyi 'bras bu nyid du gyur na /
analyzed: @119b gal te yid kyi 'jug pa mngon sum gyi 'bras bu nyid du gyur na /
translated: If the operation of the mind were the result of perception,

original: de ltar tha snyad du bstan par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de ltar tha snyad du bstan par 'gyur la /
translated: it would be taught as a convention.

original: de yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But that is not the case,

original: yul tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yul tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the objects are different.

original: 'di yang sngar kho nar brjod zin to //
analyzed: 'di yang sngar kho nar brjod zin to //
translated: This has already been said before.

original: de'i phyir de mngon sum gyi sgras tha snyad du bstan par bya ba nyid du mi 'thad bar ston to //
analyzed: de'i phyir de mngon sum gyi sgras tha snyad du bstan par bya ba nyid du mi 'thad bar ston to //
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable to teach that it is to be conventionally designated by the term “perception.”

original: gzhan gyi 'ang ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'ang ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Nor from another” and so on.

original: mngon sum las sam /
analyzed: mngon sum las sam /
translated: From perception,

original: de'i 'bras bu las gzhan gyi yul la nye bar 'dogs pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu las gzhan gyi yul la nye bar 'dogs pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: or from its effect, there is no cause for designating the object of another.

original: yang na 'ga' zhig 'di skad du smra bar byed de /
analyzed: yang na 'ga' zhig 'di skad du smra bar byed de /
translated: Or, someone might say the following:

original: mngon sum gcig las zhes pa'i mngon sum gyi sgra 'di ni rab tu grub pa nyid nye bar mtshon par byed do //
analyzed: mngon sum gcig las zhes pa'i mngon sum gyi sgra 'di ni rab tu grub pa nyid nye bar mtshon par byed do //
translated: The term “perception” in “from one perception” illustrates the very establishment of the object.

original: mngon sum las te rab tu grub pa las zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mngon sum las te rab tu grub pa las zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is “from perception, from establishment.”

original: des na mngon sum las dang / mngon sum gyi 'bras bu las gzhan pa'i yang shes pa'i yul gyi rtags la /
analyzed: des na mngon sum las dang / mngon sum gyi 'bras bu las gzhan pa'i yang shes pa'i yul gyi rtags la /
translated: Therefore, the object of a cognition that is different from perception and the effect of perception

original: mngon sum tha dad du bstan par 'gyur ro zhe'o //
analyzed: mngon sum tha dad du bstan par 'gyur ro zhe'o //
translated: is taught to be a different perception.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Thus he says,

original: gzhan gyi 'ang ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'ang ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Nor from another” and so on.

original: 'di ltar sems te rab tu grub pa nyid ni mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad mas 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems te rab tu grub pa nyid ni mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad mas 'gyur zhing /
translated: In this way, one should think: “The establishment of that is by means of valid cognition such as perception.

original: de la re zhig de mngon sum gyis nye bar rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de la re zhig de mngon sum gyis nye bar rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Among them, it is not that it is realized by perception,

original: ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pa'i phyir ro /
translated: because of the reason explained.

original: rjes su dpag pas kyang ma yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas kyang ma yin pa kho na ste /
translated: It is not by inference at all,

original: thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the consequence of infinite regress.

original: gang phyir rtags gang gis du ba rjes su dpag par bya ba de bsgrub pa'i ched du rtags gzhan rjes su 'dod na /
analyzed: gang phyir rtags gang gis du ba rjes su dpag par bya ba de bsgrub pa'i ched du rtags gzhan rjes su 'dod na /
translated: Because, in order to prove the reason by which smoke is inferred, another reason is asserted,

original: de 'grub pa'i ched du yang gzhan no zhes pas thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de 'grub pa'i ched du yang gzhan no zhes pas thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and in order to prove that, another one is asserted, and so on, there would be the consequence of infinite regress.

original: lung yang rtag tu rtags 'dzin pa la bya ba dang ldan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: lung yang rtag tu rtags 'dzin pa la bya ba dang ldan pa ma yin te /
translated: Also, scripture is not always engaged in apprehending a reason,

original: grub pa'i mtha'i gzhung lugs la ma brten pa'i rtags lung gis yongs su gcod pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha'i gzhung lugs la ma brten pa'i rtags lung gis yongs su gcod pa ma yin pas so //
translated: because a reason is not ascertained by scripture that is not based on the textual system of tenets.

original: don 'ga' zhig gi mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes bshad 'grel du brjod pa'i phyir yang 'di mi rigs so zhes pa'o //
analyzed: don 'ga' zhig gi mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes bshad 'grel du brjod pa'i phyir yang 'di mi rigs so zhes pa'o //
translated: Also, this is illogical because the commentary explains, “Some objects become manifest.”

original: mngon sum du tha snyad du bya ba ci zhig ltar yin par 'gyur du chug mod zhes khas blangs nas skyon gzhan brjod par 'dod pas gsungs pa /
analyzed: mngon sum du tha snyad du bya ba ci zhig ltar yin par 'gyur du chug mod zhes khas blangs nas skyon gzhan brjod par 'dod pas gsungs pa /
translated: Even though one grants that it is possible to conventionally designate something as manifest, one should state another fault.

original: 'di yang brjod par bya ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //🔽nor la sogs pa 'brel pa can las nor nyid la sogs pa'i ngo bo kho nas sam /
analyzed: 'di yang brjod par bya ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o // nor la sogs pa 'brel pa can las nor nyid la sogs pa'i ngo bo kho nas sam /
translated: Thus, he says, “This also is to be expressed,” and so on.

original: yang na ngo bo gzhan gyis 'dzin par @120a * //
analyzed: yang na ngo bo gzhan gyis 'dzin par @120a * //
translated: It is either the nature of wealth, etc., that is related to the possessor of wealth, etc., or it is some other nature.

original: 'gyur ro // gal te nor nyid la sogs pa'i ngo bos nor zhes pa 'di ltar gzung bar bya ba yin na /
analyzed: 'gyur ro // gal te nor nyid la sogs pa'i ngo bos nor zhes pa 'di ltar gzung bar bya ba yin na /
translated: If it is the nature of wealth, etc., that is apprehended as “wealth,”

original: de ltar gyur na rje bo'i 'brel pa can nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na rje bo'i 'brel pa can nyid kyi phyir /
translated: then in that case, because it is related to the master,

original: nor gyis rje bo med par nor nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nor gyis rje bo med par nor nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir /
translated: it is not tenable that wealth exists without the master of the wealth.

original: rje bo la nges par ltos pa nyid kyi phyir na rtags mthong ba las sngar kho nar rje bor rtogs pas 'byung bar 'os te /
analyzed: rje bo la nges par ltos pa nyid kyi phyir na rtags mthong ba las sngar kho nar rje bor rtogs pas 'byung bar 'os te /
translated: Because it definitely depends on the master, it is suitable that it arises from seeing the evidence, since it is understood as the master prior to that.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na 'di 'di'i nor ro zhes pa 'di ltar 'dzin pa mi srid pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na 'di 'di'i nor ro zhes pa 'di ltar 'dzin pa mi srid pa ma yin pas so //
translated: Otherwise, it would be impossible to apprehend this as “this is his wealth.”

original: de las kyang dus phyis 'brel pa dran pa don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang dus phyis 'brel pa dran pa don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: And it would be pointless to remember the connection later on.

original: rje bo ni sngar kho nar grub zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rje bo ni sngar kho nar grub zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the master is already established prior to that.

original: lhag ma mi 'thad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: lhag ma mi 'thad pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the remainder is untenable.

original: lhag mas grub pa yang rjes su dpag pa nyid du 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: lhag mas grub pa yang rjes su dpag pa nyid du 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the establishment of the remainder is also asserted to be inference itself.

original: ci ste rnam pa gzhan dun rnam pa gzhan gyis 'dzin par 'dod na /
analyzed: ci ste rnam pa gzhan dun rnam pa gzhan gyis 'dzin par 'dod na /
translated: But if it is asserted that it apprehends by another aspect in another way,

original: de ma brjod do zhes pas mtshan nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ma brjod do zhes pas mtshan nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa nyid do //
translated: then it is incompletely characterized, since it is said that it is not stated.

original: rtags 'dzin pa la mtshungs pa zhes pa /
analyzed: rtags 'dzin pa la mtshungs pa zhes pa /
translated: The phrase in apprehending the evidence means

original: gal te med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis rtags 'dzin na /
analyzed: gal te med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyis rtags 'dzin na /
translated: if it is apprehended by the evidence, since it does not arise without that,🔽then it is not the evidence.

original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyang so sor sbyor ba gzhan la ltos pa kho na'o zhes pas /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyang so sor sbyor ba gzhan la ltos pa kho na'o zhes pas /
translated: If not, then the very fact of invariable concomitance is only dependent on the individual application of the reason.

original: rtags 'dzin pa las sngar kho na bsgrub par bya ba rtogs par 'gyur par 'os la /
analyzed: rtags 'dzin pa las sngar kho na bsgrub par bya ba rtogs par 'gyur par 'os la /
translated: Therefore, it is fitting that the probandum be understood prior to the apprehension of the reason.

original: de lta na yang bsgrub par bya ba so sor sbyor ba can grub na /
analyzed: de lta na yang bsgrub par bya ba so sor sbyor ba can grub na /
translated: Even so, if the probandum is established by the individual application of the reason,

original: 'brel ba dran pa don med pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'brel ba dran pa don med pa nyid do //
translated: then it is pointless to remember the relation.

original: ci ste gzhan du na /
analyzed: ci ste gzhan du na /
translated: But if it is otherwise,

original: de ni ma brjod do zhes pa mtshungs so //
analyzed: de ni ma brjod do zhes pa mtshungs so //
translated: then it is not stated, so it is the same.

original: ma yin te de ni zhes pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: ma yin te de ni zhes pa la sogs pa /
translated: No, it is said, “that” and so on.

original: rjes su dpag bar bya ba la yod pa zhes pa'i tshig las /
analyzed: rjes su dpag bar bya ba la yod pa zhes pa'i tshig las /
translated: From the words “that which exists in the inferendum,”

original: chos can la du ba la sogs pa yod pa tsam gzung bar bya'i /
analyzed: chos can la du ba la sogs pa yod pa tsam gzung bar bya'i /
translated: the subject should be taken as merely having smoke and so on,

original: 'brel ba can nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel ba can nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but not as having the relation.

original: 'o na nam gyi tshe de gzung bar bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na nam gyi tshe de gzung bar bya zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Well then, when should that be taken? It is said:

original: phyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o//
analyzed: phyis zhes pa la sogs pa'o//
translated: “afterwards,” and so on.

original: ma rtogs pa yis de rtogs phyir //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa yis de rtogs phyir //
translated: In order to understand that which is not understood,

original: zhes pa / nor dang nor can gyi 'brel pa la sogs pa mngon par mi shes pas yang lhag ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa / nor dang nor can gyi 'brel pa la sogs pa mngon par mi shes pas yang lhag ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Thus, because of not directly understanding the relationship between wealth and the wealthy, etc., one should understand the remainder.

original: yang ci ltar de rtogs pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci ltar de rtogs pa yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Moreover, how is that understood? It is said:

original: mthong zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mthong zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “seeing,” etc.

original: 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po'i 'brel pa la ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po'i 'brel pa la ni /
translated: In the relationship of cause and effect,

original: ji ltar 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po'i 'brel pa bstan bcos su rnam par phye ba de lta kho nar ma rtogs pa nyid 'dir brjod par 'dod kyi rnam pa thams cad du ni ma yin no zhes rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po'i 'brel pa bstan bcos su rnam par phye ba de lta kho nar ma rtogs pa nyid 'dir brjod par 'dod kyi rnam pa thams cad du ni ma yin no zhes rig par bya'o //
translated: just as the relationship of cause and effect is distinguished in the treatise, it is precisely that which is not understood that is expressed here, but not in every way. This should be understood.

original: bstan bcos su ni dngos po gcig kho na'i rang gi ngo bo mi gtong ba las yongs su 'gyur bas 'bras bu dang @120b rgyu'i dngos por rnam par 'jog par byed la /
analyzed: bstan bcos su ni dngos po gcig kho na'i rang gi ngo bo mi gtong ba las yongs su 'gyur bas 'bras bu dang @120b rgyu'i dngos por rnam par 'jog par byed la /
translated: In the treatise, the state of cause and effect is established only from the transformation of the nature of a single entity, without relinquishing it.

original: gang rnams de ltar 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po'i 'brel pa rab tu rtogs pa ma yin pa de rnams kyang rnam pa gzhan gyis de rab tu rtogs nas /
analyzed: gang rnams de ltar 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po'i 'brel pa rab tu rtogs pa ma yin pa de rnams kyang rnam pa gzhan gyis de rab tu rtogs nas /
translated: Those who do not understand the relationship between cause and effect in this way understand it in another way.

original: med na mi 'byung ba nyid tsam nye bar dmigs pa las rjes su dpag par bya ba des par byed do //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba nyid tsam nye bar dmigs pa las rjes su dpag par bya ba des par byed do //
translated: They infer that mere non-existence is the effect, because they observe that the effect is produced only when the cause is present.

original: bstan bcos su mthong ba'i 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po ni mi 'thad pa kho na ste /
analyzed: bstan bcos su mthong ba'i 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po ni mi 'thad pa kho na ste /
translated: The relationship between cause and effect that is seen in treatises is not tenable.

original: gang gi phyir 'bras bu dang rgyu dag gcig nyid la 'di ni 'bras bu'o 'di ni rgyu'o zhes pa 'di kho nar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'bras bu dang rgyu dag gcig nyid la 'di ni 'bras bu'o 'di ni rgyu'o zhes pa 'di kho nar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it is not the case that the effect and cause are identical, and that this is the effect and that is the cause.

original: ci ste de dag la gang gis 'di ltar 'gyur pa rang bzhin phul du byung ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
analyzed: ci ste de dag la gang gis 'di ltar 'gyur pa rang bzhin phul du byung ba 'ga' zhig yod na ni /
translated: If they have some special nature that makes them so,

original: tha dad par thal bar 'gyur te snying stobs la sogs pa rnams la yang rang bzhin tha dad pa kho na tha dad par rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu yin pas so //
analyzed: tha dad par thal bar 'gyur te snying stobs la sogs pa rnams la yang rang bzhin tha dad pa kho na tha dad par rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu yin pas so //
translated: then they would be different, because the cause of positing difference is the difference of natures, as in the case of sattva and so on.

original: gal te 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos bo nyid yod na yang tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos bo nyid yod na yang tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: If the entities of effect and cause do exist, they are not different.

original: yon tan gsum gyi rigs tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir gcig nyid do zhe na /🔽ma yin te /
analyzed: yon tan gsum gyi rigs tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir gcig nyid do zhe na / ma yin te /
translated: Because the three qualities are not different types, they are one.

original: 'bras bu dang rgyu las tha dad par yon tan gsum nyid nye bar mi mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rgyu las tha dad par yon tan gsum nyid nye bar mi mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because the three qualities themselves are not indicated as different from the effect and the cause.

original: rtag pa ni rim gyis sam cig car yongs su 'gyur ba srid pa yang ma yin na /
analyzed: rtag pa ni rim gyis sam cig car yongs su 'gyur ba srid pa yang ma yin na /
translated: Permanence is not possible as a transformation, either gradual or instantaneous.

original: des na de'i rgyu can 'bras bu dang rgyu'i rnam par gzhag pa ga la yin zhes pa thal ches pas chog go //
analyzed: des na de'i rgyu can 'bras bu dang rgyu'i rnam par gzhag pa ga la yin zhes pa thal ches pas chog go //
translated: Therefore, how could there be the presentation of effect and cause that are based on that? This is sufficient to show the absurdity.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: That may be so,

original: de ma bzung ba kho na de rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu'o zhe na gsungs pa /🔽ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
analyzed: de ma bzung ba kho na de rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu'o zhe na gsungs pa / ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
translated: but the non-apprehension of that is the cause of the inference of that.🔽It is said:🔽No, because it is easy to understand.

original: gdon mi za bar ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: No, because it is not necessary.

original: 'o na nor gyi rang gi ngo bo 'grub pa nor can la ltos pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na nor gyi rang gi ngo bo 'grub pa nor can la ltos pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t the establishment of the nature of wealth dependent only on the possessor of wealth?

original: de 'khrul pa ga las yin zhe na /
analyzed: de 'khrul pa ga las yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, “From where is that error?”

original: 'di ltar sems te rjes su dpog pa'i dus kho nar nor nyid du bzung ba'i rtags ni so sor sbyor ba rtogs par byed la /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems te rjes su dpog pa'i dus kho nar nor nyid du bzung ba'i rtags ni so sor sbyor ba rtogs par byed la /
translated: It is like this: At the time of inference, the reason that apprehends the error is understood in the application.

original: yang na sngar 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i dus su de ltar yongs su bcad par gyur pa ni rjes su dpog pa'i dus su ste /
analyzed: yang na sngar 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i dus su de ltar yongs su bcad par gyur pa ni rjes su dpog pa'i dus su ste /
translated: Or, at the time of inference, it is ascertained in that way at the time of apprehending the connection.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na yang nye bar dmigs par bya bzhin pa'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na yang nye bar dmigs par bya bzhin pa'o zhes pa'o //
translated: Otherwise, it is as if it were observed.

original: gal te rjes su dpag pa'i dus su 'di 'di'i nor ro zhes pa 'di ltar nges pa go bar byed par 'dod na ni 'dir brjod pa'i skyon no //
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag pa'i dus su 'di 'di'i nor ro zhes pa 'di ltar nges pa go bar byed par 'dod na ni 'dir brjod pa'i skyon no //
translated: If it is asserted that at the time of inference, “This is the error of that,” it is understood in that way, then the fault stated here is that the error is from the connection of the erroneous.

original: nor can gyi 'brel pa las nor nyid ces pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: nor can gyi 'brel pa las nor nyid ces pa la sogs pas so //
translated: The error is from the connection of the erroneous.

original: de'i phyir lta ba gnyis ba khas blang bar bya la de las kyang 'khrul pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir lta ba gnyis ba khas blang bar bya la de las kyang 'khrul pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the second view should be accepted, and even that is erroneous.

original: nor dang nor can dag brgyud @121a * //
analyzed: nor dang nor can dag brgyud @121a * //
translated: The error is from the connection of the erroneous.

original: pas bzlog pa'i dngos po srid pa'i phyir de ltar rjes su dpag par bya bar nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: pas bzlog pa'i dngos po srid pa'i phyir de ltar rjes su dpag par bya bar nus pa ma yin no //
translated: because the existence of the opposite of that is possible.

original: 'dir ni bdag gis de'i sngar nor nyid kyis bzung zin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni bdag gis de'i sngar nor nyid kyis bzung zin te /
translated: Here, the self is first apprehended by the property of being an owner.

original: de'i phyir gang na 'di yin pa de na 'di'i nor can des 'byung bar 'os so zhes pas /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang na 'di yin pa de na 'di'i nor can des 'byung bar 'os so zhes pas /
translated: Therefore, it is proper that the owner should appear where the property is.

original: sa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa med kyi /
analyzed: sa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa med kyi /
translated: But the lord of the earth, etc., do not exist,

original: gdugs la sogs pa 'ba' zhig ba bdag po med pa'ang mthong ba srid pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: gdugs la sogs pa 'ba' zhig ba bdag po med pa'ang mthong ba srid pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: because it is possible to see only the umbrella, etc., without an owner.

original: de bzhin du gzhan du yang ji ltar sred par 'khrul pa brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan du yang ji ltar sred par 'khrul pa brtag par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the error of craving should be examined in other cases.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: That may be so,

original: nor dang nor can gyi dngos po la sogs pas 'brel pa thams cad go bar byed pa ni ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: nor dang nor can gyi dngos po la sogs pas 'brel pa thams cad go bar byed pa ni ma yin gyi 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: but the relation of the property and the possessor of the property, etc., is not the cause of all understanding. What then is the cause?

original: gang mi 'khrul pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: gang mi 'khrul pa'o zhe na /
translated: It is the nonerroneous.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: 'brel ba nye bar dmigs pa'i ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'brel ba nye bar dmigs pa'i ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The relation is not the cause of the perception of the near.

original: gal te ji skad bshad pa'i 'brel pa bzung bal yang /
analyzed: gal te ji skad bshad pa'i 'brel pa bzung bal yang /
translated: Someone might say: Even though the relation is taken as explained,

original: slar yang rtags ni 'khrul pa dang ma 'khrul pa nyid la ltos te /
analyzed: slar yang rtags ni 'khrul pa dang ma 'khrul pa nyid la ltos te /
translated: the reason is still dependent on non-error and error.

original: de'i phyir med na mi 'byung ba nyid kho na rjes su dpog pa'i rgyur 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir med na mi 'byung ba nyid kho na rjes su dpog pa'i rgyur 'gyur gyi /
translated: Therefore, the mere fact of invariable concomitance would be the cause of inference,

original: nor dang nor can gyi dngos po la sogs pa'i 'brel pa rnams ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nor dang nor can gyi dngos po la sogs pa'i 'brel pa rnams ni ma yin no //
translated: but the relation of owner and owned, etc., would not be.

original: med na mi 'byung ba'i dngos po rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu yin ba 'di ni 'gyur mod /
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba'i dngos po rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu yin ba 'di ni 'gyur mod /
translated: This is certainly the case that the fact of invariable concomitance is the cause of inference,

original: de ni ji skad bshad pa'i 'brel ba yod na 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ni ji skad bshad pa'i 'brel ba yod na 'gyur te /
translated: but that is when there is the relation as explained.

original: de'i phyir de nges par bstan te zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nges par bstan te zhe na /
translated: Therefore, that must be taught.

original: de mi rigs te de yod na yang de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de mi rigs te de yod na yang de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is not correct, because even when that exists, it does not exist.

original: 'brel pa khyad par med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi 'brel pa ni gnyis la gnas pas te /
analyzed: 'brel pa khyad par med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi 'brel pa ni gnyis la gnas pas te /
translated: Because the relation is not different. The relation of reason and what possesses the reason is based on two things,

original: de ni gcig la ji lta ba bzhin du gnyis pa la yang ngo zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de ni gcig la ji lta ba bzhin du gnyis pa la yang ngo zhes pa ste /
translated: because just as it is in one, so it is in the second.

original: gnyis ka la go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyis ka la go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos por 'gyur ro //
translated: Both would be the object of understanding and the means of understanding.

original: gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos ngo ni 'brel pa med pa kho na ste /
analyzed: gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos ngo ni 'brel pa med pa kho na ste /
translated: The nature of the object of refutation and the means of refutation is not related at all.

original: zhes pa / rtags dang rtags can dag gi zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa / rtags dang rtags can dag gi zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of “the reason and the property to be proven” is intended.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: de drag rtags dang rtags can min //
analyzed: de drag rtags dang rtags can min //
translated: The strong one is not the reason and the property to be proven.

original: zhes pa 'brel pa cig shos rnams ni pha rol po'i 'dod pas rtags dang rtags can dag tu 'gyur la /
analyzed: zhes pa 'brel pa cig shos rnams ni pha rol po'i 'dod pas rtags dang rtags can dag tu 'gyur la /
translated: The other related ones are the reason and the property to be proven according to the opponent’s assertion.

original: gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos po ni pa rol po'i 'dod pas kyang 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos po ni pa rol po'i 'dod pas kyang 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature of the object of refutation and the means of refutation is not even according to the opponent’s assertion.

original: sbrul dang sbre mo dag ni gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos po yin la /
analyzed: sbrul dang sbre mo dag ni gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos po yin la /
translated: Snakes and mongooses are the nature of the object of refutation and the means of refutation.

original: de dag rtags dang rtags can dag tu 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag rtags dang rtags can dag tu 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: But they are not asserted to be the reason and the property to be proven.

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are mistaken.

original: @121b 'on kyang sbrul rgyal ba dang sbre mo 'pham ba dag ste /
analyzed: @121b 'on kyang sbrul rgyal ba dang sbre mo 'pham ba dag ste /
translated: However, the victorious snake and the defeated mongoose are not the nature of the object of refutation and the means of refutation.

original: de dag gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos po mang ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos po mang ma yin no //
translated: They are not the nature of the object of refutation and the means of refutation.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang ngo zhes pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang ngo zhes pa /
translated: The same is so for the others.

original: bya rog dang 'ug pa la sogs ba rnams la'o //
analyzed: bya rog dang 'ug pa la sogs ba rnams la'o //
translated: The crows, owls, and so on.

original: gang yang nges bar bzung ba zhes pa la sogs pas mtshan nyid ma khyab pa nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: gang yang nges bar bzung ba zhes pa la sogs pas mtshan nyid ma khyab pa nyid gsungs so //
translated: And also, the statement beginning with “The definition is not included” teaches the nonpervasion of the definition.

original: gtso bo dang skyes bu yang dag bar ldan par sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs kyi rjes su dpag pa ma bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtso bo dang skyes bu yang dag bar ldan par sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs kyi rjes su dpag pa ma bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the inference that proves the existence of the person as the substratum of the gunas is not included.

original: rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams kyis zhes pa'i sogs pa'i sgras /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams kyis zhes pa'i sogs pa'i sgras /
translated: The words “and so on” in “by the presence and so on” include the following:

original: tshad can dang 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po dang / nus pa 'jug pa dang sna tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid rnams gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshad can dang 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po dang / nus pa 'jug pa dang sna tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid rnams gzung bar bya'o //
translated: the finite, the effect, the cause, the potency, the engagement, and the various natures.

original: gtso bo yod pa nyid la sogs pa rtogs pa zhes pa 'dir yang sogs ba smos pas /
analyzed: gtso bo yod pa nyid la sogs pa rtogs pa zhes pa 'dir yang sogs ba smos pas /
translated: And also in “the understanding of the existence of the primal substance and so on,” the word “and so on” includes:

original: gcig nyid dang / don dang ldan pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi don la sogs pa rnams dang / ts'u li ka'i don rnams so //
analyzed: gcig nyid dang / don dang ldan pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi don la sogs pa rnams dang / ts'u li ka'i don rnams so //
translated: the oneness, the meaningful, the other’s purpose, and so on, and the meanings of the Cūḍḍṭṭalakas.

original: de'i tshe ci yin zhes pa bdun pa rnams las gcig kyang srid pa ma yin no zhes dri ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe ci yin zhes pa bdun pa rnams las gcig kyang srid pa ma yin no zhes dri ba'o //
translated: At that time, it is asked, “What is it?” It is not possible that any of the seven is.

original: bsam par bya zhes pa rnam pa gnyis nyid srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam par bya zhes pa rnam pa gnyis nyid srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “It should be thought” because the possibility of a duality is.

original: so sor brjod bya min zhes pa gtso bo yod do //
analyzed: so sor brjod bya min zhes pa gtso bo yod do //
translated: “It should not be expressed individually” because the primal substance exists.

original: tha dad pa rnams la mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes pa kho na brjod par bya'i /
analyzed: tha dad pa rnams la mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes pa kho na brjod par bya'i /
translated: “Because of the perception of the different” should be stated.

original: tha dad pa rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: “Because of the perception of the pervasion of the different” should not be stated.

original: tha dad pa rnams kho na ni rgyu mtshan can no zhes pa bskyed par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa rnams kho na ni rgyu mtshan can no zhes pa bskyed par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “The different alone have a reason” because of the state of being produced.

original: rgyu mtshan ni gtso bo'i zhes pa ni skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan ni gtso bo'i zhes pa ni skyed par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “The reason is the primal substance” because of the state of being a producer.

original: gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /
translated: “Because of the state of being nondifferent” means

original: rjes su 'gro ba yang tha dad pa rnams kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba yang tha dad pa rnams kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa ste /
translated: that the pervasion is the state of being the self of the different.

original: de'i chos nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: de'i chos nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: It is because of the nature of that.

original: chos dang chos can dag kyang gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chos dang chos can dag kyang gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the phenomena and the bearers of phenomena are not different.

original: de'i phyir tha dad pa bzhin du de yang rgyu mtshan can nyid du 'thad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir tha dad pa bzhin du de yang rgyu mtshan can nyid du 'thad do //
translated: Therefore, like the different [parts], it is also tenable that they are characterized.

original: de bzhin du tshad can la sogs pa rnams kyi yang rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshad can la sogs pa rnams kyi yang rig par bya'o //
translated: Likewise, it should be understood for the limited and so forth.

original: rnam lnga min zhes pa rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams tha dad pa'i bdag nyid du gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam lnga min zhes pa rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams tha dad pa'i bdag nyid du gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The line not the five means that the general and so forth are not of a different nature.

original: tha dad pa rnams kho na gcig bu can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa rnams kho na gcig bu can du 'gyur ro //
translated: Only the different [parts] would be the single one.

original: 'ga' zhig min zhes ba la sogs pas /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig min zhes ba la sogs pas /
translated: The line not any of them and so forth says:

original: gang tha dad pa rnams kyi 'grub par byed pa po gtso ba'i chos de rnams ni des rtogs par bya ba rnams te /
analyzed: gang tha dad pa rnams kyi 'grub par byed pa po gtso ba'i chos de rnams ni des rtogs par bya ba rnams te /
translated: Those phenomena that are the primary producers of the different [parts] are the objects of knowledge of that [consciousness].

original: gcig nyid la sogs pa bzhin /
analyzed: gcig nyid la sogs pa bzhin /
translated: Like oneness and so forth.

original: cha shas med pa'i lus la sogs pa rnams kyang de lta bu'o //
analyzed: cha shas med pa'i lus la sogs pa rnams kyang de lta bu'o //
translated: Partless bodies and so forth are also like that.

original: de bzhin du gang gtso bos 'grub @122a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du gang gtso bos 'grub @122a * //
translated: Likewise, whatever is produced by the primary [part] is the object of knowledge of that [consciousness].

original: par bya ba tha dad pa'i chos de rnams ni de'i rtogs par byed pa rnams te /
analyzed: par bya ba tha dad pa'i chos de rnams ni de'i rtogs par byed pa rnams te /
translated: Those phenomena that are different from the object to be realized are the realizers of that.

original: rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa bzhin /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa bzhin /
translated: They are like the four—pervasion, etc.—🔽and existence, being the pervader, etc.

original: yod pa nyid dang khyab bdag nyid la sogs pa rnams kyang de lta bu'o zhes pa rang bzhin gyi thal bar 'gyur ba gnyis gsungs so //
analyzed: yod pa nyid dang khyab bdag nyid la sogs pa rnams kyang de lta bu'o zhes pa rang bzhin gyi thal bar 'gyur ba gnyis gsungs so //
translated: The two consequences of the essential nature have been stated.

original: 'o na gal te yang rnam pa thams cad du rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos po yin pa de lta na yang de ltar ma nges pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad du go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa nyid du thal ba ma yin🔽no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gal te yang rnam pa thams cad du rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos po yin pa de lta na yang de ltar ma nges pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad du go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa nyid du thal ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Now, if the reason and the property to be proven are in every way the same in existence, then, although it is so, because it is not ascertained in that way, it is not the case that the consequence of the object to be understood and the means of understanding is in every way the same.

original: thun mong du mngon sum pa yang nges par ma bzung ba'i don khyad par mthong ba las khyad par du rtogs par byed do zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig la /
analyzed: thun mong du mngon sum pa yang nges par ma bzung ba'i don khyad par mthong ba las khyad par du rtogs par byed do zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig la /
translated: In response to the statement, “In general, even though the object of direct perception is not ascertained, it is understood through seeing a particular object,”

original: rtags kyi shes pa ni nges pa'i bdag nyid can du 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rtags kyi shes pa ni nges pa'i bdag nyid can du 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: the reason is that it is asserted that the cognition of the reason is of the nature of ascertainment.

original: ma nges par 'dod pa rnams kyi yang rtags kyi chos rnams gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni lan ma yin no //
analyzed: ma nges par 'dod pa rnams kyi yang rtags kyi chos rnams gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir 'di ni lan ma yin no //
translated: For those who assert that the reason-phenomena are not different, this is not a response.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod /
translated: This may be so,

original: de ltar go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos por 'dod pa kho na'o zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos por 'dod pa kho na'o zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: but it is only asserted that the thing to be understood and the means of understanding are different.

original: tha dad pa rnams kyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: tha dad pa rnams kyi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: [The root text] states, “Those who are different . . . ,” and so on.
