original: gang gi phyir rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams kho na bstan bcos su gtan tshigs nyid du gzung bar bya'i /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams kho na bstan bcos su gtan tshigs nyid du gzung bar bya'i /
translated: Because only pervasion and so on are accepted as reasons in treatises,

original: yod pa tsam la sogs pa rnams ni ma yin /
analyzed: yod pa tsam la sogs pa rnams ni ma yin /
translated: not mere existence and so on.

original: gtso bo'i yang yod pa nyid la sogs pa rnams kho na bsgrub par bya ba nyid du yin gyi /
analyzed: gtso bo'i yang yod pa nyid la sogs pa rnams kho na bsgrub par bya ba nyid du yin gyi /
translated: And because only existence and so on are the probandum,

original: cha shas med pa nyid la sogs pa rnams ni ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: cha shas med pa nyid la sogs pa rnams ni ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: not partlessness and so on.

original: rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos po ni gtso bo yod pa nyid la sogs pa rtogs par byed pa'i gtan tshigs ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos po ni gtso bo yod pa nyid la sogs pa rtogs par byed pa'i gtan tshigs ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the thing that is the reason for understanding the primary existence and so on is not the reason.

original: yang ci ltar gtso bo'i cha shas med pa nyid yin /
analyzed: yang ci ltar gtso bo'i cha shas med pa nyid yin /
translated: Moreover, how could the principal have parts?

original: ji tsam gyis snying stobs la sogs pa de'i cha shas rnams su 'gyur ba kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: ji tsam gyis snying stobs la sogs pa de'i cha shas rnams su 'gyur ba kho na'o zhe na /
translated: To the extent that sattva and so on are its parts, they are just that.

original: de dang bral ba'i cha shas yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir cha shas med pa nyid do zhes pas skyon med do //
analyzed: de dang bral ba'i cha shas yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir cha shas med pa nyid do zhes pas skyon med do //
translated: Since it does not have parts that are separate from it, it is partless.

original: gtsug bud can gyi don bcu zhes pa yod pa nyid dang / gcig nyid dang / don don dang ldan pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi don nyid /
analyzed: gtsug bud can gyi don bcu zhes pa yod pa nyid dang / gcig nyid dang / don don dang ldan pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi don nyid /
translated: The meaning of the word śikhī is said to be tenfold: existence, oneness, the meaning of meaning, the meaning of another,

original: gzhan nyid dang / byed pa bo'i dngos po ma yin pa dang / sbyor ba dang / 'bral ba dang / mang po'i skyes bu rnams dang / gnas pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan nyid dang / byed pa bo'i dngos po ma yin pa dang / sbyor ba dang / 'bral ba dang / mang po'i skyes bu rnams dang / gnas pa ste /
translated: otherness, the state of not being an agent, connection, separation, many beings, and abiding.

original: lus kyi yang lhag mar 'jug pas zhes pa 'di rnams su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi yang lhag mar 'jug pas zhes pa 'di rnams su rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the body is engaged in the remainder of these.

original: de'i phyir gang gang du rjes su mthun pa zhes sbyar bar bya la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang gang du rjes su mthun pa zhes sbyar bar bya la /
translated: Therefore, whatever is suitable should be applied.

original: @122b de yang med na mi 'byung ba kho na'o //
analyzed: @122b de yang med na mi 'byung ba kho na'o //
translated: Moreover, it is only the absence of that which is not present.

original: 'o na rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos pos de yang 'phangs pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos pos de yang 'phangs pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: But isn’t the reason also implied by the fact that it is the basis of the reason?

original: rgyu mtshan can ni rgyu mtshan med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan can ni rgyu mtshan med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the basis of the reason does not occur without the reason.

original: 'phangs pa bden mod /
analyzed: 'phangs pa bden mod /
translated: It is true that it is implied.

original: pha rol pos ni rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos pos 'brel pa'i rtags go bar byed pa nyid du 'dod pas /
analyzed: pha rol pos ni rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos pos 'brel pa'i rtags go bar byed pa nyid du 'dod pas /
translated: But the opponent maintains that the reason is the indicator of the relation between the reason and the fact.

original: rgyu mtshan yang go bar byed pa nyid du khas blangs par byas te /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan yang go bar byed pa nyid du khas blangs par byas te /
translated: Therefore, he must accept that the reason is also the indicator.

original: de yang de dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang de dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is because it is related to that.

original: rnam pa thams cad du go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa nyid de rnam pa thams cad du rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can yod pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa nyid de rnam pa thams cad du rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can yod pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: In every way, the reason and the fact are the indicated and the indicator, because in every way the reason and the fact exist.

original: de'i phyir de'i 'di mi 'dod pa ltung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i 'di mi 'dod pa ltung ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the opponent’s rejection of this is a downfall.

original: gal te yang rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos pos gang zhig gi med na mi 'byung ba yin pa de go bar byed pa'o zhes khas blangs na /
analyzed: gal te yang rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos pos gang zhig gi med na mi 'byung ba yin pa de go bar byed pa'o zhes khas blangs na /
translated: If you accept that the reason and the thing that has the reason make known that which is not produced without the other,

original: rnam pa thams cad du rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos por mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos por mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: then in no way would there be the relation of reason and thing that has the reason.

original: mi 'dod pa cung zad du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa cung zad du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: And there would be no undesirable consequence at all.

original: de bzhin zhes ba la sogs pas 'brel pa cig shos rnams la yang ji skad bshad pa'i skyon ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes ba la sogs pas 'brel pa cig shos rnams la yang ji skad bshad pa'i skyon ston to //
translated: The words “in the same way” and so on show that the previously explained faults apply to the other relations as well.

original: cha shas kho nas zhes pa rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis zhes pa'i don to //🔽'brel min nyid du yang dag brjod //
analyzed: cha shas kho nas zhes pa rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis zhes pa'i don to // 'brel min nyid du yang dag brjod //
translated: “Only in part” means “in some way.”

original: ces pa / 'brel min nyid ces pa 'di ni ma yin par dgag pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa / 'brel min nyid ces pa 'di ni ma yin par dgag pa'o //
translated: “It is not a relation” is a negative statement.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs pa'i gtan tshigs kyi 'brel pa'i 'brel pa nyid gang yin pa de las gzhan pa'i 'brel pa ni bshad do zhes pa'i don du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs pa'i gtan tshigs kyi 'brel pa'i 'brel pa nyid gang yin pa de las gzhan pa'i 'brel pa ni bshad do zhes pa'i don du rig par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of the statement “The relation that is the relation of the reason to the object to be inferred is different from that” should be understood as follows.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na 'brel pa rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na 'brel pa rnams kyi 'brel pa med pa nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would be contradictory, because it is not tenable that the connections of connections are not connected.

original: 'o na nor dang nor can gyi dngos po la sogs pa'i 'brel pa rnams gsal byed rnams yin la /
analyzed: 'o na nor dang nor can gyi dngos po la sogs pa'i 'brel pa rnams gsal byed rnams yin la /
translated: Well then, the connections of the possessor of wealth and the possessed wealth, etc. are the manifestors.

original: de'i phyir de'i sgo nas rtags kyis gsal bar byed cing rang gi 'brel pa dang rjes su mthun pa nyid las cha 'ga' zhig kho nas gsal bar byed do zhes pa rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i sgo nas rtags kyis gsal bar byed cing rang gi 'brel pa dang rjes su mthun pa nyid las cha 'ga' zhig kho nas gsal bar byed do zhes pa rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to say that the evidence manifests through that, and that it manifests only a part of it through its own connection, which is in accordance with the evidence.

original: des na rnam pa thams cad du go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po gang las yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: des na rnam pa thams cad du go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos po gang las yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, from what is the understood and what is the manifestor in every way? It is said:

original: nor dang nor can sogs tsam gyis //
analyzed: nor dang nor can sogs tsam gyis //
translated: The possessor of wealth and the possessed wealth, etc.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: are the manifestors.

original: rang gi lta ba las rgyal po la sogs pa la nor can gyi rnam pa kho nar rtogs par 'gyur la /
analyzed: rang gi lta ba las rgyal po la sogs pa la nor can gyi rnam pa kho nar rtogs par 'gyur la /
translated: From one's own view, the king, etc. are understood only in the aspect of the possessor of wealth.

original: dpal dga' ba la sogs pa bye brag tu ni ma yin no//
analyzed: dpal dga' ba la sogs pa bye brag tu ni ma yin no//
translated: They are not specifically understood as glorious joy, etc.

original: @123a * // ci'i phyir zhen gsungs pa rnam pa gzhan du shes na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: @123a * // ci'i phyir zhen gsungs pa rnam pa gzhan du shes na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Why? He says, “If one knows in a different way,” and so on.

original: gal te rang gi 'brel pa'i rjes su mthun pa nyid las log par 'dzin par nus par 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te rang gi 'brel pa'i rjes su mthun pa nyid las log par 'dzin par nus par 'dod na /
translated: If one asserts that it is possible to apprehend the opposite from the mere conformity to the connection,

original: de kho na rnam pa thams cad du go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de kho na rnam pa thams cad du go bar bya ba dang go bar byed pa'i dngos por 'gyur ro //
translated: then that would be the reality that is understood in every way and the thing that is the means of understanding.

original: nor nyid kyi cha nas kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: nor nyid kyi cha nas kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: From the point of view of error, he says, “Even the part of existence,” and so on.

original: yod pa'i snying stobs kyi cha yang nor can nyid tsam gyis 'brel ba yin la /
analyzed: yod pa'i snying stobs kyi cha yang nor can nyid tsam gyis 'brel ba yin la /
translated: The part of sattva that exists is connected by mere wealth.

original: des na gal te 'brel pa'i rjes su mthun pa nyid las de kho nas de kho na gsal bar 'dod na nor can nyid tsam rtags can la rtogs par 'gyur ro //🔽ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: des na gal te 'brel pa'i rjes su mthun pa nyid las de kho nas de kho na gsal bar 'dod na nor can nyid tsam rtags can la rtogs par 'gyur ro // ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, if one asserts that that very reality is manifested by the mere conformity to the connection, then the mere wealth would be the sign that is understood.

original: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Why? He says, “No,” and so on.

original: 'brel pa la ltos pa med pas rtogs par byed na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa la ltos pa med pas rtogs par byed na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: The thought is that if one understands without relying on the connection, there would be an absurd consequence.

original: de las shin tu 'das na zhes pa de ma thag par brjod pa'i don las shin tu 'das na'o //🔽gal te rang gi 'brel pa'i sgo ma gtogs par gzhan du ste /
analyzed: de las shin tu 'das na zhes pa de ma thag par brjod pa'i don las shin tu 'das na'o // gal te rang gi 'brel pa'i sgo ma gtogs par gzhan du ste /
translated: If it is far beyond that, it is far beyond the meaning that was just expressed.

original: rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang rang gi don rtogs par nus bar 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang rang gi don rtogs par nus bar 'gyur na ni /
translated: If it is possible to understand one's own object in some other way, apart from by means of its own relation,🔽then it is not by means of its own relation that it is understood.

original: rang gi 'brel ba dang rjes su mthun pas ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //🔽zhar la 'ongs pas chog go zhes pa nor dang nor can la sogs pa'i rtags dang rtags can rnams zhar la byung bas blangs pa'o zhes ston par byed do //
analyzed: rang gi 'brel ba dang rjes su mthun pas ma yin no zhes pa'i don to // zhar la 'ongs pas chog go zhes pa nor dang nor can la sogs pa'i rtags dang rtags can rnams zhar la byung bas blangs pa'o zhes ston par byed do //
translated: This is the meaning of not in accordance with its own relation.🔽 Enough with the digression.

original: gsal bya gsal byed dngos bo yis //
analyzed: gsal bya gsal byed dngos bo yis //
translated: The relation between the signified and signifier is like that between an owner and his property.

original: zhes pa / gal te gsal bya gsal byed kyi dngos pos rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos po 'dod na /
analyzed: zhes pa / gal te gsal bya gsal byed kyi dngos pos rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos po 'dod na /
translated: If one asserts that the relation between the signified and signifier is the relation between an owner and his property,

original: de las rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos po gcig pu kho na gsal byed du brjod par bya ba min no //
analyzed: de las rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos po gcig pu kho na gsal byed du brjod par bya ba min no //
translated: then the relation between the signified and signifier is not just a single entity.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is that? It is said:

original: de rnam bdun zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de rnam bdun zhes pa ste /
translated: That is the sevenfold.

original: go bya go byed kyi dngos po ni gsal bya gsal byed kyi dngos po yin zhing /
analyzed: go bya go byed kyi dngos po ni gsal bya gsal byed kyi dngos po yin zhing /
translated: The entity of the object of understanding and the means of understanding is the entity of the object of manifestation and the means of manifestation.

original: 'brel pa bdun po rnams kyis kyang rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs te /
analyzed: 'brel pa bdun po rnams kyis kyang rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs te /
translated: And the seven relations also cause the understanding of the object of inference.

original: de'i phyir de kho na rnam ba bdun zhes khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de kho na rnam ba bdun zhes khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should accept that the reality is sevenfold.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na gzhan rnams gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na gzhan rnams gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the others would not be the means of manifestation.

original: de'i phyir tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir zhes pa /
translated: Therefore, “because of being different”

original: rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos bo las gzhan nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos bo las gzhan nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: means because of being different from the entity of the reason and the entity of the property of the reason.

original: sngar brjod zin to zhes pa de yang gzhan las rtogs pa'i phyir don med pa'o zhes pa 'dis don 'di sngar kho nar bshad @123b zin to //
analyzed: sngar brjod zin to zhes pa de yang gzhan las rtogs pa'i phyir don med pa'o zhes pa 'dis don 'di sngar kho nar bshad @123b zin to //
translated: “This was said before” means that this point was explained earlier by “because of being understood from another.”

original: rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos po zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o zhes pa gal te rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gnyis ka dag gi go bar byed ba nyid du 'gyur na /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos po zhes kyang brjod par mi bya'o zhes pa gal te rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gnyis ka dag gi go bar byed ba nyid du 'gyur na /
translated: If both a reason and a thing that has a reason were to be the cause of understanding,

original: de skad smra bar rigs pa las /
analyzed: de skad smra bar rigs pa las /
translated: it would be reasonable to say that.

original: gnyis ka dag gi go bar byed pa nyid kyang ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gnyis ka dag gi go bar byed pa nyid kyang ma yin gyi /
translated: But neither is the cause of understanding.

original: 'on kyang rgyu mtshan can kho na'i'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu mtshan can kho na'i'o //
translated: However, it is the thing that has a reason that is the cause of understanding.

original: de ston bar byed de /🔽gang gi phyir mngon par gsal bar byed pa ni 'dir rgyu mtshan nyid ces pa la /
analyzed: de ston bar byed de / gang gi phyir mngon par gsal bar byed pa ni 'dir rgyu mtshan nyid ces pa la /
translated: It is taught:🔽Here, the cause of understanding is a reason.

original: 'dir te rjes su dpag pa dang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i tha snyad la mngon par gsal bar byed pa ni rgyu mtshan nyid kho na'o //
analyzed: 'dir te rjes su dpag pa dang rjes su dpag par bya ba'i tha snyad la mngon par gsal bar byed pa ni rgyu mtshan nyid kho na'o //
translated: Here, in the conventions of inference and that which is to be inferred, the cause of understanding is a reason alone.🔽Moreover, what is this so-called reason?

original: yang rgyu mtshan nyid ces bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
analyzed: yang rgyu mtshan nyid ces bya ba 'di ci zhe na /
translated: A reason is the cause of understanding.

original: rgyu mtshan te du ba la sogs pa'i rang gi bsgrub par bya ba la med na mi 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan te du ba la sogs pa'i rang gi bsgrub par bya ba la med na mi 'byung ba ste /
translated: It is the cause of understanding because it is the cause of the arising of knowledge that did not exist before.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is a reason because it is the cause of understanding.🔽It is

original: rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan gang gis de la rgyu mtshan gyi sgra rab tu 'jug pa de ni rgyu mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan gang gis de la rgyu mtshan gyi sgra rab tu 'jug pa de ni rgyu mtshan nyid do //
translated: The reason for the application of the word reason to that is the nature of a reason.

original: rgyu mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the nature of a reason.

original: zhes pa / gsal bar byed pa zhes pa 'di dang sprel bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa / gsal bar byed pa zhes pa 'di dang sprel bar bya'o //
translated: This should be connected with the word “illuminator.”

original: 'dir yang bsgrub par bya ba'i cha shas gang yin pa go bar bya ba de ni rgyu mtshan can nyid do //
analyzed: 'dir yang bsgrub par bya ba'i cha shas gang yin pa go bar bya ba de ni rgyu mtshan can nyid do //
translated: And here, that which is the part of the probandum that is to be illuminated is the nature of a reason.

original: yang ci'i phyir rgyu mtshan can ni gsal bar byed pa ma yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir rgyu mtshan can ni gsal bar byed pa ma yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why is it that a reason is not an illuminator? It is said:

original: gsal bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: gsal bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: Because it is that which is to be illuminated.

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: because it is that which is to be proven.

original: grub ba ni go bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: grub ba ni go bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur gyi /
translated: That which is established becomes that which illuminates.

original: bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that which is to be proven.

original: de'i phyir rgyu mtshan gyi dngos po zhes pa kho na brjod par bya ba'i rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan gyi dngos po zhes ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu mtshan gyi dngos po zhes pa kho na brjod par bya ba'i rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan gyi dngos po zhes ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the word “nature of a reason” should be stated, but not “reason” and “nature of a reason.”

original: 'dir 'gyur mod /
analyzed: 'dir 'gyur mod /
translated: This is true.

original: rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can dag gi dngos po ni rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos po zhes rnam bar shes par bya ba ma yin la /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can dag gi dngos po ni rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can gyi dngos po zhes rnam bar shes par bya ba ma yin la /
translated: But the fact of the reason and the fact of the possession of the reason are not to be understood as the fact of the reason and the fact of the possession of the reason.

original: de ltar shes bar bya ba na ni rgyu mtshan can smos pa don med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar shes bar bya ba na ni rgyu mtshan can smos pa don med par 'gyur te /
translated: And if they were so understood, the mention of the possession of the reason would be pointless,

original: rgyu mtshan gyi dngos po kho na go bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gyi dngos po kho na go bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the fact of the reason alone would be understood.

original: 'o na ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: rgyu mtshan gyi rgyu mtshan can dang yod ba zhes pa ste /🔽de yang med na mi 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gyi rgyu mtshan can dang yod ba zhes pa ste / de yang med na mi 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: The fact of the reason and the possession of the reason exist,🔽and they are the reason why the probandum is established.

original: 'di las bsgrub bar bya ba 'grub ba'i rgyu mtshan zhes mngon bar brjod pa dang rkyen yang ngo zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: 'di las bsgrub bar bya ba 'grub ba'i rgyu mtshan zhes mngon bar brjod pa dang rkyen yang ngo zhes byas nas so //
translated: This is what is expressed by the words “reason” and “condition.”

original: rgyu mtshan yod ba zhes pa 'di tsam brjod bar bya ba na /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan yod ba zhes pa 'di tsam brjod bar bya ba na /
translated: But when only the fact of the reason is stated,

original: ci zhig dang lhan cig rgyu mtshan yod pa med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid yin zhes mi shes so //
analyzed: ci zhig dang lhan cig rgyu mtshan yod pa med na mi 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid yin zhes mi shes so //
translated: it is not known what it is that is the reason why the probandum is established.

original: de'i phyir so sor sbyor ba'i zla bo rtogs @124a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir so sor sbyor ba'i zla bo rtogs @124a * //
translated: Therefore, the person who is the object of the application of the term is not the self.🔽

original: par bya ba'i ched rgyu mtshan gyi sgra nye bar blangs pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: par bya ba'i ched rgyu mtshan gyi sgra nye bar blangs pa'o zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the word “reason” is used in order to understand the individual application.

original: 'di ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not so,

original: rgyu mtshan ni nges par rgyu mtshan can la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan ni nges par rgyu mtshan can la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: because a reason definitely depends on a subject.

original: de skad ma brjod na yang so sor sbyor pa'i zla bo rtogs so zhes pas rgyu mtshan can smos pa 'bras bu med pa'o //
analyzed: de skad ma brjod na yang so sor sbyor pa'i zla bo rtogs so zhes pas rgyu mtshan can smos pa 'bras bu med pa'o //
translated: Even if it is not stated, the individual application is understood, so the mention of the subject is pointless.

original: gang yang smras pa zhes pa /
analyzed: gang yang smras pa zhes pa /
translated: As for what was said,

original: lta ba gzhan la sun 'byin bsgres nas ston to //🔽lhan cig spyod pa'i dngos po ni rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams gtso bo med na yod ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: lta ba gzhan la sun 'byin bsgres nas ston to // lhan cig spyod pa'i dngos po ni rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams gtso bo med na yod ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: it is taught by way of refuting another view.🔽The concomitant thing is that the followers, etc., do not exist without the principal.

original: lhan cig spyod ba'i dngos po'o zhes pas rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams kyis gtso bo la sogs pa dbang po las 'das pa'i don rtogs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig spyod ba'i dngos po'o zhes pas rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams kyis gtso bo la sogs pa dbang po las 'das pa'i don rtogs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Since the followers, etc., are concomitant things, they do not understand the imperceptible object, such as the principal.

original: dbang bo las 'das pa'i don rtogs par byed pa'i gtan tshigs bstan bcos su bshad pa ni rjes su dpag pa lhag ma dang ldan pa yang ngo //
analyzed: dbang bo las 'das pa'i don rtogs par byed pa'i gtan tshigs bstan bcos su bshad pa ni rjes su dpag pa lhag ma dang ldan pa yang ngo //
translated: “It is also a remainder of inference.”

original: lhan cig spyod pa'i dngos po'i 'brel ba yang gtso bo dang rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams kyi 'di lhag ma dang ldan par rigs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig spyod pa'i dngos po'i 'brel ba yang gtso bo dang rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams kyi 'di lhag ma dang ldan par rigs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: The relation of co-existence is not reasonable for the chief and the followers, etc., because it is a remainder.

original: lhan cig spyod pa'i dngos po ni 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po ma yin te /
analyzed: lhan cig spyod pa'i dngos po ni 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po ma yin te /
translated: Co-existence is not the relation of effect and cause,

original: tha dad bar nges par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad bar nges par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is taught to be definitely different.

original: gzhan yang rnam par gnas pa gnyis dag gis lhan cig spyod pa'i dngos por 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam par gnas pa gnyis dag gis lhan cig spyod pa'i dngos por 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, co-existence is twofold:

original: dur pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dur pa bzhin no //
translated: like a corpse.

original: 'bras bu dang rgyu dag cig car yod pa ma yin te 'bras bu'i dus na rgyu mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rgyu dag cig car yod pa ma yin te 'bras bu'i dus na rgyu mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: An effect and its cause do not exist simultaneously, because at the time of the effect, the cause does not appear.

original: des na lhan cig spyod ba'i dngos po de las dbang po las 'das pa'i don rtogs pa ga las yin /
analyzed: des na lhan cig spyod ba'i dngos po de las dbang po las 'das pa'i don rtogs pa ga las yin /
translated: Therefore, how can a transcendent object be understood from that co-existence?

original: rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang bo las 'das pa'i don rtogs par khas blangs la /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang bo las 'das pa'i don rtogs par khas blangs la /
translated: You accept that you understand a transcendent object through concomitance and so forth.

original: de lhan cig spyod pa'i dngos bo'i 'brel pas sbyor ro zhes pa khas blangs pa nyams so //
analyzed: de lhan cig spyod pa'i dngos bo'i 'brel pas sbyor ro zhes pa khas blangs pa nyams so //
translated: You also accept that you connect it through the relation of the object that accompanies it.

original: de'i phyir 'di dag kho na ma yin no zhes pas gzhan yang 'dod par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di dag kho na ma yin no zhes pas gzhan yang 'dod par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, since these are not the only [means of understanding], you should accept others as well.

original: gang las rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams kyis gtso bo la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gang las rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams kyis gtso bo la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: From what are concomitance and so forth established?

original: rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis zhes pa ste /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis zhes pa ste /
translated: It is said that there are two types of inference.

original: de la khyad par mthong ba ni /
analyzed: de la khyad par mthong ba ni /
translated: Seeing a particular is as follows.

original: gang gi tshe me dang du ba 'brel pa mthong nas /
analyzed: gang gi tshe me dang du ba 'brel pa mthong nas /
translated: When you see the relation between fire and smoke,

original: du ba de kho nas me de kho na'i yang dang yang du me de kho na 'di'o zhes yod pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: du ba de kho nas me de kho na'i yang dang yang du me de kho na 'di'o zhes yod pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: you understand that the existence of that fire is due to that smoke alone, and you understand that that fire alone is here again and again.

original: spyir mthong ba ni gang 'ga' zhig tu du ba dang me 'brel par mthong nas /
analyzed: spyir mthong ba ni gang 'ga' zhig tu du ba dang me 'brel par mthong nas /
translated: Seeing a general rule is as follows. Having seen the relation between smoke and fire somewhere,🔽you see smoke on a mountain pass and infer fire.

original: dus phyis du ba tsam @124b mthong ba las me spyir rjes su dpog pa'o //
analyzed: dus phyis du ba tsam @124b mthong ba las me spyir rjes su dpog pa'o //
translated: Later, one infers fire in general from the mere perception of smoke.

original: spyir mthong ba'i rjes su dpag pa 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: spyir mthong ba'i rjes su dpag pa 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: In general, inference from what is perceived is of two kinds:

original: snga ma dang ldan ba dang lhag ma dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma dang ldan ba dang lhag ma dang ldan pa'o //
translated: that which is endowed with the antecedent and that which is endowed with the remainder.

original: de la snga ma dang ldan pa ni gang gi tshe rgyu ma tshang ba med pa mthong nas 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: de la snga ma dang ldan pa ni gang gi tshe rgyu ma tshang ba med pa mthong nas 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid rtogs pa ste /
translated: That which is endowed with the antecedent is when, having perceived the non-deficient cause, one understands that the effect will occur.

original: dper na sprin byung ba mthong nas char pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na sprin byung ba mthong nas char pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid lta bu'o //
translated: For example, having perceived the appearance of clouds, one understands that rain will occur.

original: lhag ma dang ldan pa ni gang gi tshe 'bras bu grub pa mthong nas rgyu byung zin pa nyid rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: lhag ma dang ldan pa ni gang gi tshe 'bras bu grub pa mthong nas rgyu byung zin pa nyid rtogs pa ste /
translated: That which is endowed with the remainder is when, having perceived the accomplishment of the effect, one understands that the cause has already occurred.

original: dper na chu klung gsar du chu 'phel ba mthong ba nas sprin byung ba nyid lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na chu klung gsar du chu 'phel ba mthong ba nas sprin byung ba nyid lta bu'o //
translated: For example, having perceived the new increase of water in a river, one understands that the appearance of clouds has already occurred.

original: de la snga ma dang ldan pa'i rjes su dpag pa ni 'khrul pa'o//
analyzed: de la snga ma dang ldan pa'i rjes su dpag pa ni 'khrul pa'o//
translated: Among these, inference endowed with the antecedent is mistaken.

original: lhag ma dang ldan pa rnam par dpyad pa dang bcas pa ni 'khrul pa med pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma dang ldan pa rnam par dpyad pa dang bcas pa ni 'khrul pa med pa'o //
translated: The remainder, which is endowed with analysis, is non-erroneous.

original: de rnams kyis gang 'di spyir mthong ba'i rjes su dpag pa lhag ma dang ldan pa 'di ni dbang po las 'das pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag par rtogs par byed pa'o zhe'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis gang 'di spyir mthong ba'i rjes su dpag pa lhag ma dang ldan pa 'di ni dbang po las 'das pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag par rtogs par byed pa'o zhe'o //
translated: These, in general, are the inferences of seeing which are endowed with the remainder. They are the means of understanding things which are beyond the senses.

original: de dran par 'dod ces pa 'di la 'thad pa gsungs pa ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de dran par 'dod ces pa 'di la 'thad pa gsungs pa ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The statement one remembers that is not tenable, etc.

original: 'dis ni sngar nyams su myong ba de kho na 'di'o zhes so sor ngo shes pa de ni dran pa'i bdag nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni sngar nyams su myong ba de kho na 'di'o zhes so sor ngo shes pa de ni dran pa'i bdag nyid yin te /
translated: This is saying that the recognition of that which was previously experienced, thinking that is it, is the nature of memory.

original: dper na du ba de kho na 'di'o zhes pa'i shes pa bzhin /
analyzed: dper na du ba de kho na 'di'o zhes pa'i shes pa bzhin /
translated: For example, it is like the cognition thinking, that is the same smoke.

original: khyad par mthong ba yang ji skad bshad pa'i chos dang ldan pa'o zhes rang bzhin gsungs so//
analyzed: khyad par mthong ba yang ji skad bshad pa'i chos dang ldan pa'o zhes rang bzhin gsungs so//
translated: The seeing of a particular is also endowed with the qualities as previously explained. Thus, the nature is stated.

original: 'bras bu dang rgyu dag las zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rgyu dag las zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: From effects and causes, etc.

original: spyir mthong ba kho na rnams pa gnyis zhes nges par bzung ba ni gzhan rnam pa gnyis nyid rnam par gcod pa 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: spyir mthong ba kho na rnams pa gnyis zhes nges par bzung ba ni gzhan rnam pa gnyis nyid rnam par gcod pa 'bras bu'o //
translated: The result of the ascertainment that in general, seeing is twofold is the exclusion of other than twofold.

original: de las kyang 'bras bu dang rgyu dag las yang dang yang du rjes su dpag pa med par thal bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de las kyang 'bras bu dang rgyu dag las yang dang yang du rjes su dpag pa med par thal bar 'gyur la /
translated: And from that, it would follow that there would be no repeated inference from effect to cause.

original: yang dang yang du rjes su dpog pa khyad par mthong ba'o zhes byas nas zhes pa khas blangs ba nyams so //
analyzed: yang dang yang du rjes su dpog pa khyad par mthong ba'o zhes byas nas zhes pa khas blangs ba nyams so //
translated: And it would contradict your acceptance that repeated inference is seeing the difference.

original: ci ste zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pas kyang khas blangs pa kho na gsungs so //
analyzed: ci ste zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs pas kyang khas blangs pa kho na gsungs so //
translated: And by saying “if” and so on, you are accepting that very point.

original: gang gi phyir spyir mthong ba rnam pa gnyis kho na'i nges bar gzung ba'i 'bras bu ni grangs gzhan rnam par sel ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir spyir mthong ba rnam pa gnyis kho na'i nges bar gzung ba'i 'bras bu ni grangs gzhan rnam par sel ba'o //
translated: Because in general, the result of the ascertainment that seeing is twofold is the exclusion of other than twofold.

original: de las kyang nor dang nor can la sogs pa'i 'brel pa rnams kyis de dang por rjes su dpag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang nor dang nor can la sogs pa'i 'brel pa rnams kyis de dang por rjes su dpag par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And from that, the relation between wealth and the possessor of wealth and so on would not be inferred first.

original: de dang por smos pa ni yang dang yang rjes su dpog pa la /
analyzed: de dang por smos pa ni yang dang yang rjes su dpog pa la /
translated: The statement that it is inferred first is in reference to repeated inference.

original: khyad par mthong ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par mthong ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is possible to see a particular.

original: ci'i phyir spyir mthong ba med ce na gsungs pa /🔽'di rnams la 'bras bu dang rgyu'i @125a * //
analyzed: ci'i phyir spyir mthong ba med ce na gsungs pa / 'di rnams la 'bras bu dang rgyu'i @125a * //
translated: Why is there no seeing of a universal? It is said:

original: dngos po yod pa ni ma yin zhing zhes pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po yod pa ni ma yin zhing zhes pa ste /
translated: “These do not have the nature of effect and cause.”

original: 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po las kyang spyir mthong bar 'dod do //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po las kyang spyir mthong bar 'dod do //
translated: The universal is also accepted as being seen from the nature of effect and cause.

original: ci ltar na khyad par mthong ba med ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar na khyad par mthong ba med ce na gsungs pa /
translated: How is there no seeing of a particular? It is said:

original: khyad par 'dzin pa yang ma yin no zhes pa ste /
analyzed: khyad par 'dzin pa yang ma yin no zhes pa ste /
translated: “Nor is there apprehension of a particular.”

original: gnyis pa la sogs pa'i skad cig rnams la de kho na 'di'o zhes khyad par 'dzin pa srid de /
analyzed: gnyis pa la sogs pa'i skad cig rnams la de kho na 'di'o zhes khyad par 'dzin pa srid de /
translated: In the second moment and so on, there is the possibility of apprehending that very thing as “that,”

original: de'i dngos po zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dngos po zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is the apprehension of a particular called “its nature.”

original: skad cig dang po la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: skad cig dang po la ni ma yin no //
translated: But not in the first moment.🔽The sevenfold relation is taught,

original: 'brel pa rnam bdun bstan pa dang // zhes pa nor dang nor can gyi dngos po la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'brel pa rnam bdun bstan pa dang // zhes pa nor dang nor can gyi dngos po la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: such as the relation of possessor and possessed and so on.

original: rjes su dpag pa rnam gnyis nyid //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa rnam gnyis nyid //
translated: Inference is twofold.

original: ces pa / spyir mthong ba dang khyad par mthong ba dag las gzhan yang srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces pa / spyir mthong ba dang khyad par mthong ba dag las gzhan yang srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is possible that there is something other than what is seen in general and what is seen in particular.

original: ni'i sgra gcig ni gang gi phyir gyi don la'o //
analyzed: ni'i sgra gcig ni gang gi phyir gyi don la'o //
translated: One of the words “ni” has the meaning of “yasmāt” because.

original: gnyis pa ni de'i phyir gyi don la ste /🔽gang gi phyir rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis kho na yin pa de'i phyir nor dang nor can la sogs pa gsum rnams kyis dang por rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs pa na rjes su dpag pa gsum po gang yin pa de rnams gang gi khongs
analyzed: gnyis pa ni de'i phyir gyi don la ste / gang gi phyir rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis kho na yin pa de'i phyir nor dang nor can la sogs pa gsum rnams kyis dang por rjes su dpag par bya ba rtogs pa na rjes su dpag pa gsum po gang yin pa de rnams gang gi khongs
translated: The second has the meaning of “tasmāt” therefore.

original: su bsdu ste /
analyzed: su bsdu ste /
translated: Because there are only two kinds of inference, therefore, when the three, the possessor of wealth, etc., first understand the object of inference, whatever the three inferences are, they are included within which one of the two kinds of inference?

original: der gang du yang nang du 'du ba ma yin no zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: der gang du yang nang du 'du ba ma yin no zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
translated: They are not included within either one, is the thought.

original: gsum smos pa ni rang bzhin dang rnam 'gyur dang / rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can dang tsam po dang tshad can gyi dngos po rnams 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po kho na'i nang du 'du ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsum smos pa ni rang bzhin dang rnam 'gyur dang / rgyu mtshan dang rgyu mtshan can dang tsam po dang tshad can gyi dngos po rnams 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po kho na'i nang du 'du ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The mention of three is because the entities of nature, modification, reason, reasonable, mere, and limited are included only within the entities of effect and cause.

original: rjes su gzung bar bya ba dang rjes su 'dzin par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: rjes su gzung bar bya ba dang rjes su 'dzin par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: because of the relationship of the one who is to be benefited and the one who benefits.

original: phan gdags par bya ba dang phan 'dogs par byed pa po nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: phan gdags par bya ba dang phan 'dogs par byed pa po nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: because of the relationship of the one who is to be helped and the one who helps.

original: phan gdags par bya ba dang phan 'dogs pa po'i dngos po med par nor dang nor can gyi dngos po srid pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phan gdags par bya ba dang phan 'dogs pa po'i dngos po med par nor dang nor can gyi dngos po srid pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The relationship of the one who is to be helped and the one who helps does not exist without the relationship of the one who possesses wealth and the one who possesses it,

original: rnam pa gzhan du na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //🔽phyogs 'dis lhan cig spyod pa'i dngos po dang gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa'i 'brel pa dag kyang 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos por drang bar bya'o zhes pas log par ma brjod do //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro // phyogs 'dis lhan cig spyod pa'i dngos po dang gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa'i 'brel pa dag kyang 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos por drang bar bya'o zhes pas log par ma brjod do //
translated: otherwise there would be an absurd extension of the rule.🔽By this position, the relationship of the one who accompanies and the one who is accompanied, and the relationship of the one who is harmed and the one who harms, are also to be interpreted as the relationship of effect and cause.

original: de ltar ni phan 'dogs pa med par lhan cig spyod pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: de ltar ni phan 'dogs pa med par lhan cig spyod pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin pas so //
translated: Thus, because the relationship of the one who accompanies and the one who is accompanied does not exist without the relationship of the one who is to be helped and the one who helps.

original: dur pa dag kyang 'khrig pa'i bde ba nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pas phan tshun phan 'dogs pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dur pa dag kyang 'khrig pa'i bde ba nye bar sgrub pa la sogs pas phan tshun phan 'dogs pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Also, in the case of a corpse and a charnel ground, mutual benefit is seen, such as the corpse being accomplished for the sake of the pleasure of sex.

original: gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos po la yang sprul rgyal ba dang sbre mo 'pham pa dag 'bras @125b bu dang rgyu'i dngos po dag kho na ste /
analyzed: gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos po la yang sprul rgyal ba dang sbre mo 'pham pa dag 'bras @125b bu dang rgyu'i dngos po dag kho na ste /
translated: In the case of the thing that is harmed and the thing that harms, the king of snakes and the mongoose, there is only the state of cause and effect.

original: phan tshun rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the mutual causal nature.

original: snying stobs la sogs pa rnams kyi sgra la sogs pa'i dngos por yongs su gyur pa na bzhin no //
analyzed: snying stobs la sogs pa rnams kyi sgra la sogs pa'i dngos por yongs su gyur pa na bzhin no //
translated: It is like the transformation of sattva, etc. into the state of sound, etc.

original: 'brel pa gzhan med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: 'brel pa gzhan med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: Because it would follow that there would be no other relation.

original: 'bras bu dang rgyu'i 'brel pa gcig bu kho nar 'gyur gyi 'brel pa gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rgyu'i 'brel pa gcig bu kho nar 'gyur gyi 'brel pa gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: Only the relation of cause and effect would occur, and not another relation.

original: phan gdags par bya ba dang phan 'dogs par byed pa med par 'brel pa srid pa ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: phan gdags par bya ba dang phan 'dogs par byed pa med par 'brel pa srid pa ma yin pa'am /
translated: Because a relation is not possible without the thing that is benefited and the thing that benefits.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba yang na'o //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba yang na'o //
translated: Or else, there would be an absurd consequence.

original: ci ltar na 'brel pa gzhan med ce na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci ltar na 'brel pa gzhan med ce na gsungs pa /
translated: How is it that there is no other relation? It is said:

original: thams cad du zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad du zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The verse beginning “In all respects” and so on.🔽

original: 'brel pa bdun rnams kyis kyang rjes su dpag par bya ba la /
analyzed: 'brel pa bdun rnams kyis kyang rjes su dpag par bya ba la /
translated: The sevenfold relation is also to be inferred.

original: rtogs par bya ba dang rtogs par byed pa'i 'brel pa can dag gis byas pa phan tshun nam gang yang rung ba'i ji ltar srid par phan 'dogs pa yod de /
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba dang rtogs par byed pa'i 'brel pa can dag gis byas pa phan tshun nam gang yang rung ba'i ji ltar srid par phan 'dogs pa yod de /
translated: The relation of the object to be inferred and the inferential mark is one of mutual benefit, either way, by way of the relation of the object to be inferred and the inferential mark, or by way of the relation of the object to be inferred and the inferential mark.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na de dag 'brel pa kho nar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na de dag 'brel pa kho nar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, they would not be related at all.

original: yang na 'dis rjes su dpag par bya ba'o zhes pas rjes su dpag pa ni /
analyzed: yang na 'dis rjes su dpag par bya ba'o zhes pas rjes su dpag pa ni /
translated: Or, this is to be inferred, thus it is an inference.

original: 'brel pa rnam pa bdun te /🔽rjes su dpag pa der ro //🔽rgyu mtshan gyi don can bdun pa ste /
analyzed: 'brel pa rnam pa bdun te / rjes su dpag pa der ro // rgyu mtshan gyi don can bdun pa ste /
translated: The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.

original: 'brel pa rnam pa bdun ni rgyu mtshan no //🔽rtogs par bya ba dang rtogs par byed pa dag gis zhes pa la sogs pa lhag ma snga ma bzhin no //🔽bshad pa / 'di la gang 'di rtsod pa ni /
analyzed: 'brel pa rnam pa bdun ni rgyu mtshan no //🔽rtogs par bya ba dang rtogs par byed pa dag gis zhes pa la sogs pa lhag ma snga ma bzhin no //🔽bshad pa / 'di la gang 'di rtsod pa ni /
translated: The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.🔽The sevenfold relation is the reason.

original: 'o na 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po ni rtogs par bya ba'i ched du brten par bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na 'bras bu dang rgyu'i dngos po ni rtogs par bya ba'i ched du brten par bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: Well, isn’t the entity of effect and cause to be understood for the sake of being dependent?

original: gzhan du na 'brel pa mi shes pa'i rtags las kyang dang po mthong ba na rjes su dpag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na 'brel pa mi shes pa'i rtags las kyang dang po mthong ba na rjes su dpag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, even from a reason whose relation is not known, when the first is seen, there would be inference.

original: de'i phyir de kho na phan 'dogs pa'o zhes ji ltar brjod par bya zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de kho na phan 'dogs pa'o zhes ji ltar brjod par bya zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, how can it be said that it is only that which benefits?

original: de 'jug pa med pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de 'jug pa med pa kho na ste /
translated: It is only that which does not engage,

original: gang gi phyir 'dir rtogs par byed pa phan 'dogs par byed pa mngon par yang dag par brjod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dir rtogs par byed pa phan 'dogs par byed pa mngon par yang dag par brjod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: because here the one who understands is not the one who benefits, nor is the one who is expressed.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: 'brel pa can dag gi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i rjes su 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa can dag gi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i rjes su 'dzin pa'o //
translated: It is the one who holds the nature of the related ones.

original: skyon rnam pa gnyis zhes pa /
analyzed: skyon rnam pa gnyis zhes pa /
translated: The two kinds of faults are

original: 'di kho na phyogs gnyis ka la yod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di kho na phyogs gnyis ka la yod pa'o //
translated: just these two sides.

original: 'bras bu med ces pa ngag rnams ni don gzhan rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu med ces pa ngag rnams ni don gzhan rnam par gcod pa'i 'bras bu can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The words “without effect” are because the effects of words are only the exclusion of other objects.

original: 'di'i ci yin zhes pa la sogs pas 'bras bu med pa de kho na ston to //
analyzed: 'di'i ci yin zhes pa la sogs pas 'bras bu med pa de kho na ston to //
translated: The words “what is this?” and so on indicate the absence of a result.

original: 'o na'ang rnam pa gnyis nyid ma shes pa rtogs par byed pa kho na ngag gi 'bras bur 'gyur ba ma @126a * //
analyzed: 'o na'ang rnam pa gnyis nyid ma shes pa rtogs par byed pa kho na ngag gi 'bras bur 'gyur ba ma @126a * //
translated: But if that is so, then the result of speech would be the mere understanding of the two forms of non-apprehension,

original: yin nam / 'dir don gzhan rnam par gcod pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: yin nam / 'dir don gzhan rnam par gcod pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: so what need is there to eliminate other referents?

original: 'di ni mi rigs te /🔽don gzhan rnam par gcod pas ni de'i rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: 'di ni mi rigs te / don gzhan rnam par gcod pas ni de'i rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa'i phyir la /
translated: This is not correct.🔽This is because the nature of that [referent] is understood through the elimination of other referents,

original: de ni rang bzhin gzhan las log ba'i ngo bo can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rang bzhin gzhan las log ba'i ngo bo can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: and that [referent] has a nature that is the opposite of other natures.

original: gal te ngo bo gzhan rnam par gcad pa ma yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te ngo bo gzhan rnam par gcad pa ma yin na ni /
translated: If the nature of that [referent] were not eliminated as other,

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa ga las yin /
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa ga las yin /
translated: how could its own nature be understood?

original: rnam pa gnyis nyid ma shes pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis nyid ma shes pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it the case that the two forms of non-apprehension are not understood,

original: 'bras bu dang rgyu rjes su dpog pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rgyu rjes su dpog pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because this is the context of inferring the effect and the cause.

original: de la slar yang brjod pa ni nges par bya ba'i don du rnam par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de la slar yang brjod pa ni nges par bya ba'i don du rnam par shes par bya'o //
translated: And the repetition there should be understood to be for the purpose of ascertaining the meaning.

original: de mi rigs te zhes pa 'di la gtan tshigs gsungs pa /
analyzed: de mi rigs te zhes pa 'di la gtan tshigs gsungs pa /
translated: This is not correct. The reason is stated:

original: 'brel pa can gyi 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa can gyi 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
translated: because there is no error in the related.

original: gegs la sogs pa srid pa na //
analyzed: gegs la sogs pa srid pa na //
translated: When there is the possibility of an obstruction, etc.

original: zhes pa / gegs ni 'gal ba'i rkyen nye bar bab pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa / gegs ni 'gal ba'i rkyen nye bar bab pa'o //
translated: An obstruction is the occurrence of a contradictory condition.

original: sogs pa'i sgras lhan cig byed pa ma tshang ba srid pa na'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras lhan cig byed pa ma tshang ba srid pa na'o //
translated: The word “etc.” includes the possibility of an incomplete assemblage of the cooperating conditions.

original: rtags su bya ba'o zhes pa ni rtogs par bya ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rtags su bya ba'o zhes pa ni rtogs par bya ba'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: “The evidence” means “that which is to be understood.”

original: 'dir nye bar gdags par rigs pa yang ma yin zhes pa nye bar 'dogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir nye bar gdags par rigs pa yang ma yin zhes pa nye bar 'dogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, it is not reasonable to impute, because there is no reason for imputation, i.e., no ground for inference.

original: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ci ste zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: If someone says, “But . . . ,” etc.

original: gang zhig rgyu 'ga' zhig 'bras bu nye bar bskyed pa zin par mthong nas de'i rigs can gzhan yang mthong zhing 'dra bar blo 'khrul pa po 'di yang nges par 'bras bu de skyed par 'gyur ro zhes lhag par zhen par byed pa po de'i ni rgyu las
analyzed: gang zhig rgyu 'ga' zhig 'bras bu nye bar bskyed pa zin par mthong nas de'i rigs can gzhan yang mthong zhing 'dra bar blo 'khrul pa po 'di yang nges par 'bras bu de skyed par 'gyur ro zhes lhag par zhen par byed pa po de'i ni rgyu las
translated: Having seen that some cause generates an effect, having seen another of the same type, the deluded mind conceives that this will definitely generate that effect.

original: 'bras bu'i shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: The cognition of the effect arises from the cause.

original: 'ga' zhig gi tshe zhes pa'i tshig las mi 'gyur pa yang ngo //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gi tshe zhes pa'i tshig las mi 'gyur pa yang ngo //
translated: The word “sometimes” indicates that it is not invariable.

original: gang gi phyir 'gyur ba de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu yin pa nyid kyi phyir rjes su dpag par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'gyur ba de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu yin pa nyid kyi phyir rjes su dpag par brjod par bya'o //
translated: Because it is sometimes the cause, it is called inference.

original: gang zhig phyir 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'byung ba ma yin pa de'i phyir 'khrul pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig phyir 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'byung ba ma yin pa de'i phyir 'khrul pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Because it is not sometimes, it is called delusion.

original: de ltar rjes su dpag pa nyid dang 'khrul pa nyid du yang brjod do zhe'o //
analyzed: de ltar rjes su dpag pa nyid dang 'khrul pa nyid du yang brjod do zhe'o //
translated: Thus it is said to be both inference and delusion.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: de'i tshe de'i rgyu ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: de'i tshe de'i rgyu ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: Because at that time it is not the cause.

original: de'i tshe yang rjes su dpag par nye bar gdags par rigs pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang rjes su dpag par nye bar gdags par rigs pa ma yin pa kho na ste /
translated: At that time, it is not right to impute it to be inference,

original: rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i rgyu nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not a cause of inference.

original: de'i tshe ni de rjes su dpag pa ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pa /
analyzed: de'i tshe ni de rjes su dpag pa ma yin pa kho na'o zhes pa /
translated: At that time, it is not inference at all.

original: gang zhig de yang don ji lta ba rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig de yang don ji lta ba rtogs pa yin te /
translated: But if it is a cognition of the object as it is,

original: de'i phyir de'i rgyus rjes su dpag par nye bar @126b gdags par rigs mod /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i rgyus rjes su dpag par nye bar @126b gdags par rigs mod /
translated: then it is right to impute it to be inference because of that cause.

original: gang gi tshe yang don ji lta ba yin pa de'i tshe 'khrul pa nyid med do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe yang don ji lta ba yin pa de'i tshe 'khrul pa nyid med do //
translated: But when it is as it is, then there is no error.

original: de'i phyir de gcig pu gang yin pa rjes su dpag par 'gyur zhing 'khrul pa yang yin pa ni med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de gcig pu gang yin pa rjes su dpag par 'gyur zhing 'khrul pa yang yin pa ni med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no single case that is both inference and erroneous.

original: 'o na rjes su dpag pa ltar snang ba'i rgyu yang rjes su dpag par brjod par bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'o na rjes su dpag pa ltar snang ba'i rgyu yang rjes su dpag par brjod par bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: But isn’t the cause of apparent inference also to be called inference?

original: de ltar ni smra ba po rnams su 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar ni smra ba po rnams su 'gyur te /
translated: In that case, it would be a speaker,

original: gang 'dis rjes su dpag pa nye bar bkod pa de dag gis sun phyung ngo zhes pa dang / gzhan yang rgyu ni 'khrul pa'o zhes pa ste /
analyzed: gang 'dis rjes su dpag pa nye bar bkod pa de dag gis sun phyung ngo zhes pa dang / gzhan yang rgyu ni 'khrul pa'o zhes pa ste /
translated: Moreover, the cause is mistaken.

original: don 'di tsam brjod par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /🔽'di ni sun 'byin pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: don 'di tsam brjod par 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na / 'di ni sun 'byin pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Because he wishes to express just this much meaning.

original: gal te yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gal te yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: To say, This is not a refutation, is stated by If, moreover, the cognition of the effect and cause...

original: gal te 'bras bu dang rgyu'i shes pa yod pa la yang /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu dang rgyu'i shes pa yod pa la yang /
translated: If, moreover, the cognition of the effect and cause exists,

original: slar yang de la lhag po'i 'khrul pa dang ma 'khrul pa nyid la ltos na /
analyzed: slar yang de la lhag po'i 'khrul pa dang ma 'khrul pa nyid la ltos na /
translated: then again, in dependence on the superimposition of error and non-error,

original: 'brel pa gzhan zhig 'ongs pa'o zhes pas khas blangs pa nyams so //🔽gang kho na'i mi 'khrul ba nyid la ltos pa zhes pa /
analyzed: 'brel pa gzhan zhig 'ongs pa'o zhes pas khas blangs pa nyams so // gang kho na'i mi 'khrul ba nyid la ltos pa zhes pa /
translated: another relation would come, and thus your assertion is undermined.🔽If you say, In dependence on non-error itself,

original: gang kho na'i mi 'khrul ba nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo la ltos pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gang kho na'i mi 'khrul ba nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo la ltos pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: it means, In dependence on the nature of non-error itself.

original: rang gi ngo bo zhes pa 'di gang las she na /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo zhes pa 'di gang las she na /
translated: From what is this nature of its own?

original: gang gi phyir med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi ste gzhan pa mi 'khrul pa nyid yod pa ma yin zhing de ni mi 'khrul pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi ste gzhan pa mi 'khrul pa nyid yod pa ma yin zhing de ni mi 'khrul pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the non-erroneous nature of the other, i.e., the non-erroneous nature of the reason, does not exist, and that is the nature of non-erroneous.

original: rjes su dpag pa thams cad la yang zhes pa la sogs pas slar brjod pa don med pa nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa thams cad la yang zhes pa la sogs pas slar brjod pa don med pa nyid gsungs so //
translated: With And all inferences, etc., he states the futility of the reply.

original: ci ste nges pa'i don du de brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste nges pa'i don du de brjod do zhe na /
translated: But if it is said, It is stated in the sense of certainty,

original: de lta na yang spyir yin zhes pa la sogs pa don med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na yang spyir yin zhes pa la sogs pa don med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: then even so, in general and so forth would be futile.

original: yod nyid la'ang rnam dpyad 'di'i //🔽zhes pa la /
analyzed: yod nyid la'ang rnam dpyad 'di'i // zhes pa la /
translated: This analysis of existence🔽is also to be applied to non-existence.

original: yod pa'i sgra ni 'dir rang gi ngo bo mngon par brjod pa'o//
analyzed: yod pa'i sgra ni 'dir rang gi ngo bo mngon par brjod pa'o//
translated: Here, the word existence expresses its own nature.

original: gang phyir 'bras bu dang rgyu'i 'brel pa rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu nyid du khas blangs pa na /
analyzed: gang phyir 'bras bu dang rgyu'i 'brel pa rjes su dpog pa'i rgyu nyid du khas blangs pa na /
translated: Because when the relation of effect and cause is accepted as the reason for inference,

original: rtags kyi rang gi ngo bo kho na ci 'di 'bras bur 'gyur ram mi 'gyur zhes rnam par dpyad par rigs so //
analyzed: rtags kyi rang gi ngo bo kho na ci 'di 'bras bur 'gyur ram mi 'gyur zhes rnam par dpyad par rigs so //
translated: it is appropriate to analyze the nature of the reason itself, wondering whether it is the effect or not.

original: 'di lta ste chu klung gang ba la zhes pa /
analyzed: 'di lta ste chu klung gang ba la zhes pa /
translated: It is like this: “When a river is full”

original: de la ni rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa kho na la rnam par dpyad pa ste /
analyzed: de la ni rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa kho na la rnam par dpyad pa ste /
translated: In this case, there is only an investigation of the nature of the thing itself.

original: ci chu klung gang ba 'di char pas byas pa'am /
analyzed: ci chu klung gang ba 'di char pas byas pa'am /
translated: Is this full river produced by rain,

original: 'on te ma yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'on te ma yin zhes pa'o //
translated: or not?

original: gang gi tshe 'di dbu ba 'khrug pa dang chu rdul dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams kyis rang gi ngo bo nges par 'gyur ba de'i tshe slar yang mi 'khrul pa nyid la rnam par dpyad pa la ltos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di dbu ba 'khrug pa dang chu rdul dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams kyis rang gi ngo bo nges par 'gyur ba de'i tshe slar yang mi 'khrul pa nyid la rnam par dpyad pa la ltos pa ma yin no //
translated: When this is ascertained by the characteristics of the agitation of the foam, the water, the particles, etc., then there is no need for a further investigation of non-error.

original: @127a * // char pa'i 'bras bu nyid du nges na ni /
analyzed: @127a * // char pa'i 'bras bu nyid du nges na ni /
translated: If it is ascertained as the effect of rain,

original: de la 'khrul pa nyid du dogs pa ma yin te 'bras bu ni rgyu la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'khrul pa nyid du dogs pa ma yin te 'bras bu ni rgyu la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: there is no doubt about its being in error, because the effect is not in error with respect to the cause.

original: de kho na ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de kho na ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: The teaching of reality is stated:

original: rnam par ma dpyad pa yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par ma dpyad pa yang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Even without analysis” and so on.

original: de'i phyir nges par 'dzin pa rigs pa ma yin no zhes pa gzhan pa las kyang dbang po las 'das pa'i don rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir nges par 'dzin pa rigs pa ma yin no zhes pa gzhan pa las kyang dbang po las 'das pa'i don rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, it is not right to definitely hold that seeing is the cause of realizing imperceptible objects.

original: 'o na spyir mthong ba kho na dbang po las 'das pa'i don mthong ba'i rgyu'o zhes pa 'di ltar nges par gzung bar bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'o na spyir mthong ba kho na dbang po las 'das pa'i don mthong ba'i rgyu'o zhes pa 'di ltar nges par gzung bar bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Well then, is it not so that in general seeing is the cause of realizing imperceptible objects?

original: 'o na ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar zhe na /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: spyir mthong ba ni dbang po las 'das pa'i don nye bar dmigs pa'i rgyu kho na'o zhes so //
analyzed: spyir mthong ba ni dbang po las 'das pa'i don nye bar dmigs pa'i rgyu kho na'o zhes so //
translated: In general, seeing is the cause of perceiving imperceptible objects.

original: de lta na yang rjes su dpag pa gzhan dbang po las 'das pa'i don rtogs pa'i rgyu yin pa nyid bkag pa med pa'i phyir skyon med do zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na yang rjes su dpag pa gzhan dbang po las 'das pa'i don rtogs pa'i rgyu yin pa nyid bkag pa med pa'i phyir skyon med do zhe na /
translated: Even so, there is no fault, because inference is the cause of realizing imperceptible objects.

original: 'di yod pa ma yin te rjes su dpag pa thams cad rnams mngon gyur ma yin pa rtogs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir spyir mthong ba yang de rtogs pa'i rgyu nyid thob pa las /
analyzed: 'di yod pa ma yin te rjes su dpag pa thams cad rnams mngon gyur ma yin pa rtogs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir spyir mthong ba yang de rtogs pa'i rgyu nyid thob pa las /
translated: This is not so, because all inferences are the cause of realizing what is not manifest, and in general seeing does not obtain the status of being the cause of realizing that.

original: slar yang brjod pa na de las bzlog pa dgag pa'i ngo bo nges pa yin pa rnam par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: slar yang brjod pa na de las bzlog pa dgag pa'i ngo bo nges pa yin pa rnam par shes par bya ste /
translated: Again, when it is stated, the opposite of that is ascertained as the nature of negation.

original: sen mo lnga lnga rnams kyis bza' bar bya'o zhes pa ji lta ba bzhin yin na /
analyzed: sen mo lnga lnga rnams kyis bza' bar bya'o zhes pa ji lta ba bzhin yin na /
translated: If it is as it is stated, “The five nails should be eaten,”

original: rjes su dpag pa gnyis las spyir mthong ba tha dad par byas nas dbang po las 'das pa'i don rtogs pa'i rgyu nyid du nye bar blang bar byas te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa gnyis las spyir mthong ba tha dad par byas nas dbang po las 'das pa'i don rtogs pa'i rgyu nyid du nye bar blang bar byas te /
translated: then, having distinguished the two inferences in general, it should be accepted as the cause of realizing imperceptible objects.

original: de las kyang de kho na der rnam par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de las kyang de kho na der rnam par shes par bya ste /
translated: And from that, that alone should be cognized there.

original: ji ltar ba rnams kyi nag mo ni shin tu 'o ma phun sum tshogs pa zhes pas /
analyzed: ji ltar ba rnams kyi nag mo ni shin tu 'o ma phun sum tshogs pa zhes pas /
translated: Just as it is said, “The black cows are very rich in milk,”

original: nag mo kho na shin tu 'o ma phun sum tshogs pa nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: nag mo kho na shin tu 'o ma phun sum tshogs pa nyid bzhin no //
translated: it is only the black cows that are very rich in milk.

original: de yod par gyur pa kho na'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa /
analyzed: de yod par gyur pa kho na'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa /
translated: Because it is the cause of its existence alone,

original: gtso bo yod pa'i dngos po kho na'i ste /
analyzed: gtso bo yod pa'i dngos po kho na'i ste /
translated: it is only the existent thing of the primal substance.

original: de yod pa tsam gyis gtso bo ni tha dad pa'i rgyu yin gyi /
analyzed: de yod pa tsam gyis gtso bo ni tha dad pa'i rgyu yin gyi /
translated: By the mere existence of that, the primal substance is the cause of distinctions.

original: gcig nyid la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig nyid la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: But not by the qualities of oneness and so forth.

original: 'di ltar sems te /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems te /
translated: This is how it is thought.

original: med pa las rnams 'gyur rnams nye bar skyed pa khegs te /
analyzed: med pa las rnams 'gyur rnams nye bar skyed pa khegs te /
translated: Actions are not produced from nonexistence.

original: gsal ba ni med pa las skyed pa ma yin no zhes pa 'di'i phyir /
analyzed: gsal ba ni med pa las skyed pa ma yin no zhes pa 'di'i phyir /
translated: Because it is clear that what is manifest is not produced from nonexistence.

original: yongs su ba'i lhag ma las gtso bo yod pa'i dngos po kho na las bye brag rnams skye'o //🔽bye brag rnams yod pa'i ngo bo'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir yang yod pa'i ngo bo kho na rgya yin la /
analyzed: yongs su ba'i lhag ma las gtso bo yod pa'i dngos po kho na las bye brag rnams skye'o // bye brag rnams yod pa'i ngo bo'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir yang yod pa'i ngo bo kho na rgya yin la /
translated: Therefore, the particulars are produced only from the existent thing that is the remainder of the transformation of the primal substance.🔽Because the particulars conform to the nature of the existent, the existent alone is the cause.

original: yod pa'i ngo bo yang de'i bdag nyid 'dzin du 'jug pa po rang bzhin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: yod pa'i ngo bo yang de'i bdag nyid 'dzin du 'jug pa po rang bzhin pa kho na'o //
translated: And the existent is only the intrinsic nature that causes the apprehension of its own nature.

original: yod pa nyid dang 'dris par byas pa ni @127b ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa nyid dang 'dris par byas pa ni @127b ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the existent is made familiar.

original: yod pa ni yongs su 'gyur ba las sngar mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa ni yongs su 'gyur ba las sngar mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the existent is not possible prior to the transformation.

original: de skad du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de skad du gsungs pa /
translated: This is stated:

original: nges par yod pa dang yod pa zhes so //
analyzed: nges par yod pa dang yod pa zhes so //
translated: “The existent is ascertained as existent.”

original: ji ltar yang de'i tshe yod pa med pa de ltar gcig nyid la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar yang de'i tshe yod pa med pa de ltar gcig nyid la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
translated: Just as it does not exist in that way, so too, it is the same for oneness and so on.

original: ci'i phyir de rnams kyi rgyu nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de rnams kyi rgyu nyid yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it the cause of those?

original: gtso bo yod pa kho na'ang skyes bu'i 'dod pa rnam par bsal ba'i ched du 'jug pa yin la /
analyzed: gtso bo yod pa kho na'ang skyes bu'i 'dod pa rnam par bsal ba'i ched du 'jug pa yin la /
translated: The cause exists, but it engages for the sake of removing the desires of beings.

original: de'i phyir de kho na rgyu nyid do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de kho na rgyu nyid do zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore it is the cause alone.

original: gal te de lta na bye brag de ni gtso bo'i ldog par byed pa 'ga' yang ma yin no zhes pa la sogs pa de brjod pa ci ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na bye brag de ni gtso bo'i ldog par byed pa 'ga' yang ma yin no zhes pa la sogs pa de brjod pa ci ltar yin zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then how can it be said that this difference is not a reversal of the cause and so on?

original: de ni pha rol po'i bsam pa kho nas 'di ltar brjod pa ste /
analyzed: de ni pha rol po'i bsam pa kho nas 'di ltar brjod pa ste /
translated: This is said only from the perspective of the opponent’s thought.

original: gal te pha rol pos gzhan ma yin pa nyid du khas blang bar nas /
analyzed: gal te pha rol pos gzhan ma yin pa nyid du khas blang bar nas /
translated: If the opponent accepts that it is not different,

original: gtso bo dang skyes bu'i don du gtogs pa gtsug phud can nam sil bu can gyi don bcu rnams sgrub par byed na /
analyzed: gtso bo dang skyes bu'i don du gtogs pa gtsug phud can nam sil bu can gyi don bcu rnams sgrub par byed na /
translated: then the cause and the purpose of the person, whether it is the purpose of the one with a topknot or the one with loose hair, would be established as the ten purposes.

original: rnam pa thams cad du gtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du gtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: In every way, it would be included.

original: 'di ni rang gi bsam pas te /
analyzed: 'di ni rang gi bsam pas te /
translated: This is the thought of the opponent.

original: de yod pa'i dngos po kho na rgyu nyid du rigs so zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: de yod pa'i dngos po kho na rgyu nyid du rigs so zhes byas nas so //
translated: It is only an existent thing that can be a cause.

original: de'i yang khyad par rnams kho na las zhes pa gtso bo yod pa nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: de'i yang khyad par rnams kho na las zhes pa gtso bo yod pa nyid kyi'o //
translated: The qualification of that is “only from its own particulars,” which is the qualification of existence.

original: yod pa nyid dam mang po nyid dam zhes pa la sogs pas rnam kun gyi sgra'i don bshad do //
analyzed: yod pa nyid dam mang po nyid dam zhes pa la sogs pas rnam kun gyi sgra'i don bshad do //
translated: “ Existence, plurality, etc.” explains the meaning of the term “in every way.”

original: 'am gyi sgra sdud pa'i don can las gcig nyid la sogs pa'o//
analyzed: 'am gyi sgra sdud pa'i don can las gcig nyid la sogs pa'o//
translated: The term “or” has the sense of “and.”

original: tha dad pa'am tha mi dad pa'ang rung zhes pa /
analyzed: tha dad pa'am tha mi dad pa'ang rung zhes pa /
translated: “ Either different or non-different”

original: yod pa nyid dam gcig dang dam /
analyzed: yod pa nyid dam gcig dang dam /
translated: means “existence, oneness, or plurality.”

original: byed pa po ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa rnams dang ngo //
analyzed: byed pa po ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa rnams dang ngo //
translated: “ Not being an agent, etc.” are other examples.

original: yang na gcig dang ste bral ba dang ngam /
analyzed: yang na gcig dang ste bral ba dang ngam /
translated: “ Or oneness” means “devoid of.”

original: lnga rnams dang yang na'o //
analyzed: lnga rnams dang yang na'o //
translated: “ Or the five” means “and also.”

original: yang na gal te yod pa nyid la sogs pa rnams skyes bu las tha dad pa rnams dang / ci ste tha mi dad pa rnams te /
analyzed: yang na gal te yod pa nyid la sogs pa rnams skyes bu las tha dad pa rnams dang / ci ste tha mi dad pa rnams te /
translated: “ Or” means “if existence, etc., are different from a person, or if they are not different from a person,

original: rnam pa thams cad du rtogs pa ma yin no zhes pas khas blangs pa nyams so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du rtogs pa ma yin no zhes pas khas blangs pa nyams so //
translated: in every way it is not understood.” Thus he contradicts his own assertion.

original: gang rgyu ma yin pa de lhag ma dang ldan pa'i rjes su dpag pas rtogs par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang rgyu ma yin pa de lhag ma dang ldan pa'i rjes su dpag pas rtogs par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: That which is not a cause is not to be understood through inference that has a remainder.

original: shin tu med pa bzhin /
analyzed: shin tu med pa bzhin /
translated: It is like a complete non-entity.
