analyzed: bsres nas bcal ba'i 'jim pa'i gong du dag la'ang srang dma' ba'i khyad par med do //
translated: and the difference in the weight of the mixture is not the same as the difference in the weight of the individual substances.

original: 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: The result is not perceived.

original: de'i phyir yan lag rnams las gzhan ba'i yan lag can lci ba'i yon tan med ces pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yan lag rnams las gzhan ba'i yan lag can lci ba'i yon tan med ces pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the whole does not exist as a substance separate from the parts, and the quality of heaviness does not exist in the whole.

original: 'dir kha cig smra ste /
analyzed: 'dir kha cig smra ste /
translated: Here, some say:

original: rdul phra mo gnyis nas brtsams te /🔽ji srid rdul phran gsum la sogs pa'i 'bras bu brgyud ba de gzhal bar bya zhing /
analyzed: rdul phra mo gnyis nas brtsams te / ji srid rdul phran gsum la sogs pa'i 'bras bu brgyud ba de gzhal bar bya zhing /
translated: Beginning with two atoms,🔽the result of three atoms, etc., is to be measured,

original: de la srang dma' ba'i khyad par yin gyi /🔽rdzas thams cad kyi lci ba nyid byas pa @145a * //
analyzed: de la srang dma' ba'i khyad par yin gyi / rdzas thams cad kyi lci ba nyid byas pa @145a * //
translated: and the difference in the weight is due to the difference in the number of atoms.

original: ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ni ma yin no //
translated: The heaviness of all substances is not due to the action of the whole.

original: de'i phyir mtha'i 'bras bu gcig lhag na'ang de tsam gyis mda' ba'i khyad par du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mtha'i 'bras bu gcig lhag na'ang de tsam gyis mda' ba'i khyad par du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, even if one atom remains, there is no difference in weight.

original: dper na ras bal gyi skud pa la sogs pa gzhal bar bya ba de la'ang lci ba nyid yod cing /
analyzed: dper na ras bal gyi skud pa la sogs pa gzhal bar bya ba de la'ang lci ba nyid yod cing /
translated: For example, in the case of cotton thread, etc., which is to be measured, there is heaviness,

original: de ste yang tshogs chen po gzhal ba na /
analyzed: de ste yang tshogs chen po gzhal ba na /
translated: and if a large quantity is measured,

original: gang gi tshe ras bal gyi 'dab ma shin tu phra ba gzhag par gyur pa de'i tshe de la lci ba nyid yod na'ang srang dma' ba'i khyad par dmigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ras bal gyi 'dab ma shin tu phra ba gzhag par gyur pa de'i tshe de la lci ba nyid yod na'ang srang dma' ba'i khyad par dmigs pa ma yin no //
translated: When a very fine piece of cotton is placed on the scale pan, then although heaviness exists in it, the difference in the scale’s position is not observed.

original: des na thal ba dang bzlog pa'i sgrub par byed pa dag ma nges pa yin no zhe'o //
analyzed: des na thal ba dang bzlog pa'i sgrub par byed pa dag ma nges pa yin no zhe'o //
translated: Therefore, the reductio and the positive proof are indeterminate.

original: de skad smra ba de'i rim gyis bsdoms pa'i rdul gyi tshogs rdul phran gnyis la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i rdzas du ma can la ji lta bu'i lci ba nyid de lta bu cig car bsdoms pa de la mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de skad smra ba de'i rim gyis bsdoms pa'i rdul gyi tshogs rdul phran gnyis la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i rdzas du ma can la ji lta bu'i lci ba nyid de lta bu cig car bsdoms pa de la mi 'gyur te /
translated: The opponent says: The collection of atoms that is gradually accumulated, the many substances that are the effect of two atoms and so on, do not have the same degree of heaviness as the collection of atoms that is accumulated all at once.

original: 'bras bu'i rdzas gcig kho na'o zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rdzas gcig kho na'o zhes byas nas so //
translated: This is because they are only one substance that is the effect.

original: 'on kyang lcid tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang lcid tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: However, they are different in weight.

original: de las kyang des byas pa'i srang dma' bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de las kyang des byas pa'i srang dma' bar 'gyur la /
translated: And from that, the scale’s position is different.

original: 'gyur ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gyur ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that they are different in size.

original: gzhan yang gang gi tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang gang gi tshe /
translated: Moreover, when

original: gser la sogs pa rnams kyi ra ti re re ba ji srid du de rnams brgya gzhal bar gyur ba de srid gcig gzhal zhing /
analyzed: gser la sogs pa rnams kyi ra ti re re ba ji srid du de rnams brgya gzhal bar gyur ba de srid gcig gzhal zhing /
translated: As long as one hundred of those gold particles and so on are weighed, one of those is weighed.

original: slar yang de rnams kho na rim gyis bsdoms pa rnams brgya gzhal ba de'i tshe grangs mtshungs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slar yang de rnams kho na rim gyis bsdoms pa rnams brgya gzhal ba de'i tshe grangs mtshungs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But when those very particles are weighed one hundred times in succession, they are not weighed equally.🔽Why?

original: gang phyir / de tsam gyis rdzas kyi tshogs nye ba dang de dang bral ba la lcid mtshungs par ci ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gang phyir / de tsam gyis rdzas kyi tshogs nye ba dang de dang bral ba la lcid mtshungs par ci ltar 'gyur /
translated: How could the collection of substances be weighed equally when they are close to or separated from each other?

original: 'gyur ba'ang yin te /
analyzed: 'gyur ba'ang yin te /
translated: They are weighed,

original: de'i phyir rdul phran gnyis la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i rdzas gzhan gzhal bar bya ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdul phran gnyis la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i rdzas gzhan gzhal bar bya ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: but because of that, the substance of the result of two particles and so on is not weighed.

original: ci ste skyon 'dir ma gyur cig snyam pas /
analyzed: ci ste skyon 'dir ma gyur cig snyam pas /
translated: But if you think, “Let us not commit this error,”

original: yungs kar la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i rdzas kyi ste /
analyzed: yungs kar la sogs pa'i 'bras bu'i rdzas kyi ste /
translated: the substance of the result of mustard seeds and so on

original: sogs pa'i sgras yungs kar gnyis la sogs pa nas brtsams pa gong ma gong ma la lci ba nyid 'phel ba dang ldan yang dmigs pa ma yin pa kho na'o zhes 'dod na /
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras yungs kar gnyis la sogs pa nas brtsams pa gong ma gong ma la lci ba nyid 'phel ba dang ldan yang dmigs pa ma yin pa kho na'o zhes 'dod na /
translated: is weighed one hundred times in succession, beginning with two mustard seeds and so on, and the increase of heaviness is not observed.

original: 'o na de lta na yungs kar las snga ma'i 'bras bu'i rdzas kyi phreng ba'i lcid gang yin ba de ni shin tu mtshon dka' ba kho na yin la /
analyzed: 'o na de lta na yungs kar las snga ma'i 'bras bu'i rdzas kyi phreng ba'i lcid gang yin ba de ni shin tu mtshon dka' ba kho na yin la /
translated: Well then, in that case, the weight of the series of substance of the prior effect of the mustard seed is extremely difficult to demonstrate.

original: yungs kar las byung ba phyi ma'i lcid nyid nye bar mtshon pa la rang nyid kho na son par byed do //
analyzed: yungs kar las byung ba phyi ma'i lcid nyid nye bar mtshon pa la rang nyid kho na son par byed do //
translated: The weight of the subsequent effect that arises from the mustard seed is demonstrated by the mere arrival of the mustard seed itself.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad du lci ba nyid mi dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pas lan snying po med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad du lci ba nyid mi dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pas lan snying po med pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it follows that weight is not observed in any way. Thus, your response is pointless.

original: ras 'dab kyi ni gal te yang lci ba nye bar mtshon ba ma yin ba de lta na'ang de mthong ngo zhes pas yod pa @145b nyid du rigs so //
analyzed: ras 'dab kyi ni gal te yang lci ba nye bar mtshon ba ma yin ba de lta na'ang de mthong ngo zhes pas yod pa @145b nyid du rigs so //
translated: Even if the weight of the mustard seed is not demonstrated, it is still reasonable to infer its existence, since it is seen.

original: yan lag can ni yan lag las tha dad par mthong ba ma yin zhing de las byung ba gzugs la sogs pa gzhan nye bar dmigs pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: yan lag can ni yan lag las tha dad par mthong ba ma yin zhing de las byung ba gzugs la sogs pa gzhan nye bar dmigs pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: The possessor of parts is not seen to be different from the parts, nor is it observed that the other parts, such as form, arise from it.

original: de'i phyir lcid nyid kyi khyad par med pa ltar de'i gzugs la sogs ba'i yon tan gyi khyad par yang med la /
analyzed: de'i phyir lcid nyid kyi khyad par med pa ltar de'i gzugs la sogs ba'i yon tan gyi khyad par yang med la /
translated: Therefore, just as there is no difference in heaviness, there is no difference in the qualities of form, etc.

original: bya ba'i khyad par yang med de /
analyzed: bya ba'i khyad par yang med de /
translated: Nor is there any difference in action.

original: 'jim pa la sogs pa'i ril bu ma 'dres pa'i gnas skabs na gang gzugs la sogs pa dang / gang bya ba yod pa de las lhag pa'i gzugs la sogs pa dang bya ba ni 'dres pa'i gnas skabs na'ang /
analyzed: 'jim pa la sogs pa'i ril bu ma 'dres pa'i gnas skabs na gang gzugs la sogs pa dang / gang bya ba yod pa de las lhag pa'i gzugs la sogs pa dang bya ba ni 'dres pa'i gnas skabs na'ang /
translated: When the ball of clay, etc. is in the unmixed state, whatever form, etc. and whatever action exists, that form, etc. and that action do not exist in the mixed state.

original: rang nyid ji lta ba'i dbang pos ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid ji lta ba'i dbang pos ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the self, just as it is, is not perceived by the senses.

original: gang lcid nyid med par sgrub par byed pa srang dma' ba'i khyad par mi 'dzin pa de ni /
analyzed: gang lcid nyid med par sgrub par byed pa srang dma' ba'i khyad par mi 'dzin pa de ni /
translated: That which establishes the absence of heaviness does not apprehend the difference in the low balance.

original: yan lag can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang de dang 'dus pa'i yon tan dang bya ba mi dmigs pa nye bar mtshon ba tsam mo //
analyzed: yan lag can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang de dang 'dus pa'i yon tan dang bya ba mi dmigs pa nye bar mtshon ba tsam mo //
translated: This is merely an illustration of the non-apprehension of the nature of the whole and the qualities and actions that are mixed with it.

original: de'i phyir yan lag can gyi bya ba med la /
analyzed: de'i phyir yan lag can gyi bya ba med la /
translated: Therefore, the whole has no action.

original: yon tan rnams kyang med de /
analyzed: yon tan rnams kyang med de /
translated: And the qualities do not exist.

original: de med pa'i phyir yang 'du ba can gyi rgyu nyid kyang ma yin la /
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir yang 'du ba can gyi rgyu nyid kyang ma yin la /
translated: Because it does not exist, it is not the cause of the whole.

original: mthong bar bya ba'am reg par bya ba nyid kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: mthong bar bya ba'am reg par bya ba nyid kyang ma yin no //
translated: It is not even seen or touched.

original: rdzas kyi mtshan nyid can dang ldan pa mthong bar bya ba'am reg par bya ba'i yan lag can ni yan lag rnams la gzhan med do //
analyzed: rdzas kyi mtshan nyid can dang ldan pa mthong bar bya ba'am reg par bya ba'i yan lag can ni yan lag rnams la gzhan med do //
translated: The whole, which has the characteristic of substance, and which is seen or touched, does not exist apart from the parts.

original: gang dmigs su rung ba mi dmigs pa de ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang dmigs su rung ba mi dmigs pa de ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: What is not perceived as it could be perceived does not exist,

original: 'di lta ste ri bong gi rva bzhin /
analyzed: 'di lta ste ri bong gi rva bzhin /
translated: like the horn of an ass.

original: rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i yan lag can yan lag rnams las gzhan pa'ang dmigs su rung ba ma dmigs so //
analyzed: rdzas kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i yan lag can yan lag rnams las gzhan pa'ang dmigs su rung ba ma dmigs so //
translated: The whole, which has the characteristic of substance, is not perceived as it could be perceived apart from the parts.

original: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'o //🔽yan lag rnams ni gzhan ma yin pa zhes pa chos can gyi khyad bar sel ba'o//
analyzed: rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'o // yan lag rnams ni gzhan ma yin pa zhes pa chos can gyi khyad bar sel ba'o//
translated: The non-perception of essence.🔽The qualification “the parts are not different” eliminates the possibility of a subject other than that.

original: yan lag rnams yan lag can las gzhan no zhes pa dam bca'o //
analyzed: yan lag rnams yan lag can las gzhan no zhes pa dam bca'o //
translated: The thesis is “the parts are not different from the whole.”

original: 'dir yan lag rnams chos can te /
analyzed: 'dir yan lag rnams chos can te /
translated: Here, the parts are the subject.

original: de rnams gzhan nyid kyi chos ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams gzhan nyid kyi chos ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: The property to be proven is their non-difference.

original: de rnams kyi yang 'ga' zhig mngon sum nyid kyi khyad par du pha rol pos 'dod de /
analyzed: de rnams kyi yang 'ga' zhig mngon sum nyid kyi khyad par du pha rol pos 'dod de /
translated: Some of them are asserted by the opponent to be direct perception.

original: de las gzhan nyid yod na /
analyzed: de las gzhan nyid yod na /
translated: If they were different from that,

original: de las tha dad par mi snang ba'i phyir 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de las tha dad par mi snang ba'i phyir 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: it would not be tenable that they do not appear as different from that.

original: gzhan nyid du yod pa na gang zhig gang las tha dad par snang ba ma yin pa de mngon sum ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan nyid du yod pa na gang zhig gang las tha dad par snang ba ma yin pa de mngon sum ma yin te /
translated: When they are different, that which does not appear as different from that is not direct perception.

original: chen po ma yin pa'i yan lag can dang po'i yan lag rnams bzhin /🔽yan lag rnams kyang gzhan nyid du yod pa na yan lag can pha rol de @146a * //
analyzed: chen po ma yin pa'i yan lag can dang po'i yan lag rnams bzhin / yan lag rnams kyang gzhan nyid du yod pa na yan lag can pha rol de @146a * //
translated: For example, the parts of a pot are not different from a pot.

original: las tha dad par snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: las tha dad par snang ba ma yin no //
translated: If the parts existed as different, the possessor of the parts would not appear as different from that.

original: khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: The nonobservation of the pervader.

original: rdzas ni yod pa ma yin te zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdzas ni yod pa ma yin te zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Substance does not exist” and so on.

original: 'di'i shin tu grags pa'i don ni slob dpon rang nyid kyis phyis 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di'i shin tu grags pa'i don ni slob dpon rang nyid kyis phyis 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The very well-known meaning of this will be explained later by the master himself.

original: don gzhan yang shin tu grags pa ma yin pa srid pa de kho na bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: don gzhan yang shin tu grags pa ma yin pa srid pa de kho na bshad par bya'o //
translated: The other meaning that is possible, which is not very well known, will now be explained.

original: rdzas yod do zhes pa dam bca'o //
analyzed: rdzas yod do zhes pa dam bca'o //
translated: The thesis is: “Substance exists.”

original: rdzas ni sa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdzas ni sa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Substance is earth, etc.

original: de yod de /
analyzed: de yod de /
translated: It exists.

original: yod pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: yod pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “exists” is “it exists.”

original: yod pa nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir k'a na bhu dza ni rdzas la sogs pa gsum yod pa'o zhes mngon par 'dod do //
analyzed: yod pa nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir k'a na bhu dza ni rdzas la sogs pa gsum yod pa'o zhes mngon par 'dod do //
translated: Because it possesses existence, the Kanabhakṣaṇas assert that the three, substance, etc., exist.

original: de las kyang yon tan rnams kyang rdzas kyi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de las kyang yon tan rnams kyang rdzas kyi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, qualities also become the nature of substance,

original: rdzas la gnas pa'i bdag nyid yod pa nyid dang 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzas la gnas pa'i bdag nyid yod pa nyid dang 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are related to existence, which is the nature of substance.

original: 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod par 'gyur te /
translated: This is stated:

original: gal te yod pa nyid rdzas la 'jug na de'i tshe nges par 'dis rdzas la 'du ba can gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur bar bya ste /
analyzed: gal te yod pa nyid rdzas la 'jug na de'i tshe nges par 'dis rdzas la 'du ba can gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur bar bya ste /
translated: If existence is predicated of substance, then it must be that it makes substance the nature of that which is an inherence cause.

original: gzhan du na rdzas la 'jug par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: gzhan du na rdzas la 'jug par mi 'gyur na /
translated: Otherwise, it would not be predicated of substance.

original: 'jug pa yang yin no //
analyzed: 'jug pa yang yin no //
translated: But it is predicated.

original: de'i phyir yod pa nyid rdzas la 'jug pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir yod pa nyid rdzas la 'jug pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
translated: Therefore, existence is the nature of that which is predicated of substance.

original: de ltar gyur na de rang bzhin gang gis rdzas la 'jug pa de kho nas yon tan rnams la'ang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na de rang bzhin gang gis rdzas la 'jug pa de kho nas yon tan rnams la'ang ngo //
translated: If that were the case, then the substance would be engaged by the very nature that engages the qualities.

original: ci ste rang bzhin des mi 'jug na /
analyzed: ci ste rang bzhin des mi 'jug na /
translated: But if it does not engage by that nature,

original: de'i tshe de'i rang bzhin gzhan kho na yon tan rnams la zhugs par 'gyur gyi de kho na ni ma yin no zhes pas /
analyzed: de'i tshe de'i rang bzhin gzhan kho na yon tan rnams la zhugs par 'gyur gyi de kho na ni ma yin no zhes pas /
translated: then at that time, the very nature of that would be engaged in the qualities by another nature alone, but not by that very nature.

original: tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir gcig nyid nyams so //
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid kyi phyir gcig nyid nyams so //
translated: Therefore, because of being different, singularity is undermined.

original: de'ang 'dod pa ma yin no zhes pas /
analyzed: de'ang 'dod pa ma yin no zhes pas /
translated: And that is unacceptable.

original: yon tan rnams la'ang de rdzas la gnas pa'i rang bzhin kho na 'jug par 'dod par bya la /
analyzed: yon tan rnams la'ang de rdzas la gnas pa'i rang bzhin kho na 'jug par 'dod par bya la /
translated: Therefore, the very nature of that which resides in substance should be asserted to engage the qualities.

original: de las kyang /
analyzed: de las kyang /
translated: And from that,

original: gang las de ltar de rnams la rdzas la 'du ba can gyi rang bzhin de 'jug par 'gyur ba de rnams kyang rdzas kyi rang bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang las de ltar de rnams la rdzas la 'du ba can gyi rang bzhin de 'jug par 'gyur ba de rnams kyang rdzas kyi rang bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: it follows that those qualities would also be the nature of substance, since the very nature that resides in substance would engage in them in that way.

original: gal te de rnams kyang rdzas kyi rang bzhin du gyur na /
analyzed: gal te de rnams kyang rdzas kyi rang bzhin du gyur na /
translated: If those qualities were to become the nature of substance,🔽then

original: yon tan rnams rdzas kyi rang bzhin du thal bar 'gyur bas dpe gsal bar byas so //
analyzed: yon tan rnams rdzas kyi rang bzhin du thal bar 'gyur bas dpe gsal bar byas so //
translated: Since it follows that the qualities would be the nature of substance, the example is clarified.

original: yon tan rnams rdzas kyi rang bzhin du 'dod pa'ang ma yin te /
analyzed: yon tan rnams rdzas kyi rang bzhin du 'dod pa'ang ma yin te /
translated: Also, the qualities are not asserted to be the nature of substance.

original: de'i phyir yod pa nyid ni rdzas la mi 'jug pa'i rang bzhin du khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yod pa nyid ni rdzas la mi 'jug pa'i rang bzhin du khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, existence should be accepted as the nature of that which does not engage substance.

original: de'i phyir rdzas su mngon par 'dod pa la'ang 'phrod pa 'dus pa 'di ni rdzas ma yin pa la gnas pa'i bdag nyid kho na'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdzas su mngon par 'dod pa la'ang 'phrod pa 'dus pa 'di ni rdzas ma yin pa la gnas pa'i bdag nyid kho na'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, even in the case of that which is manifestly asserted to be substance, this contact is the nature of that which is not substance alone.

original: de lta na'ang de la zhugs pa de'i rang bzhin der 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na'ang de la zhugs pa de'i rang bzhin der 'gyur ro //
translated: Even so, that which engages it would be the nature of that.

original: gal te @146b rdzas su mngon par 'dod pa rdzas ma yin par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te @146b rdzas su mngon par 'dod pa rdzas ma yin par 'gyur na /
translated: If that which is manifestly asserted to be substance becomes non-substance,

original: de'i phyir rdzas ni yod pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdzas ni yod pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: then substance does not exist.

original: gang yod pa nyid dang ldan pa de rdzas ma yin te /
analyzed: gang yod pa nyid dang ldan pa de rdzas ma yin te /
translated: That which possesses existence is not substance,

original: yon tan bzhin rdzas su mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po 'ang yod pa nyid dang ldan no zhes pa 'gal bas khyab pas /
analyzed: yon tan bzhin rdzas su mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po 'ang yod pa nyid dang ldan no zhes pa 'gal bas khyab pas /
translated: like the qualities. Also, things that are manifestly asserted to be substance possess existence. Since this is contradictory, it is pervasion.

original: chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo gsal ba'i phyir dam bca'i skyon no //
analyzed: chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo gsal ba'i phyir dam bca'i skyon no //
translated: The fault of the thesis is that the nature of the subject is not clear.

original: ngag thams cad brdzun pa'i don can no zhes dam bca'o //
analyzed: ngag thams cad brdzun pa'i don can no zhes dam bca'o //
translated: The thesis is that all speech has a false meaning.

original: 'dis kyang rang nyid las gzhan pa'i ngag thams cad brdzun pa'i don can zhes dam bcas te /
analyzed: 'dis kyang rang nyid las gzhan pa'i ngag thams cad brdzun pa'i don can zhes dam bcas te /
translated: This also is a thesis that all speech other than one’s own has a false meaning.

original: de ltar ni pha rol pos rtogs pa'i ched du tshig rjod par byed pa kho nas smra ba bos rang gi tshig tshad ma nyid du khas blang bar byas te /
analyzed: de ltar ni pha rol pos rtogs pa'i ched du tshig rjod par byed pa kho nas smra ba bos rang gi tshig tshad ma nyid du khas blang bar byas te /
translated: In this way, the opponent, by merely uttering words for the purpose of understanding, accepts his own words as valid.

original: de'i phyir de 'dir brjod par 'dod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de 'dir brjod par 'dod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, that is not what is intended here.

original: de'i phyir thams cad kyi sgra ni 'dir ngag gi phyogs gcig pha rol po'i kho na la 'jug go //
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad kyi sgra ni 'dir ngag gi phyogs gcig pha rol po'i kho na la 'jug go //
translated: Therefore, all sounds here are included in the opponent’s speech alone.

original: gang yang ngag cas pa rjes su brjod pa ngag de ci 'dra ba yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang yang ngag cas pa rjes su brjod pa ngag de ci 'dra ba yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: What is the nature of the speech that is repeated when it is said “speech”? It is said:

original: ngag yod de /
analyzed: ngag yod de /
translated: Speech exists.

original: ngag gi bdag nyid kyis dang brdzun pa'i don can nyid kyis kyang zhes pa ste /
analyzed: ngag gi bdag nyid kyis dang brdzun pa'i don can nyid kyis kyang zhes pa ste /
translated: It is by the nature of speech and also by having a false meaning.

original: ngag gi bdag nyid kyis zhes pa ngag gi rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: ngag gi bdag nyid kyis zhes pa ngag gi rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: “By the nature of speech” means by the nature of speech.

original: 'dis ni chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo rjes su brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis ni chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo rjes su brjod do //
translated: This indicates the nature of the subject.

original: brdzun pa'i don can nyid kyis kyang zhes pa don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: brdzun pa'i don can nyid kyis kyang zhes pa don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa nyid kyis so //
translated: “By the nature of having a false meaning” means by the nature of not being as it is.

original: 'dis kyang chos kyi rang gi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: 'dis kyang chos kyi rang gi ngo bo'o //
translated: This also indicates the nature of the property.

original: gsum pa 'di ni 'di ltar gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: gsum pa 'di ni 'di ltar gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The third is characterized by being like this.

original: kyang gi sgra ni chos can dang chos kyi khyad par rjes su brjod pa'i ngag sdud pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: kyang gi sgra ni chos can dang chos kyi khyad par rjes su brjod pa'i ngag sdud pa'i don du'o //
translated: The word “also” is for the purpose of including the statement that indicates the distinctions of the subject and property.

original: de yang ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: de yang ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: ngag gi khyad par mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa yod la /
analyzed: ngag gi khyad par mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa yod la /
translated: The distinction of speech is impermanence and so on.

original: brdzun pa'i don can nyid kyi yang brdzun tshig gi brjod par bya ba can nyid la sogs pa yod de zhes pa 'di lta bu'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: brdzun pa'i don can nyid kyi yang brdzun tshig gi brjod par bya ba can nyid la sogs pa yod de zhes pa 'di lta bu'i rnam pa'o //
translated: The nature of having a false meaning is having the nature of being expressed by false speech and so on. It is of this kind.

original: 'di'i zhes pa rjes su brjod pa'i ngag gi'o //
analyzed: 'di'i zhes pa rjes su brjod pa'i ngag gi'o //
translated: “This” refers to the statement that indicates.

original: 'di'i yang dam bca'i ngag gis bh'a ra ta la sogs pa'i ngag bzhin du brdzun pa'i don can nyid du dam bcas so //🔽de yang brdzun pa'i don can nyid na bh'a ra ta la sogs pa'i ngag rang bzhin rjod byed ma yin pa'ang bden pa'i don can du yang dag par 'byung zhing /
analyzed: 'di'i yang dam bca'i ngag gis bh'a ra ta la sogs pa'i ngag bzhin du brdzun pa'i don can nyid du dam bcas so // de yang brdzun pa'i don can nyid na bh'a ra ta la sogs pa'i ngag rang bzhin rjod byed ma yin pa'ang bden pa'i don can du yang dag par 'byung zhing /
translated: Also, by the words of the vow, it is vowed that it has the meaning of falsity, like the words of the Bharata and so on.🔽Moreover, if it has the meaning of falsity, the words of the Bharata and so on are not truly expressive of intrinsic reality, and they have the meaning of falsity.

original: gang yang mi bden pa'i don can nyid de'i khyad par yin pa de'ang nyams so //
analyzed: gang yang mi bden pa'i don can nyid de'i khyad par yin pa de'ang nyams so //
translated: Also, the distinction that it has the meaning of falsity is undermined.
